The name “Cursed” is based on the image of a giant spoon that scoops out the surface of the Moon and turns it into a cursed space (the imaginary space).

During development when the shape the game would take was still being decided we considered making it a Noble Phantasm that was homage to Black Sakura.

 

 1.  Camera: Close up of BB followed by a rapid zoom out of the camera. The sky behind BB becomes black. BB, as if to welcome a man, spreads her arms wide and then melts into the darkness of the background.

 2.  The camera is placed even farther away; the goal is not to show the characters, but to show the backdrop and scenery. The camera shows the ground which appears to be tilted diagonally. The tilted ground and horizon make the viewer feel uneasy. The camera is pulled far back, so the horizon can be seen more clearly. On the other side of the horizon is a phantasm of a giant BB (homage to Black Sakura).

 3.  The giant Black Sakura, with a bewitching laugh, then reaches out and scoops up the ground that the protagonist is standing on. It looks as easy as if she just scooped out a bite of pudding.

 4.  The giant phantasm closes her hand and crushes everything in her hand, protagonist and all. It’s great if you can tell this is homage to the scene in Fate/stay night where Black Sakura crushes the insects of Matou Zouken.

 

…is what we wanted to do, but the cost to design and implement this Noble Phantasm and Black Sakura from scratch was high enough that we decided to use the money elsewhere. Hence it was axed.

Like BB says, money isn’t unlimited. In order to get the Servants all dressed up in their swimsuits, there had to be some cuts in other areas of the game.

 

■ガウェイン【サ`ヴァント】

クラス目セイバ`のサ`ヴァントだが、初登rから真名を名\っているため、本ではガウェインと呼称されている。マスタ`はレオ・B・ハ`ウェイ。

すらりとしたL身でありながらBな体つき、かつ、gやかで甘いマスクをした美男子。

本人は缢椒罟を第一としており、王とJめたレオのに丐筏皮い搿％欹が会しているrはQして自分を出さず、レオの名代として前に出たrのみ会をする。

その口{は訾浃で、相手をXんじる事も侮辱する事もない。たとえ相手が力量不足でも、その橐・悟をくみ取り、礼をもって相手をする。

 

ガウェイン卿はア`サ`王徽hに登訾工易郡悟T士のひとりだ。ア`サ`王の甥であり、ア`サ`王の片腕と称されたランスロットにKぶT士である。

徽hでは王を助けられなかったY末を持つが、その忠\心は最後まで\だった。

サ`ヴァントとして召兢丹欷骏ウェインはそのo念を残しており、今度こそは王の宿命を持つ者をa佐し、一振りのとして尽くしきる、と誓っている。

幸\な事に、マスタ`であるレオは彼がを捧げるに相辘筏と宋铯坤盲俊

レオという、生まれながらに王}を@得している幼い王を守り、羽化させる事が自分の役割だとガウェインは信じている。

……もっとも。ガウェインはレオに足りないものは”堡扦り、人の王である以上、いずれその刻が来る事を知っていた。

いや。そうでなければ人を治める王として完成しない事を、易r代に思い知ったのだ。

この清廉白なT士は、ユリウスのように~なものとしてレオを信奉するのではなく、いずれ~なものになるレオのになる事を誓った。

「───もちろんです。

F方にその刻《とき》がくるまで、私は伽辆Aけます」

﻿そうレオにZるガウェインの姿は、弟の成Lを守るgの兄のようだ。

ガウェイン卿はレオに『その刻』とは何なのか、最後までZることはなかった。ガウェインを信mするレオも、『その刻』とは何なのかだけはiめず、}杯檎を伽吝Mんでいく事になる。

 

Gawain [servant] P167-168

He is a class Saber servant, but due to the immediate reveal of his true name in his first appearance he will be referred to as Gawain in this book. His Master is Leo B. Harwey.

Gawain has a well-proportioned tall and sturdy body. He is cast as a calm and sweet handsome man.

He considers selfless devotion to be of the utmost importance, and he has dedicated his sword to Leo, whom he has recognized as a true king. When Leo is talking Gawain never tries to express his own views, and he only speaks as a representative of his Master’s opinion.

His voice and tone are clear and refreshing, and he would never insult his enemy even when they are down. Even if his opponent is lacking in power or ability, Gawain courteously engages with them out of consideration for their desire for battle and their determination.

 

Sir Gawain appears in The Legend of King Arthur, and is a Knight of the Round Table. He is King Arthur’s nephew, and appears alongside Lancelot as one of King Arthur’s most trusted knights.

In the legend Gawain ends up being unable to save the King, however his loyalty was true to the end.

His regrets remain after being summoned as a Servant, so he is determined that this time he will be of assistance to those who hold sway over the fate of the King, and he has sworn to give it his all with every swing of his sword.

Luckily, the Master to whom Gawain has pledged his sword to seems to be very suitable for him.

Gawain believes that through birthright Leo possess the right to become king, and that it is his role protect and nurture the development of the young king.

…at least at first. Gawain eventually learns that Leo has never experienced defeat, and as the people’s king that it is something that Leo will eventually encounter.

No. It’s more that from his time as a Knight of the Round Table he was thoroughly taught the lesson that without experiencing defeat, a person can never become a true ruler of the people.

This upstanding and honest knight doesn’t believe in Leo unconditionally as Julius does, but has sworn to be Leo’s sword until the inevitable time comes when Leo will become a true ruler.

“―Of course. Until that time comes, I will continue to be victorious.”

As Gawain discusses Leo like this, it’s as if an older brother is watching over his younger brother’s growth.

Even to the end, Sir Gawain never tells Leo what “that time” is. Leo, trusting in Gawain does not try to discover what “that time” refers to, and together they continue their streak of victories in the Holy Grail War.

 

■加虐体|【スキル】

メルトリリスのイデススキル。

殛Lにおいて、自己の攻男预衰抓楗寡a正がかかる。

プラスのように思われがちだが、これを持つ者は殛LがL引けばL引くほど加虐性をし、普段の冷静さを失ってしまう。バ`サ`カ`一i手前の暴走スキルと言える。攻めれば攻めるほどくなるが、反面、防御力が低下してしまう。一一の殛Lではそれなりに有郡圣攻ルだが、馓椁涮剿鳏蛑鳏摔筏骏抓欹rgのなが～い冒ではリスキ`。

 

Sadistic Predisposition [skill] P169

This is Melt Lilith’s id_es skill.

During battle, she increases her attack rating. The longer a battle goes on for, the more her sadistic tendency increases, and she loses her cool. This skill is just one step away from turning her into a Berserker. The more she attacks, the stronger her attacks become, but on the other hand her defense capability decreases. A very effective skill in one-on-one battle, however in drawn out group battles or dungeon exploring it proves to be risky.

 

■各ＥＮＤの分岐【ネタバレ】

ＣＣＣでは大きく二つのＥＮＤル`トがある。

七章に入った段Aでフラグが成立し、

@よりのイベントをこなしていると真ル`トへ。

@にかまわずサ`ヴァントイベントをこなしているとサ`ヴァントル`トへ移行する。

七章に入ったrのタイトルはそれぞれ`うものなので、どちらのル`トになったかは一目t然となる。

……ただし、真ル`トに入ったからといってサ`ヴァントＥＮＤがられないUではない。

真ル`トの龊稀⒆钺幛戊椁蜷_くrにxk枝が出Fし、どちらのル`トに寄るのかをxkできる仕になっているのでご安心を。

また、真ル`トが真ル`トと呼ばれている理由は、それが物Zの真相を明かすル`トだから……だけではない。”サ`ヴァントとのeれ”こそが国の真骨であり、正yなY末であるからこそ真ル`トと命名された。

 

Branching point for each ending [spoilers] P169

There are two main endings in CCC.

The flags you’ve triggered are tallied when you enter the seventh round.

If you’ve seen more Sakura related events, you will be headed for the true end.

If you’ve ignored Sakura and focused on a Servant, you will be headed for a Servant end.

The title of the seventh chapter is different depending on the route you’ve entered, so you can tell at a glance which route you are on.

…However, just because you’ve entered the true end route it doesn’t mean it’s impossible to reach a Servant end.

When on the true end route, when you open the last door you will be presented with a variety of choices which will affect which route you will ultimately head down, so don’t worry if you were aiming for a Servant end, it’s still possible.

The reason that the true end route is the “true” end is because it’s the route that reveals the truth of the story aspects that the protagonist doesn’t know yet. But it’s not only that. “Bidding farewell to your Servant” is an incredibly important part of Fate works, and so the true end route was selected as the true ending because it has a proper Fate style conclusion.

 

■各ステ`ジ名【その他】

サクラ迷mは少女たちの心をFしたものなので、のステ`ジ名も彼女たちをFしたものにした。

All stage names [other] P170
The Sakura Labyrinth was made to represent the hearts of the heroines within, so each stage name was selected accordingly.

 

Layer 1 - Backyard of Eden

 -01F Escape From New Moon.

 -02F Gold Trash.

 -03F Slave On Syndrome.

 

 Layer 2 - Girl’s Side Laboratory

 -04F Honey tight Dresscode.

 -05F Needless?

 -06F Bandit Zero Over.

 

 Layer 3 - Alter Ego/M

 -07F Rapunzel Go Home.

 -08F Sleeping Beauty.

 -09F Red Skin Monster.

 

 Layer 4 - Sick, Home sink

 -10F Connection.

 -11F Memory.

 -12F Life.

 

Layer 5 - Iron Maiden Princess

 -13F Dragon Sweet Coaster!

 -14F Crimson Full-Course

 -15F No Past.

 

 Layer 6 - Alter Ego/S

 -16F Silence Swan Lake.

 -17F Alice in Graveyard.

 -18F Crime Ballet.

 Observer on Angelica Cage, black bottom moon light.

 Crimson Full-Course

 No Past.

 

 Layer 7 - Anima Ataraxia.

 Deliverer on Angelica Cage, holy only lime tree.

 

■串刺城塞【宝具】

カズィクル・ベイ。

ランサ`の持つ宝具。

串刺し公・ヴラド三世の代名~とも言える宝具。

魔から放つ、猡い肉槌の拷魔城。

相手が持つ不x・堕落の罪に辘袱仆搐撙す、まさに正xの一膜扦る。

ゲ`ム中では死の叫びをあげるマンドラゴラの如く、长巫阆陇らo数のが突き上がり、大ダメ`ジを与える。

加えてバッドステ`タス・猡い蓼歉队毪丹欷搿

したすべての潮が象になるため、一一より一多で真をk]する。

またLし要素として、カズィクル・ベイは”正の象”にあたる人gへ加ダメ`ジを持つ。

相手が『逃走』『不道浴弧罕┝Α护蚍袱筏皮い龊稀その破擦Δしていくのだが、犯罪Usのない主人公にその追加はなかった。

 

当r、一般庶民への串刺し刑はバルカン半uを含む北地中海ではさして珍しい刑Pではなかった。

しかしヴラド三世は2度目のワラキア公への即位のH、あまりにも腐・贰⒍槁浃筏った自国のF族たちの姿をて慨。

国を荒させた原因はそのF族らにあるとて、未曾有の大正を敢行する。その正の要となったのが、F族にする串刺し刑だった。

F族と庶民がしく分割されていたワラキアにおいて、これは相当にショッキングな事gだったと推yされる。

I民たちの中でヴラド公の苛烈さ、恐ろしさを感じなかった者はいなかっただろう。

以降、串刺しはヴラド三世の十八番となり、彼は1459年、トルコの使者を生きたまま串刺しにするなどの所Iに出ている。

 

The Fortress of Impalement [noble phantasm] P170

Kazikli Bey.

Lancer’s anti-army Noble Phantasm.

This is a Noble Phantasm derived from Vlad III’s posthumous title C Vlad the Impaler.

It’s a magic torture castle that pierces victims with magic lances which curse and deal heavy damage.

The pain caused by it increases depending on the immoral and deprave sins they have committed; it’s truly an attack of great justice.

In the game, Mandragoras, screaming as though they were dying, burst out from under the feet of enemies and pierce them with countless lances that cause huge damage.

Furthermore, the attacks apply the negative status effect “curse.”

The attack affects all enemy units, so it’s true value is only displayed in one vs. many situations rather than one-on-one.

Also, as a hidden component, Kazikli Bey’s damage is increased when used on people who qualify as “enforcement targets.”

If the enemy has committed the crimes of escape from prison, immorality, or violence, Kazikli Bey’s destructive power increases. There is no extra damage when used against the protagonist because they have no criminal record.

 

At the time Vlad III was alive, punishing commoners with impalement wasn’t unusual in the Balkan Peninsula and Northern Mediterranean Sea areas.

But then, after Vlad III took up the role as Wallachia’s lord and leader for the second time, he became fed up with the extreme corruption and depravity of the nobles in his country.

He decided that the decline of Wallachia was due to these nobles, and took decisive action against unprecedented numbers of them. His primary method of enforcement and punishment was impalement.

In Wallachia, where nobles and commoners had previously been subject to very different treatment and rules, it’s presumed that Vlad’s actions were extremely shocking.

There was surely no one in the land who did not feel the severity and horror of Lord Vlad’s actions.

After routing the nobles, impalement became Vlad’s favorite method of punishment, and in 1459 he even went so far as to impale the emissary of the Ottoman Empire (Turkish Empire) alive, among other deeds.

 

■カズラドロップ【アルタ`エゴ】

gFしなかったサクラファイブの一人。

慈郅违ルタ`エゴ。

他のアルタ`エゴと`い、人gを憎めず、むしろＢＢやエゴたちの在り方……矛盾だらけの在り方……に疑を持ってしまっている。

カズラドロップはおとなしく献身的な性格で、ＡＩとしてg`いのない、完全なかたちにりたがっている。

看o《ナ`ス》をイメ`ジしたアルタ`エゴで、いちばん清楚で幼い。殛L能力こそ皆oだが、ウイルスチェッカ`に特化したＡＩ。バグをおこしたデ`タがo抵抗ならこれを洗筏贰o力化する事ができる。お注射大好きな健康マニアでもある。

……とまあ、ここまでけばなぜ没になったかは明白だ。保健室のg桐@とキャラ属性がかぶっているため、もっとも早くカットされたアルタ`エゴ。

あくまで初期アイデアではあるが、ダンジョン内にはノ`マル@たちが集まる村があり、そこにカズラドロップが住んでいた。

 

カズラ「ようこそ。ここは、g健派の@たちが集まった集落です」

凛「……いくらなんでも人格分裂しすぎよね、この子」

カズラ「わたし_の源である@の滴を元してくれたら、アイテム提供や体力回亭可能ですよ♥」

 

などという超展_。

初期のＣＣＣはサクラメントではなく「@の滴」とよばれるソ`スを集め、保健室の@に投与する事で世界の支配率《シュア》をZい返していく、というものだった。これはその一例。

イデスは『同属嫌』と『インセクトイ`タ`』。

 

Kazuradrop [alter ego] P170

Kazuradrop is one of the Sakura Five that didn’t make it into the game.

She is the Alter Ego of affection.

Unlike the other Alter Egos, she doesn’t hate humans. Conversely she actually questions the contradiction-filled actions of BB and the other Alter Egos.

Kazuradrop is a gentle and quiet girl with a personality that values others over herself. She wants to return to being a complete AI, devoid of the errors that riddle the Alter Egos.

We designed her to be a nurse, so she is always neat and tidy. She is also very young and has absolutely zero combat ability. She is a specialized AI designed to work as a virus scanner. She would fix up or neutralize corrupted data or code that cause bugs. She is a health nut who loves to give her patients injections.

…Well, it’s easy to tell why she was cut after reading this far. She was too similar to Matou Sakura who works in the School Infirmary, so Kazuradrop was cut at a relatively early stage.

One of our ideas in the early games design phase was to have a village located in a dungeon where the various Sakuras would gather. Kazuradrop was supposed to live in that village.

 

Kazuradrop: “Welcome! This is a village where the more moderate minded Sakura gather.”

Rin: “…Don’t you think this girl has gone way too far splitting up her ego?”

Kazuradrop: “If you return to us the Drops of the Sakura we originated from, we will give you items and heal you!”

 

Maybe things would’ve ended up like that.

Originally there was no Sakurament and instead there were “Sakura Drops” which were once part of the source Sakura. By gathering them and trading them for prescriptions from the School Infirmary Sakura you would be able to take back a share of the world and put it under your control. This was one of the methods of doing so.

Kazuradrop’s id_es skills are “Hatred of Brethren” and “Insect Eater.”

 

■ガト`【人物】

本名、P藤T司《がとうもんじ》。

﻿自称、あらゆる宗教を学び、あらゆる神学を走りiけたス`パ`求道僧。

性格は豪快、不屈、そしてg。の通じない、暴走Cvのような人物。古今|西の宗教・神をOめたというが、その根底にあるのは教のようだ。

混迷と消Mのr代において彼なりに真に心を求めたY果がこれ、lからてもうさんくさいエセ坊主のQ生であった。

^酷かつヒッピ`な修行の末、アリゾナで的インスピレ`ションを得た後にヒマラヤ登山にg独挑椤⑸巾付近にて”原始の女”と出会う。

しかし悲しいかな、原初の神性と\遁しながら、人gにはこれを定xする言~がなかった。

ガト`は彼女を新たな女神として布教するため、あんまり好きじゃなかったム`ンセルのTを叩いた

@くべき事にこの男、もう何年も前から秀な人材としてム`ンセルに招かれていたのである。なぜだ。

支x缌绚恃印答o用でuいかかってくる事から野蛮な人物と思われがちだが、ガト`自身は椁い三度のより好きなだけで、⑷耸群盲悉长欷盲荬盲沥獬证梁悉铯护皮い胜ぁ

彼が}杯檎でバ`サ`カ`の如き振る舞いをしているのは、gに『长系工埂椁い摔伽摹护趣いφ胬恧蛱瀣Fしているにすぎない。

出遭う鏊が}杯檎でなければ、ガト`モンジはただうざいだけの、それなりにの分かる好人物となるらしい。

 

◆

                                   

ＣＣＣでも登訾工毳蕙攻咯`。

いち早く生徒会に参加し、事Bの束に努めようとするあたり、さすがのス`パ`求道僧である。Cをるに敏なり、まさにみはエルシャダイ。

レオから暝忾Lの役をもらい、暇をては校hYで薪割りなどもしていたが、ＣＣＣという状rにおいても自分を失わず、自分に出来る事をまっすぐに据えていた。

旧校hでは使命（……原始の女を布教する……）は果たせないため、ガト`は普段の引さがiけ、リラックス状Bにある。皮肉な事に、本筋ではない状rが彼のL所を最大限に引き出す事になった。

表趣扦献苑忠酝猡违蕙攻咯`は长坤盲郡、月のY趣扦し合う理由はない。そんな当たり前の考えをもっとも自然に受け止めていたのはガト`だろう。

余ではあるが、修Ir代に日本の山中にてキアラと出会い、禅答Qをしている。

ある意味o偿ャラなあらあらおさん・キアラを”やばい、この人やばい。マジ通じない”と逃げ腰にさせたのはガト`だけ。ガト`も主人公同、适Г摔瑜辘饯问gを忘れていたのだが。

……このあたりのが取り上げられていたのも、言うまでもなくＣＣＣを起こした何者かの仕Iである。

 

Gatou [character] P170-171

Real Name: Monji Gatou.

Gatou is a self-proclaimed scholar of all religions, and claims to have far surpassed all-known theology; he is a super seeker of the way.

He is a simpleton with a dynamic and unyielding personality. Unable to understand him or to be understood by him, he’s like a runaway train. He claims to have reached the height of knowledge in all religions and mythologies both past and present, and according to him, the core philosophies of them all lie within Buddhism.

In this age of chaos and consumerism he earnestly pursued achieving the merciful heart of a Buddha, and the results lay before you; no matter how you look at it he’s a suspicious phony priest.

After undergoing the “severe training” required to become a hippie, he had a spiritual encounter in Arizona which inspired him to challenge the peaks of the Himalayas alone. Upon reaching the peak of a mountain, he met “the Primeval Woman.”

However, sadly, despite having a chance encounter with this fundamental divine being, there are apparently no human words by which her existence could be described or defined.

In order to introduce her as the Goddess of a new religion, Gatou made a request to Moon Cell, despite him not being too fond of it. You may be surprised to hear that many years ago this guy was introduced to Moon Cell as a highly talented and promising individual. WHY?

 

There is no use arguing the fact that his completely incomprehensible behavior makes people tend to think of him as a savage that might attack them at any time. Gatou loves fighting more than three meals a day; however he has absolutely no desire to kill anyone.

 

The rationale for why he is paired with the likes of Berserker in the Holy Grail War is simply that Berserker is the materialization of his philosophy “Enemies are to be defeated. Battles are to be won.”

If you were to meet Monji Gatou outside of the context of the Holy Grail War, you would just think of him as an annoying, but understanding and good natured guy.

 

◆

 

Gatou is also a Master that shows up in CCC.

He promptly joins the student council and tries to fix the situation, just as expected of a super seeker of the way. He is quick to jump at every opportunity, and his only worry is about El Shaddai (God Almighty).

Leo makes him the pep rally leader, and in his free time after school you can find him behind the school building practicing cheers with several groups. Regardless of the situation in CCC, Gatou doesn’t lose sight of himself, and does whatever he can to the best of his ability.

He is unable to carry out his mission (…of spreading the religion of the primeval woman), so he is far more relaxed than usual. Ironically, he is unable to act on his strong points despite being in such a situation.

Of course on the surface he considers all Masters to be his enemies, but deep down he finds there to be no reason to kill each other on the far side of the moon. This natural way of thinking is representative of Gatou.

This is digression, but during the days of his training he met Kiara at the top of a mountain in Japan. Kiara, a ditzy older sister type who is more or less invincible, was scared off by Gatou. She ran away saying “What the heck!? This guy is too much. Communication with him is impossible.” Gatou is the only one to have accomplished the feat of scaring her off. Just like the protagonist, in CCC Gatou has also lost his memories, including his memories of this incident with Kiara. …Of course it goes without saying that the loss of memories and the amnesia is due to the meddling of a certain someone in CCC.

 

■カルナ【サ`ヴァント】

ＣＣＣで登訾工毳旦`ヴァント。

クラスはランサ`なのだが、マスタ`であるジナコがLす荬oいので真名で呼ばれる事に。

カルナはインドの叙事『マハ`バ`ラタ』に登訾工搿⒌工丹欷趣斡⑿邸

大英雄アルジュナの弓によって最期を迎えるが、その在り方はgなではなく、アルジュナと椁\命にあった大な长趣筏泼瑜れている。

~世の美男子だが、その目つきはく、他人を寄せ付けないものがある。

长摔先萆猡胜o慈悲であり、その言婴庥喾证胜猡韦なく、人g性を感じさせない。

幽鬼のような白い肌と不吉な\装束から、これほど役にられやすいサ～ヴァントもそうはいない。

が、gはたいへん思]深い、人g的にれた人物。

たいていの事を「なるほど、そちらの事情なのだな」と受け入れ、それもあり、とJめるt人。

位置的には中庸なのだが、善である事を良しとするので性格は善。自己主が乏しいかわりに、父（太神）の威光を守る事を至上としている。

 

﻿カルナが『』と勘`いされる最大の要因として、その台~回しがある。

カルナの言婴媳举|を突く。

自らを韦盲垦印Ｈ・昕うB度、信念。

そういったものをiいて、率直に相手が言われたくない本|をZってしまう。Y果、たいていの相手に嫌われてしまい、殛Lを余xなくされる。

激高した相手をなだめられるほど器用ではないカルナは、o言で「仕方あるまい」とを手にし、相手がBめるまで椁い烁钉合う事になる。

人それぞれの立ち位置を肯定するカルナにとって、相容れぬ信念も、理解できない美hも、嫌の象にはならない。

「それもまた良しだ。……いや。正直、少しばかりwましい」

とJめてしまう程である。

しかし、o口なカルナはその”本当に护à毪伽感想”を出せないため、Y果として”あらゆるものを嫌っている”ように勘`いされてしまう。

これ以上ない忠犬サ`ヴァントなのだが、长悉ろかマスタ`にすら嫌われてしまうのは、このロベたさが原因だろう。

 

◆

 

サ`ヴァントとしてジナコと契sしたが、これといったいはない。彼はただ、自らを呼び出し、必要としたマスタ`に仕えるのみである。

父が太神ス`リヤという事もあり、その能力は特Ａランク。破格の英ギルガメッシュと肩をKべる、力o比なサ`ヴァントだ。

もっともマスタ`であるジナコが三流なので、その力は十全にk]されない。彼はＣＣＣに登訾筏皮いr点で、もっとも大きな武具を失っているのだから。

サ`ヴァント椁摔いては文句なしの场

前半のラストに立ちはだかるボスという事もあり、R倒的火力をFる。

上空からの爆・『梵天よ、我を猡《ブラフマ`ストラ・クンダ`ラ》』は核爆ではなくなったものの、攻膜蜗堕gに落ちてくるというデタラメ仕で、きのこもテストプレイでされた。マジしにきている。

あと目からビ`ムが出るが、あれは眼力（めじから）を的に表Fしたものであり、ビ`ムではない。

「武具などo。真の英雄は眼です……！」

というのが正式な台~。ちょいシャクに入らなかったので、前半ボイスはカットされた。とことんメンズナックル系の男である。

 

Karna [servant] P171-172

Karna is a Servant that appears in CCC.

His class is Lancer, but his Master Jinako has no desire to hide his true name, so he is usually called Karna.

Karna is a character from the India epic Mahabharata, and he is a hero belonging to the side that is defeated in battle.

He was put down by an arrow from the great hero Arjuna, however his existence was not necessarily an evil one, he was simply fated to fight Arjuna, and he is depicted as a significant enemy.

 

Despite being a handsome man who looks go unrivaled across the land, he is a man with sharp eyes and has an unapproachable aura.

Merciless to his enemies, his words and actions contain not an iota of superfluity. He doesn’t let you sense any humanity within him.

With skin as white as a ghost, and his ominous pitch-black clothes, there is no other Servant that appears as evil as he does.

But actually, he is an extremely considerate and compassionate character.

In response to most issues he says “I see. So that’s what’s happening.” and wisely accepts that what the person says is indeed possible.

His alignment is neutral, but he agrees with things that are good, so his personality is good. He doesn’t express himself very well, but he considers the protection of his father’s (the Hindu Sun God) authority to be of utmost importance.

Karna is often misunderstood as “evil” because of the way he speaks. Karna’s actions and words are always striking at the essence of things.

There are people who are fakers, or who just say things to maintain appearances, or who lie about their beliefs.

He sees through them all, and candidly jabs at the true nature which those people did not want to reveal. The result is, of course, being hated by most he meets, which unavoidably breeds combat.

Lacking the finesse required to calm the people that his words have enraged, he silently takes up his lance and accompanies them in combat until they give up.

He doesn’t dislike people with incompatible beliefs or whom he can’t understand, because Karna is a proponent of the idea that everyone has their own circumstances. He takes this to the point of, “That’s also okay… actually, to be honest, I’m a little jealous.”

However, the untalkative Karna doesn’t often say what really needs to be said, thus he comes off as hating all things despite that being far from the truth.

Though he is the most obedient and tame Servant of all, due to his choice of words, he is hated not only by his enemies, but even by his Master.

 

◆

 

As a Servant he is bound by his contract with Jinako, however he has no specific wish of his own. He simply wanted to serve a Master who made the effort to summon him in their time of need. His father is the Hindu Sun God, Surya, so his power level is Rank A+.  His is shoulder to shoulder with the exceptional Gilgamesh.

He is an incomparably strong servant.

Since Jinako is a third rate Master, his full potential is not drawn out. This is largely because by the time he makes his appearance in CCC he has already lost his greatest weapon.

 

As far as Servant battles go there is no complaint about this admirable foe.

Towards the end of the first half, he confronts you as a boss, and brandishes overpowering flames. His attack from the sky “Brahmastra Kundala” is a bullshit attack which despite being nerfed from its former nuclear bomb tier power, still wreaks havoc with bombs falling from the sky during the time between attack rounds. Even Kinoko Nasu was killed by this attack when testing the game. Karna is seriously trying to kill you.

Beams also shoot from his eyes, but it’s actually just a visual representation of the power of his gaze. “Weapons are so boorish. Real heroes kill with their eyes…!” is an actual line of his. Unfortunately due to the limited amount of data that can be used for the game, the first half of this voice line just barely failed to meet the cut. A “Men’s Knuckle” type of guy. [TL NOTE: Men’s Knuckle is a Japanese fashion magazine that features a male-gal (gyaru) style. This style involves preppy street clothes and lots of accessories (earrings, necklaces, bracelets, etc.). Also known as Onii-kei style.]

 

[TL NOTE: for the “Rank A+” part above, the Japanese says  “特A Rank” which could be any of A+, Special A Rank, or EX A Rank. I’m not sure which is most appropriate.]

 

■Oz城チェイテ【武器名】

赤ランサ`こと、エリザベ`トが塾盲工の名称。

ほとんどg器のような形状のだが、あれは彼女が生前に^ごした城・チェイテ城を武器化したもの。

高い力を持つが、この魔の恐ろしさは他にある。者の皆さまはから伸びているコ`ドにお荬扭だろうか。

そう。そうなのである。@くべき事に、このにはマイク、アンプ、スモ`ク、ライト、マネ`ジャ`、音O督、マニュピレイタ`等、ステ`ジ活婴吮匾なC能がすべて浃铯盲皮い毪韦坤盲俊…！

（※スタッフはチェイテ城に囚われた、ワ`カ`ホリックなゴ`ストの皆さんです）

更に更に、宝具・r血魔荬蛘归_するr、チェイテ城はかつての威容を取りし、巨大なスピ`カ`と化してエリザベ`トの美声を爆布（爆k的なシングルCDの配布、の略）せしめる。

赤セイバ`に黄金訾あるのなら、赤ランサ`にはOz城あり。ジェイルロックの精神はSE.RA.PHにおいても受け@がれているのであった。

 

Prison Castle Čachtice (Prison Castle Csejte) [weapon name] P172

This is Red Lancer’s (Elizabeth) beloved lance.

The lance is essentially a blunt weapon, and is actually the castle that she was imprisoned in before her death which has been turned into a weapon. It has great potential as a lethal weapon; however it’s most frightening aspect lies elsewhere.

I’m sure that all of you who have played the game have noticed the cord that extends out from the lance.

Yes, that’s it! Surprisingly this lance is equipped with a microphone, an amp, a smoke machine, lights, a manager, an audio director, an audio manipulator and more! Everything needed for a live performance.  (The staff comprises of workaholic ghosts that were imprisoned in Čachtice.)

But wait, there’s more! When the “Fresh Blood Princess” Noble Phantasm is activated, the castle regains its former glory and transforms into a giant speaker and delivers an explosion of Elizabeth’s beautiful voice across the land! (It also distributes the CD of her explosively awesome singing.)

Just as Red Saber has the Golden Theater, Red Lancer has the Prison Castle. The locked-in-a-jail mentality must be inherited from SE.RA.PH.

 

■技g鼋Y【事柄】

１９７０年から技gMiが滞っているのは、西欧yによる制行椁趣丹欷皮い搿

航空技g、宇宙_kはその最たるもの。eみ重ねられた技gのMiは少しずつあるものの、ブレイクスル`を促す天才はFれない。

また、兵器のMiもY源が激pしたため、2000﻿年から^打ちとなっている。

檎のメインが椁摔胜盲郡趣いΔ韦獯螭い。

ネットワ`ク上から都市の\C能を破菠贰⑨幛显始的なテロ活婴艘菩肖工搿…というのがこのr代の檎である。皮肉なだが、コストもかからずh境も破菠筏胜る椁系厍颏しい檎と言える。

 

Frozen Technology [concept] P172-173

This refers to how technology development has stagnated since 1970 due to restrictions and regulations enforced by the West Europe Plutocracy.

Aerospace industry development is especially restricted. Despite there being a slow trickle of advancement and new technology, no genius talent has appeared with a breakthrough.

Furthermore, the development of weapons has led to an extreme decrease in the availability of resources, which peaked in the year 2000.

Another significant difference [in the alternate world of EXTRA] is that cyber attacks are a staple of war.

The face of modern war is characterized by attackers using the network to destroy the management capabilities of cities and then they proceed to carry out primitive terrorist-style attacks. Ironically, cyber attacks don’t cost much and do no harm to the environment. It’s not too much to say that cyber warfare is environmentally friendly.

 

■疑似子【事柄】

ぎじりょうし。

かつて、地上には魂の物|化をはかる奇があったという。しかしそれは１９７０年代の大崩菠鞘Г铯欷俊Ｒ葬帷⒆预椁谓Kわりを受け入れた魔gたちは禁忌としていた近代科学を取り入れ、そのKわりに、”魂”を新しく定xした。

それが魔g理・疑似子と呼ばれる、”意Rの出力先”である。

かつて、意Rは肉体を通してしかk露できなかった。

しかし魔gたちは”魂”の位置をy定し、その出力先を新しい天地───空gの分身《アパタ`》として写し出す事に成功したのだ。

これによって魔gは子世界に己をそのまま移させ、より高度な情笕〉没婴蚩赡埭趣筏俊

もともと魂は高次元のエネルギ`体であり、情竺教澶趣筏皮猡郡い丐れていたのである。

この理のk表に伴い、新世界ではネットワ:ク技gだけが大きくM展した。

事bIはFg世界での兵器_kを鼋Yされた代わりに、世界において有郡趣胜氡器_kにいそしむ事となった。

 

Virtual Spiritrons [circumstances] P173

Giji Ryoushi.

In the past there was a miracle discovery that allowed the materialization of the soul. But this technique was lost in the Great Collapse of the 1970s. After that, Magus, who were faced with the end of magic (and thus the end of “Magus”) turned to modern technology and used it to redefine how humans thought of “the soul.”

This is the research that ended up as “Magic Theory of Virtual Spiritrons” which revealed the “output of one’s consciousness.”

Before, consciousness was thought to only manifest through a physical body. But Magus managed to measure the position of “the soul” and redirect its output into a new world; the cyber world. They succeeded in allowing one to create a digital copy of themselves (a bunshin).

After this Magus could transfer themselves into the digital world and carry out higher level information gathering.

The soul is a energy body that resides in a higher dimension, and is actually an unbelievably excellent information medium.

After the announcement and presentation of this theory, in the new world the only technologies that advanced any further than their present state were network related technologies, which developed greatly.

The military industrial complex put a freeze on the development of real world weapons, and turned to developing effective cyber attacks.

 

■疑似子コンピュ`タ`【事柄】

魔g理・疑似子によって作られた子を使い、完成したス`パ`コンピュ`タ`。

C械の魂を定xし、その子を用いて高速演算を可能とする装置。

高次元にある魂を主Sにした、K行世界にある”もの”をTしてのK行K列演算装置。

初期型の完成は１９８０年。

その演算能力は２０３０年に完成予定とされていた量子コンピュ`タ`と同模が、これを上回るという。

（量子コンピュ`タ`そのものは西欧yによって1999年に_kを鼋Y鼋Yさせられている）

国B主Г翁C……人趣らの月への侵入はこの疑似子コンピュ`タ`のバックアップがあってはじめて成功した。

また、ム`ンセルから直接招かれる龊悉eで、当事者がm同すれば安なインタ`フェイスでも月に『落ちる』事が可能である。

……もっとも。その先にあるものは、僬咭酝猡仙できないデスゲ`ムであるのだが。

 

Virtual Spiritron Computer [circumstances] P173

This is a super computer that was created using spiritrons made based on the Magic Theory of Virtual Spiritrons.

It is a machine that uses spiritrons created from a soul defined as a machine. The use of spiritrons makes high speed computation possible.

The Virtual Spiritron Computer is a parallel computation device that uses the soul (which resides in a higher dimension) as its axis to activate a “something” which lies in a parallel world.

The first version of the Virtual Spiritron Computer was completed in 1980.

Its processing power was so great that it even surpassed the expected processing power of a quantum computer that would finish being developed and built in 2030. (Quantum computer development was frozen by the West Europe Plutocracy in 1999.)

The United Nations led investigation unit first managed to infiltrate the Moon with the assistance of this Virtual Spiritron Computer.

It stands to mention that if Moon Cell directly invites someone, if they accept its invitation they will be able to “fall” to the Moon even using a cheap cyber interface.

…okay then.

Of course accepting Moon Cell’s invitation leads to participation in a death game where only the ultimate victor will be able to return alive.

 

■キャスタ`（狐（きつね））【サ`ヴァント】

主人公と契sするメインサ`ヴァントのひとり。

たやさぬ笑とおしゃまな毒舌、ピンとはった狐耳がトレ`ドマ`クの美女。通称キャス狐《こ》。

魔g《キャスタ`》のクラス通り、庑gをメインに使う和Lサ`ヴァント。バリバリ猡Δ兢谩

一人称は『私《ワタクシ》』。ギャルギャルしくZけたり、思いっきりぶりっ娘のrは『アタシ』。

Fateでは珍しい、これでもか、というくらいマスタ`にぞっこんなサ`ヴァント。

目摔现魅斯の妻になること。簸淠康膜扦悉胜い趣长恧Fg的でたいへんコワ可郅ぁ

普段は天荬つ恋《コイバナ》しかしない、自他共にJめるギャル系サ`ヴァントだが、根はリアリストで合理的……神とはシステム的なもの……なので、rたま、さらっと真理を射る台~をこぼす。

赤セイバ`曰く、

「キャス狐はハレンチを萑・盲皮い毪坤堡恰⒏は《さと》い女」とかなんとか。

 

その正体は反英であり、神クラス……というか、ほとんど神さまである。

力を失っているので人gの英レベルであるが、尾をやし、格を最高まで上げた龊稀⑷碎gの知﻿では全容がyれないほどのモノとなる。

それも当然、彼女の大本（おおもと）は日を奉ったモノ。その存在模は太と同xなのだから。

ちなみに尾を一本取りすたび、キャス狐の力は九倍になっていく。マックス状Bである九尾にもなれば、その数は九の九\。

にＡランクサ`ヴァントの能力数を100（宝具のぞく）とすると、一尾キャス狐の能力数を9ぐらい。一尾ではこの通り、どうあってもＡランクには伽皮胜ぅャス狐だが、尾をやしていくと……いや、比^するのもR鹿らしい。

Lすべき真名をあっさり明かしたり、}杯檎にd味がなかったり、そもそも世界をQる点が`ったり、と他の英たちとは一を画するチ`トキャラでもある。自然F象の具F───神クラスのモノがなぜ格を下げて人gの真似事をしているかについては本のスペシャルマイル`ムを参照のこと。

 

しかし、そこまでの神クラスなのにゲ`ム中での性能は最弱。宝具は使えないわ、装甲なので油断すればあっさりゲ`ムオ`バ`という地z仕。おZ染みのO定だけなら最キャラですね、分かります。

キャス狐をxぶプレイヤ`は、それこそ黄泉の比良坂を登るぐらいの悟を持ってもらいたい。

反面、パラメ`タ`が化された後半はj~・ボスとわず完伽扦るキャラにある。魂の改Zはとにかく魔力を重点的にえるンだ！

好きな物は温泉旅行（温泉ではない）、矍榱侠恚à蛘{理しているr）、自分へのプレゼント。

嫌いな物は犬、半端なイケメン、二人のrgを邪魔するもの。

苦手なものは100%天然の郅丹欹ャラ。ハンパな天然キャラである自分じゃあ伽皮胜い人激ぶっているらしい。^去に何があった、キャス狐。

 

◆

 

ＣＣＣではSMルックなボンテ`ジ／ゴシックドレスで登觥％ぅ浃饯Δ艘えて本人はノリノリ、可郅しならなんでもコ`イ！という有。数少ない和Lサ`ヴァントとしての衿持なぞ、スイ`ツ英は持ち合わせてはいないのだった。

ＣＣＣでのライバルはパッションリップ。

ただでさえ殴られたらl死のキャス狐にとって、一膜未螭いリップはまさに即死モンスタ`。

加えてヤンデレから卒Iしたものとして、リップの野狭窄はイライラするものがあるようだ。

また、キャス狐といえばサ`ヴァントＥＮＤの遇っぷりも外せない。

まさかの二枚イベント画という暴ぁ…ッ！

l特感ハンパない最後の一枚……ッ！

しかも男女差分付き……ッ！

当初の予定では「はい、あ`ん♥」のイベント画は存在しなかったが、_kスタッフでを合わせ、「最後のイベント画がタマモナインでKわるのはいかがなものか」とY。

予算もrgもとっくに食いつぶした状Bでワダアルコさんにご相したところ、「はい、あ`んり」をなんとかしてくれたのであった。

 

Playable Caster (Kitsune) [servant] P173-174

Caster is one of the main Servants who can make a contract with the main protagonist.

She is always smiling and has quite the precocious tongue. She is the trademark beauty of Extra with those lovely fox ears. She is usually called Cas-ko.

Just as the class name Caster implies, she is a magic user. She also features a Japanese-style design. “I’m gonna zap you ☆!”

She refers to herself with 私 (watakushi). She is unreserved like a gal (gyaru), and when trying to be cute for a boy she uses アタシ (atashi).

Unusual for a Fate game, she is so smitten with the protagonist that you might do a double take,

“Damn they even put this in?”

Her goal is to become the protagonist’s wife. She’s a realist and also devilishly cute in all areas unrelated to her goals or dreams.

She has a carefree attitude and always has love on the mind. She is an admittedly gal-esque Servant. However, fundamentally she is a logical realist. For example, she treats “god” as a system like existence. Sometimes this trips her up and she blurts out lines which don’t suit her usual carefree mentality.

According to Red Saber “She puts up a loose airhead front, but that girl’s true nature is really sharp.”

 

Cas-ko’s true form is an anti-heroic spirit, God-class… she is more or less a god.

Having lost most of her power, she is now on the same level as other human heroic spirits, however when the number of her tails increases and her spirit rank goes up to the highest level, it’s impossible for humans to comprehend her full power.

This is only natural, as the foundation of her being came from an offering to the sun. Thus, the scale of her existence is equivalent to that of the sun.

By the way, for each tail that returns, Cas-ko’s power increases by 9x. This means that in her max power state with all nine tails her power has increased by 99.

 

Supposing that we represent an A rank Servant with a numerical power level of, say, 100 (not including Noble Phantasms), Cas-ko with 1 tail has a power of about 9, and as you can see could never defeat an A rank Servant. But, as the number of tails increases… well it’s silly to even try comparing.

Her true name, which is something that should remain a secret, is quickly revealed from the start of the game. Having no interest in the Holy Grail War, and with a unique perspective of the world, she is clearly different from the other servants. Not to mention she is essentially a cheat character. She is the embodiment of a natural phenomenon: a god-class spirit. Why does she posses such a low spirit rank in game? Why does her behavior mimic that of humans? Please refer to her Special My Room to find out.

 

Despite being such a great god-class spirit, in the game she is the weakest Servant.

With her paper thin armor and inability to use Noble Phantasms it’s an easy game-over if you let your guard down. I understand, I understand, if only the setting had been made so that she was your childhood friend, then she would’ve truly been the best character, right!?

In any case, I would like players who choose Cas-ko to have the resolve to surmount the border of life and death.

On the other hand, after Cas-ko’s stats are upgraded, the second half of the game is a sure-victory cakewalk, regardless if the enemy is a weakling or a boss. The alteration of her soul boosts her magic power like crazy!

She likes trips to hot spring resorts (but not hot spring baths), and love-filled cooking (at least while doing the cooking), and giving presents to herself.

She hates dogs, only somewhat handsome guys, and people who disrupt her time alone with her Master.

She’s not too fond of loveable 100% airhead characters. She seems to have well learned the lesson that her half-baked airhead act never seems to come out ahead of the real deal. Dear Cas-ko, what happened in your past?

 

◆

 

In CCC Cas-ko appears featuring an S&M bondage style + Goth Loli dress fusion design.

Even though she puts up a front pretending to dislike her attire she actually loves it, “As long as it’s cute, anything’s okay!”

The Heroic Spirit of Sweets doesn’t have the same pride that the other few Japanese style Servants do.

In CCC her rival is Passionlip.

Under normal circumstances Cas-ko is on the verge of death after taking a normal punch attack, so Passionlip’s huge one-shot lip attack means that she is an instant death monster as far as Cas-ko is concerned.

Furthermore, it seems that a narrow-minded tendency lingers from Passionlip’s yandere past, and this can prove to be quite irritating to Cas-ko.

Also, when talking about Cas-ko it’s impossible to skip over the amazing preferential treatment we gave her ending.

Who who imagine that she’d get a two CG ending event!? What is this recklessness?

And that ultra special final CG!!

Not to mention the ending differs depending on whether your character is male or female!

The “Say Aahhh” ending CG wasn’t in the plan from start, but after a developer meeting it was decided that the final event CG would be the Tamamo Nine. At that point we were short on time and budget but after consulting with Wada Arco we were able to make something out of nothing and helped us realize the “Say Aahhh” ending CG.

 

■キャスタ`（アリス）【サ`ヴァント】

さんせんめの、サ`ヴァント。

ワタシはアナタ、アナタはワタシ。

名前も忘れたアナタのために、

アナタの姿をそっくり映す。

ワタシの名前はわらべ歌。

トミ`サムの可郅そ}本。

マザ`グ`スのさいしょのカタチ。

粢るアナタとワタシのために、

夜が明けるまで浪漫w行。

ああ、でもN降Cが降りていく。

簸谓Kわりがやってくる。

ありすのKわりがやってくる。

物Zである以上、Kわりがくるのはあたりまえ。

寂しいアナタに悲しいワタシ。

最期の望みを、叶えましょう───

 

◆

 

ナ`サリ`ライムはg在の英雄ではなく、g在する}本のt称である。

イギリスで深く郅丹欷郡长违弗悭螗毪稀⒍啶の子供たちの簸蚴埭敝工幛皮いうちに一つの概念として成立、”子供たちの英雄”としてサ`ヴァント化した。

（のちにルイスキャロルという有名な作家を生み出す下地になったもの。彼の著作「不思hの国のアリス」は、もともとは彼の─米婴郡沥思磁dでかせたナ`サリ`ライムである）

サ`ヴァントそのものが固有Y界であり、マスタ`の心を映し、マスタ`が粢たカタチの疑似サ`ヴァントを作り上げる。

このサ`ヴァントはひとりの悲惨な少女を救ったが、同rに、常に何者でもない、Rであるこのサ`ヴァント自身も救われていた。……たとえそれが、砂糖子のように脆く、意味のない事だとしても。

また、上にある散文テキストはゲ`ム本におけるマトリクス「：１」と同じもの。

ありすとのQ榍啊「相手の真名当てイベント」の後に_示されるのだが、ここで言う「最期の望み」はありすの生前の望みではなく、死後、ゴ`ストとなった後の望みを指している。

 

Caster (Alice) [servant] P174

This is Sansenme’s Servant Caster.

I am you, and you are I.

For you who have even forgotten your own name,

I will mimic your exact appearance.

My name is Nursery Rhyme.

Tommy Thumbs’s cute picture book.

The very first version of Mother Goose.

A romantic flight that continues through the night,

For the you and I who are dreaming.

Ahh, but alas the elevator descends.

The end of the dream has come along.

The end of Alice has come along.

This is a story, so of course it has an end.

 

The lonely you and the sad me.

Let us grant our final wish.

 

◆

 

Nursery Rhyme is not a true heroic spirit; she is the manifestation of a real picture book.

The picture book genre, which is deeply loved in England, has stimulated the dreams of many a child. Nursery Rhyme is essentially a heroic spirit born from children; by children and for children. (Nursery Rhyme is the book which eventually became the foundation for Lewis Caroll’s famous works. One of his great works, Alice in Wonderland, is actually a nursery rhyme he improvised while entertaining his nieces.)

The Servant Nursery Rhyme is actually a pseudo-Servant dreamt up by her Master. She is a Reality Marble that embodies a reflection of her Master’s feelings.

This servant managed to save her miserable Master, yet at the same time she is not her own person, just a mirror image who was also saving herself. …this fragile balance…is it meaningless?

Also the prose poetry included above is the same as in the game’s “Matrix Details:1” section.

Before the final battle with Alice there is the “Let’s guess their true name!” event, and after that the poem is displayed. In the poem, the line “Let us grant our final wish.” is a reference to a desire of Alice’s that is not from when she was alive, but rather from after her death when she became a ghost.

 

■旧校h【地形】

ＣＣＣでの主人公たちのホ`ム。

月のY趣摔ける唯一の安全地・趣筏途・利用されている。

はるか以前の}杯檎で使われていたが、老朽化したために破されたフリ`スペ`ス。

旧校hは性情螭魏￥韦郡乐肖烁・ぶ潜水のようなもの。

破されたとはいえ}杯檎の会訾坤盲郡韦恰⑿Ｅhには数十人のサ`ヴァんとをS持するだけの子ソ`スが残されていた。

保健室の@はこのパワ`ソ`スを校hを守るバリアとして使用、校h内をg数空gのル`ルに保っている。

……余ではあるが、ＣＣＣ_k当r、ゲ`ムの舞台は”ノイズに浸食されたEXTRA校h”だったが、それでは新しさがない、という事でノスタルジックな旧校hに涓された。

 

Old School Building [location] P175

This is the protagonist’s home base in CCC.

The building is restored and used by the protagonist, and it is the only safe area on the far side of the Moon.

It is a building that was used during a Holy Grail War that took place long ago; it was abandoned after falling into disrepair. The Old School Building is like a submarine floating in the middle of an ocean of malicious information and data.

Regardless of the fact it was abandoned, it was once the site of a Holy Grail War, so it remains a spiritron source capable of supporting the needs of tens of Servants.

The Sakura in the school infirmary uses the school’s spiritron power as a barrier to protect the school and to maintain the fundamental rules and order of a real world environment inside the school.

…To digress, during the development of CCC the setting was going to be “the EXTRA school building being eaten away at by glitches” but there was no novelty in this idea, so we changed to the nostalgic Old School Building.

 

■ギルガメッシュ【サ`ヴァント】

ＣＣＣで追加されたメインサ`ヴァント。

人最古の英雄で、o元前、シュメ`ルの都市国家ウルクを治めていた半神半人の王。

性酷薄（せいこくはく）にしてo情。人の意をき届けず、己の基胜韦撙蚪~とする暴君。

tア`チャ`同、コイツも今までさんざん解hしつくしているため、特にZるべき事はない。

基本性能・O定はEXTRA用にチュ`ニングされているが、基本いつも通りのギル。

A美きわまりない黄金の甲伽蛘F示し、ありあまる宝を水のように放出する破格の英。

一人称は『我』といて『オレ』とiむ。

性|《アライメント》は混沌。善。

血も妞猡胜け┚であり、あらゆる宝・あらゆる悦Sを究め、Sしんだ英雄。

莘治荬扦悉るが、莘证い、という理由で手を下す事は（あまり）ない。

彼が人をめるrは、相手の魂がhであるrか、そのものがギルガメッシュにしたrである。

 

善もも等しくQい、断罪する王。

~的な基胜『自分』なので、他人の思想、在り方に共感する事はない。

ギルガメッシュにとって生命とは『今すぐ死ぬ』か『いずれ死ぬ』ものでしかない。

ギルガメッシュが『今すぐ死ぬべき命』とJめれば、t者であろうと抹される。

「なにそれ、ル`ルとか拘りとかなくて、Y局そのrのギルガメッシュの莘证よ！」とツッコミをいれたいのはもっともだが、王とはそのようなもの。

宇宙の真理と同一したかの如き英断も、

Eっぱらって前後不のrの政も、

 

﻿彼が行うのなられもない王の裁定となる。

~王者とはそういうものだ。

唯我独尊、という点ではイスカンダルと同一されるが、ギルガメッシュとイスカンダルの最大の`いは臣下を必要としていないこと。

ギルガメッシュは最初から最後まで『己』だけで君Rする王。彼が郅工毪猡韦稀贺宝』『道具』であり、『人』は消え去るものでしかない。

……たとえそれが、どれほど郅工毪するものと、Jめた後であろうとも。

 

また、ＣＣＣのテ`マ的に女性}は避けられない。

ギルの好みのタイプは「崇高なI女《オトメ》」である。（子ギルのrは「野にDく花」）

男性に依存しつつも、その内面では男性を利用する女性を嫌う。要は『女らしい』女性を嫌う。

 

◆

 

ム`ンセルはサ`ヴァントとして彼を再B・Fさせたが、Qいきれずに月のY趣朔庥・筏皮い俊

ギルガメッシュ自身も}杯檎に意xをいだしていなかったので、落とされた先の暗（性情螅─饲尬荬蜃鳏辍⑼の簸宋⑺んでいた。

他のサ`ヴァントと`い、マスタ`と契sする荬ない。lの味方でもなく、lも必要としない唯我独尊なぐうたらタイムを摔筏皮い郡、奈落に落ちてきた愚者（主人公）の镅预わりとツボだったので目をまし、ちょっとちょっかいを出してみた、というのが事の始まり。

o限に近いrg、奈落で微睡んでいたため、心身共になまりきっている。

今回こそ慢心しないと思ったら、そもそもデフォルト状Bが慢心だった。←new!

サ`ヴァントy易度はチ`ト性能とあるが、その宝具解禁までは赤セイバ`とどっこいのy易度。

しかし宝具のダメ`ジはマジキチレベルなので、なんつ`か、今から後半のゲ`ムバランスが心配です。

ギルの攻摹相手は死ぬ、なんて酷い事Bになるかもしれない。

こんなＡＵＯだが、味方サ`ヴァントである以上、いつかは主人公と信mvSをBき合う事になって、jしながらＳＧを解放するrもあるだろう。

また、EXTRA世界では受肉していないため、そのr代の文明性に偏ってはいない。ＣＣＣでは神r代の、ニュ`トラルなギルガメッシュの素を垣gることができる。

 

Gilgamesh [servant] P175-176

Gilgamesh is one of the main Servants newly made available in CCC.

He is a demigod who is the most ancient hero in human history. His origins go back to before the common era. He ruled the Sumerian city of Uruk.

Gilgamesh is ruthless and unfeeling. He is a tyrant who considers his own standards and rules to be absolute above all, so he has no ear for the opinion of humans.

Like Red Archer, this guy has also been explained to death in various Type-Moon works, so there isn’t much in specific to talk about here.

His standard powers, abilities, and character setting have been tuned a bit to fit into the EXTRA world, but he is more or less the same Gil as always.

He is an exceptional Heroic Spirit who proudly flaunts his ornate golden armor. He uses his overly abundant treasures and wealth as if he is trying to get rid of them.

He refers to himself with オレ(ore) but writes it as 我 (which is usually pronounced ware, but Gil pronounces it ore).

His alignment is chaotic good.

He is a cold-blooded tyrant who has had a fun life pursuing all the world’s treasures and pleasures to the limit.

He is a temperamental person, but he doesn’t (usually) doll out the pain simply because he is in a bad mood.

When he does end someone’s life, it’s because they have a disgusting evil soul, or because they are trying to oppose him.

 

He is a King who lays down judgment equally to all, regardless if they are good or evil.

His absolute standards all revolved around “himself” so he has no sympathy or consideration for the ideas of others.

As far as Gilgamesh is concerned, life is only ever “something that will die right now” or “something that will eventually die.”

If Gilgamesh decides that you are “a life that should die now” it doesn’t matter if you are a wise old man, you’ll be slaughtered.

“What the heck!? So basically you’re just saying that he pays no heed to his rules or conditions, and it all depends on how Gilgamesh is feeling that day!” It’s unavoidable that you want to point this out, but that’s just how being a King is.

Whether his judgment aligns perfectly with the truth of the universe, or he abuses his power in a drunken stupor, whatever he does, his actions as King are indisputable.

This is what it means to be an absolute ruler.

Some may see Gilgamesh’s very egocentric nature as similar to Iskandar’s, but there is one respect in which the two differ greatly. Gilgamesh has no need for vassals.

Gilgamesh is a king who reigns alone from start to finish. He loves “treasure” and “tools.” While “people” are simply things that will eventually disappear.

...No matter how worthy of love that a person may be. No matter if he recognizes they are worthy of love.

 

Also, as far as Gilgamesh’s relationship with CCC’s theme is concerned, girl problems can’t be avoided (he can’t easily find a girl he likes). Gil’s type of woman is a “noble maiden” (When he appears as Young Gil her prefers “wildflower” type girls).

He hates women who, despite continually depending on men, try to manipulate and use men. In other words he dislikes “girlish” women.

 

◆

 

Moon Cell reincarnated Gilgamesh after reconstructing him, but Gilgamesh was still unable to be controlled, so Moon Cell sealed him away by sending him to the far side of the Moon.

Gilgamesh didn’t see there being any meaning in the Holy Grail War, so somewhere in the darkness of the far side of the Moon (the sea of corrupted information) he made himself a room to sleep and dozed away to his degenerate dreams.

Unlike the other Servants, Gilgamesh has no intention of making a contract with a Master. Ally of no one. Needed by no one. Perfectly happy idling his time away. However, the fool (the protagonist) who fell down into the hell that is the far side of the Moon spouted some falsehoods that were quite amusing to Gil, so he woke from his slumber to interfere a bit. That’s what started their relationship.

Since Gil had been dozing off in hell for a nearly infinite amount of time, both his body and mind were rusty.

Some players might think that Gil is finally making an appearance without his conceited attitude, but that attitude is part of his default character (I’m sure you didn’t know...).

The difficult of clearing the game with each Servant depends on their “cheatability.”  As far as Gil is concerned, until his cheat-tier Noble Phantasm is unlocked, the game is about the same difficulty as when using Red Saber.

His Noble Phantasm causes an insane amount of damage, to the point where I’m rather worried about the balance of the latter half of the game.

Battles might end up being pretty bad if they are just Gil attacks = enemy insta-dead.

 

So that’s pretty much the story about our AUO (TLN: sounds like eiyuuou 英雄王 = King of Heroes). Since he is an allied Servant, his relationship with the protagonist eventually reaches the point of mutual trust, and after engaging in some casual chit-chat his Secret Garden will become available to you.

Also, since Gil has not been incarnated into the alternate history world of EXTRA, the modern civilization of EXTRA has not influenced him in the slightest. In CCC he appears as a more neutral incarnation based on the Age of Epics version of Gilgamesh, and one might occasionally see his more casual, personal side.

 

■キングプロテア【アルタ`エゴ】

gFしなかったサクラファイブの一人。

f郅违ルタ`エゴ。

サクラファイブの中でも最下婴挝恢盲扭堡扦りながら、SE.RA.PH最の存在でもある。

イデススキル『ヒュ`ジスケ`ル』を持つでか@。

Lrg迷mにいるとFれるお邪魔キャラで、通路を菠筏胜らMむ永久パタ`ン防止キャラ。んでダンジョン破菠趣バカ可郅ぁ

アリ`ナの通路の外、海を泳いでやってくる白Lのようなもの。まんまワンダと巨像の巨像、ダライアスの巨大榕である。物Zを盛り上げるのではなく、ゲ`ムデザインを盛り上げるキャラとして用意された。

例えばアリ`ナ内において、

『奥にアイテムフォルダがえるけど、巨大な手が邪魔して通れない』、

『箱のような透明の容器にみっちりとサクラがつまっていて通れない』、

等々、色々な『肉壁』ギミックを用意し、いつかこ﻿のエゴを倒せたらアイテムフォルダを入手できる…といった用途が考えられていた。

月のY趣扦瞎バ豫抓恁哎楗啶郡沥摔丹ㄅ按される奴_Aで、「量b型サクラエネミ`より下に、@の主人格がある」といういじめられ精神の具Fだった。@の心理世界ですら、いじめられる@がいるという酷いFg……！

gはギリギリまで裼盲视されていたボス。

スト`リ`にjまないため、Lしボスの一体として予定に入っていたのだが、やむなく没になった。

以下はそんな、ゲ`ム中に使用予定だったマトリクスの断片である。

 

・物：

キングプロテアはＢＢから作られたアルタ`エゴではあるが、あまりにも危なため月の表でもなくYでもない”何もない”宇宙に韦皮椁欷物である。

何人であれ、このエゴには触れてはいけない。

キングプロテアは郅蚯螭幛胗望の具F。

周欷摔る何もかもをも驻撙长螭浅砷Lし、さらに肥大化した空腹を氦郡工郡崾呈陇蚶Rり返し、また成Lする。その循hは人gのエゴそのものである。パッションリップとメルトリリスの妹にあたるが、妹仲が良いのかどうかは不明。

 

・堕天の：

クライン・キュ`ブ。

底なしの赤子。あるいは穴。盲目的に郅蚯螭幛毳ングフロテアを]じこめるために作られた。月の中枢・胩欷と同じく、フォトニックY晶によって作られた物理的な”容れ物”でもある。

キングプロテアの危性に荬扭い浚拢陇堕天ので封印したものの、プロテアがの中でどれだけの模に肥大化しているのか、知るものはいない。

 

・ヒュ`ジスケ`ル：EX

id_es（イデス）と呼ばれる、アルタ`エゴたちが生まれながらに持つ特殊能力。

スキル『自己改造』が暴走したチ`トスキル。

限界のない模大を可能とする。

地上では重力などの`りがあるため、生命は一定以上の格にはなれない。海中の生命であっても、Lが最大限のサイズである。建造物も同じことで、建B学の技g・Y金{_等の}で、o限に大きくなっていくモノなどありえない。それは物理法tにとらわれない、世界においても同である。

あらゆるプログラムにはレベル制限がかけられており、どれほどれた体であれ、一定以上の容量に_すると分xし、自らを最m化する。

（格が大きなると末端への贿_速度が落ちるため、Tのパ`ツを切り分ける。神と言われるものが多くのアバタ`を持つのもこの例に当てはまる）

しかし。このスキルを持つキングプロテアはひたすらに成Lする。レベルが上限に_すると自らの格を巨大化させ、さらなるレベル上限をO定。これをo限にRり返す。

キングプロテアは自らを}j化させる意志がなく、ただ”む”ことだけに特化しているため、肥大化したC能をTに分けないのだ。

Y果、制御できない自分を持て余して分身《アバタ`》を作ることなく、g一のエゴとして膨しAけてしまう。

放置しておけば星を破菠工胗钪妤欹佶毪亩颏坤、このo限殖で宇宙が绀婴胧陇悉胜ぁ％抓恁匹が殖していくスピ`ドより宇宙が冥るスピ`ドの方が速いためだ。

 

・グロウアップグロウ：EX

スキル『UYボ`ナス』が暴走したチ`トスキル。

『UYボ`ナス』は殛Lによって得るUYに何パ`セントかの追加ボ`ナスが入るものだが、キングプロテアはこのスキルをさらにチ`卜化、『常r、UYを取得する』ものに浃à皮筏蓼盲俊

{威と言えば{威のスキルではあるものの、あらゆる体には上限レベルがO定されている。

このスキルは取得者を氦护鹤罡撺欹佶毪摔工毪坤堡韦猡韦恰⒛芰《バ`ラメ`タ`》を化させるものではない。

むしろ殛LUYをこなさずに最高レベルに_してし﻿まうため、完全成Lrでのパラメ`タ`はまっとうにえた龊悉瑜甑亭い猡韦摔胜盲皮筏蓼Δ坤恧Α

俗に言う『Fスキル』であるのだが───

 

・幼化F象：

老化F象の逆をいう。

ＢＢが苦氦筏谱鳏晟悉菠烤惺スキル。

年hが一定に_すると幼体に若返ってしまう猡ぁQして成人（成L）させないためのプロテクト。

このスキルが付与しているキングプロテアは二十rに_すると若返りはじめ、八r工摔蓼った後また成Lを始める、というル`プ状Bにある。

 

・セッテング

f郅喂て：

Sしいから、美味しいから、温かいから。

游锏膜世碛嗓扦丹筏郡肽康膜猡胜郅蚯螭峋Aける───それがキングプロテアのエゴ、”f邸堡扦る。

ある菩_の化身は”目的もなく、己がために宇宙を郅氦郡埂であったが、このエゴは”理由もなく、己がために宇宙中の郅蚯螭幛搿である。

本来ならlにつけられる事もなく、理解される事もなく、倒される事もなく、oの宇宙を漂うだけだったが物好きなマスタ`によってkされ、Qする事になったようだ。

彼女がo垢な埂钉撙嗓辘础筏胜韦、hな暮Δ胜韦は、罪が有るのかoいのか、消M文明に生きる我々に裁きは下せない。

lもが持つ人gの^。

最にして基本のエゴである”H限なく求める心”がではなく善として利用できる日が来る事を粢て、キングプロテアはoのソラを漂いAける。

ちなみに天长膝辚氓住＠碚上、リップのトラッシュ＆クラッシュならプロテアを封じzめる事が可能となる。アルタ`エゴたちはリップ→プロテア→メルト→リップ……といった三Eみ状Bであるらしい。

 

・宝具

なし。ヒュ`ジスケ`ルが宝具に当する。

 

Kingprotea [Alter Ego] P176-178
Kingprotea is one of the Sakura Five that didn’t happen.
She’s the Alter Ego of craving and desire.

On one hand she is the lowest ranked of the Sakura Five, but on the other hand she has the strongest presence within SE.RA.PH.

This Sakura has the id_es skill “Huge Scale.”

She was to come and interfere with players who spend a long time in the labyrinth. She destroys paths as she moves along, so she would prevent players from repeating the same actions or grinding the same area. She’s an adorably foolish character who destroys parts of the dungeon when she trips and falls.

In areas outside of the Arena she was to be a rare epic encounter. A wondrous colossal colossus, just like the massive warship that comes along in Darius (TL NOTE: an old arcade game).

Rather than being a character designed to liven up the story, she would be a character to liven up our game design.

For example, within the Arena, she would be evoke situations like “I can see an item folder ahead, but there is a huge hand blocking the way,” or “I see a transparent box-thingy over there with Sakura stuffed inside, I can’t get through.” We were thinking of using her as a “living wall” type gimmick where after eventually defeating her you would be able to get at those item folders.

 

She was set to be a slave tier character who is constantly bullied and abused by attack programs on the far side of the Moon.

“You know what’s even more worthless than those lowly mass produced Sakura enemies? Your Master!” Kingprotea Sakura was to be the materialization of the mentality resulting from this bullying.

Isn’t it just terrible that Sakura is being bullied even in her own mind!?

Actually, she just barely missed the cut as a boss character.

Since she was not being involved in the story we were planning to make her into a hidden boss, but unfortunately she was cut.

Here are some bits and pieces that were planned for her in the game:

 

            Waste:

Kingprotea is an Alter Ego created from BB, however she is considered too dangerous to reside anywhere on the Moon, so she is disposed of into a place with “nothing,” in short, the emptiness of outer space.

This Alter Ego should never come into contact with anything.

She is the materialization of the desire for love.

She gobbles up anything and everything around her and grows bigger and bigger, which results in her having a bigger stomach that requires even more food. She engages in a malicious cycle of consumption and growth which represents the human ego itself. Passionlip and Melt Lilith are her sisters, but it’s unknown if they are on good terms or not.

 

            Fallen Angel’s Cage

She is a baby with a bottomless stomach, basically a giant hole. A cage is built to contain the Kingprotea who blindly desires love. Just like the cavity in the middle of the Moon and Seraph’s Cage it is a physical container made using photonic crystals.

BB, who realized the danger Kingprotea posed, seals her in the Fallen Angel’s Cage. Although BB sealed Kingprotea inside, nobody knows how massive Kingprotea might have become.

 

            Huge Scale : EX

An id_es skill. id_es skills are the inborn special powers of the Alter Egos.

Her “Self Remodeling” cheat skill goes out of control and activates Huge Scale EX.

It enables unlimited expansion of her size and scale.

Due to limitations imposed by the force of gravity on Earth, life forms have an upper limit on their size. Even in the sea, the size of a whale is more of less as big as it can get. The same goes for buildings, due to limitations of construction technology and financing; there is nothing that can be infinitely enlarged. This also holds true in the cyber world where the laws of physics don’t apply.

All programs have a limit on their level, and no matter how greatly a program excels, in order to surpass its boundary it must separate and optimize itself.

(As a rule, when a program gets bigger the speed of communication with the hardware terminal drops, so a program needs to be split into various specialized parts. So called God-spirits are an example of this, having successfully split up their processes into multiple avatars.)

However, the owner of this skill, Kingprotea, can grow without end. When her level exceeds the limit, she expands the boundary herself and sets an even higher max limit. This can be repeated infinitely.

Kingprotea has no desire to complicate things, it’s just that she has specialized to “swallow” therefore she is unable separate from her ability to enlarge which is vital to her specialization.

The result is that she is unable to create a body (an avatar) that is of normal size and limitation, and as a lone Ego she is destined to continue to enlarge.

If left alone, she will end up becoming a disaster on a universe scale that would destroy the stars, however she would not destroy the universe itself. This is because the speed at which the universe is expanding is faster than the speed at which Kingprotea is enlarging.

 

            Grow up Grow! : EX

This is her cheat skill “XP Bonus” gone out of control.

“XP Bonus” is supposed to increase the amount of XP gained from battle by a certain percent, but Kingprotea further hacked the skill so that she receives a continuous stream of XP. Although this skill seems rather threatening, there is an upper level limit set for all programs.

Anyone who obtains this skill can effortlessly achieve the highest level in the game; however it only increases the target’s level, and does not improve their stats.

If you compare a character who achieved max level through fair play to a character who used this cheat skill to achieve max level, the cheater character’s stats will be far lower. This is, in other words, a so called “trap skill.”

 

            Babyfication

The opposite of aging.

BB created this cursed skill with much difficulty in order to impose some restrictions on Kingprotea.

Once Kingprotea’s age has surpassed a predefined value this curse restores her to the state she was in at a younger age. It’s a protective process that prevents her from ever reaching an adult age. This curse starts to take effect when Kingprotea reaches age 12, and over time restores her back to her 8 year old state. When returned to the age of 8 her growth resumes again, so this cycle is a repeating loop.

 

            Setting:

The limit of craving and desire:

Because it’s fun, because it tastes good, because it’s warm.

Through these kinds of animalistic impulses she pursues love without a reason for doing so― This is Kingprotea’s Ego “Craving and Desire.”

The incarnation of a certain bodhisattva once said “Even without a goal, for yourself, fill the universe with love.” but this Ego follows “Without reason, for myself, crave the love found in the universe.”

Originally no one was supposed to find her, to understand her, to defeat her. She would simply be floating along in the void of space. Then eventually a curious Master would come across her, and they would do battle.

Is Kingprotea just a pure infant? An abominable disaster? Has she sinned? In any case, those of us who live in this age of mass consumption have no right to judge her.

The proof of humanity that everyone has.

The strongest and most fundamental Ego. But until the day comes when her “desire without limit” can be used for good rather than evil, she is destined to continue floating in the empty sky.

 

By the way, her natural enemy is Passionlip. In theory Lip’s “Trash and Crash” skill makes it possible to seal Kingprotea away. The Alter Ego sisters seem to enjoy a triangular power relationship where Lip beats Protea, Protea beats Melt, and Melt beats Lip.

 

            Noble Phantasms:

None. Huge Scale essentially qualifies as a Noble Phantasm.

 

■永久Cv・少女帝国【宝具】

クイ`ンズ・グラスゲ`ム。

キャスタ`の持つ界宝具で、k婴工毪殛Lを一タ`ン目にきしてしまう。

キャスタ`を定タ`ンまでに倒す事ができなければ、彼女たちとの[铯嫌肋hにAくのだ。

ナ`サリ`・ライムはマスタ`が望んだ姿に浠する。この宝具はその究O、マスタ`・ありすの簸具F化したものと言えるだろう。

 

『物Zは永hにAく。

かい指を一目にすように

あるいは二目を手に取るように。

そのiみ手が、Fgを拒みAけるかぎり。』

 

Perpetual Machine C Maiden Empire [noble phantasm] P178

The Queen’s Glass Game.

This is Caster’s anti-planet Noble Phantasm. It resets the battle to turn 1.

If you don’t defeat Caster before the turn she has declared, you’ll end up playing with the two maidens forever.

The servant Nursery Rhyme takes on the form that her Master desires. This Noble Phantasm works in similar fashion, and can be said that this to be the ultimate materialization of Alice’s dreams.

 

“The story goes on for all eternity.

As though putting my slender finger back on the first line of the first page,

Or perhaps pulling out the second volume.

As long as the hand that follows the text, continues to reject reality.”

 

■刺し穿つ死棘の【宝具】

ゲイ・ボルク。

ランサ`の持つ人宝具。

突けば必ず相手の心をく、と恐れられた猡い沃。その真相は、が『心に命中した』Y果の後にを放つ、因果の逆である。

真名によって解放されたランサ`の朱は、そのを放つ前に、既に心に命中したY果を持つ。

放ったから当たった、ではなく、当たったから放った……という、\命そのものにする攻摹

ゲイ・ボルクを回避するには敏捷の高さではなく、ゲイ・ボルクのk忧挨诉\命を逆させる力……幸\の高さが重要となる。

人、かつ心にしてだけのものだが、これは\命をQ定させる超i能力だ。啬芤i手前の宝具だが、それもそのはず、このをQうク`フ`リンは神の子である。かませだからといって侮ってはいけない。

 

The Piercing Spear Barbed With Death [noble phantasm] P178

Gae Bolg.

This is Lancer’s anti-person Noble Phantasm.

Gae Bolg is a cursed crimson spear that was feared for its ability to always pierce the heart of the enemy in a single thrust. This is achieved by reversing causality. The spear is thrust at the enemy only after the result of piercing their heart has been determined.

This power is invoked by calling the spears true name, which makes the spear possess the causal result of piercing the enemy’s heart before the spear is even thrust.

The spear doesn’t pierce the enemy’s heart because it was thrust; it is thrust because it pierced the enemy’s heart. It’s an attack that alters destiny itself.

Gae Bolg can’t be dodged merely through means of high agility. In order to evade its attack the target must have extremely high luck in order to change their fate from even before Gae Bolg is activated.

While Gae Bolg is classified as an anti-person or anti-heart Noble Phantasm, it’s actually a manifestation of the super power ability to alter destiny. As a Noble Phantasm Gae Bolg is one step away from being classified as an Authority, but that is only to be expected seeing as its wielder is Cu Chulainn, the child of a god.

You can’t underestimate Lancer ever if he seems like he is a pushover.

 

■Q觥茎恁暴`ション】

﻿七つの海を模したQ着の觥

原tとして、このQ鲆酝猡扦违蕙攻咯`同士の椁い辖止されているが、それはあくまで禁止されているだけ。ペナルティは与えられるが、それで失格になるUではない。やろうと思えば校h内でもアリ`ナでも偿蕙攻咯`を攻膜工胧陇峡赡埭扦る。

しかし、このQ訾摔いては以下の~的な法tがある。

１．サ`ヴァントはサ`ヴァントにしか攻膜扦ない。

２．マスタ`はサ`ヴァントとマスタ`に攻膜扦る。

というもの。ゲ`ム本でそのxk自由はないが、マスタ`がマスタ`にコ`ドキャストでダイレクトアタックをしても}はないのである。

ただし、マスタ`が死亡してもサ`ヴァントがすぐに消えるUでもなく、倒されたマスタ`趣违旦`ヴァントが偿旦`ヴァントを倒せば晴れて”共倒れ”となるUだ。

矛盾しただが、椁い』胜稀堡嗓沥椁违旦`ヴァントが偿旦`ヴァント倒したか？”なのである。

そして、生きて次の椁い艘婴扦るのは僬撙韦摺

≌撙膝榨ˉぅ洎`ウォ`ルによって生の道を]ざされ、空gごと消绀工脒\命にある。

世界を区切る攻性防壁《ファイヤ`ウォ`ル》は突破不可能の壁で、これをo炕できるものは神クラスのサ`ヴァントのみとされる。

 

……まあ、なんか地球からやってきた金の美女があっさり壁をo炕していたが、アレはもともとム`ンセルとはまったくvSのない生命体なのでノ`カン。ム`ンセルのル`ルはたいてい力でRし通るファニ`ヴァンブなのであった。

 

Decisive Battleground [location] P178-179

This is the decisive battleground that sports a seven seas theme.

As a rule, Masters are forbidden from fighting outside of this battleground, however this rule is not strictly enforced. Those who break this rule are penalized, but not disqualified. If one so desires it’s possible to attack other Masters even in areas such as the arena and the school building.

However, there are several absolute rules that must be observed within the decisive battleground:

1: Servants only can attack Servants.

2: Masters can attack both Servants and Masters.

Within the game you do not have the freedom to choose to break these rules, but you do have the ability to directly attack other Masters using codecasts. It should be noted that even if a Master dies, their servant does not immediately disappear, and if the dead Master’s Servant defeats the other Master’s Servant, the battle effectively ends in mutual destruction.

It might be contrary to what one would normally think, but what effectively determines victory is whose Servant defeated the enemy Servant. The victor is the one who is alive and able to proceed to the next battle. The loser is prevented from respawning by the firewall, and is fated to be completely blocked from reentering the cyber world.

The world delimiting firewall is an impenetrable barrier, and only servants of Godspirit class would be able to nullify it.

 

… Well, I guess some blonde hottie from Earth nullified it pretty easily. But that event was completely unrelated to Moon Cell, so it doesn’t count! Moon Cell’s rules basically sum up to “survival of the strongest.” (Missing one sentence here about Funny Vamp????)

 

■菖湔诙稀茎攻ル】

姿をLして行婴工毳攻ル。基本的に魔gにmらない武g系の英が修得している。

髑tの暗⒄・ハサン先生にとって唯一のアドバンテ`ジだったが、EXTRAアサシン・文大先生の

『天地と呼吸を一つにする事で透明になる』

というまったく新しいL行法の登訾摔瑜盲啤

「つからない技なら、もう何でも菖湔诙膝攻ルなんじゃね`の？」

と言われつつある不思hスキル。

ＣＣＣではパッションリップもこのスキルを得意とするが、移婴工毪茸Δ起こす擦^音で相手につかってしまうため、から主人公を眺める程度にとどまっている。ヨカッタネ。

 

Presence Concealment [skill] P179 [[officially localized as Obfuscation]]

A skill that conceals the user and their actions.

Usually only used by fighting-type heroic spirits who do not specialize in magic.

To the Skull Assassin Hassan, this skill was his one and only advantage that no one could surpass, but EXTRA’s amazing Li Shuwen brings it back as a completely new method of concealment; “By melding your breathing and nature into one, you become transparent.”

It’s a curious skill that makes people wonder, “If it’s a skill that prevents you from being detected, isn’t it just the same thing as any other Presence Concealment?”

In CCC Passionlip is rather fond of using this skill, but when she moves her claws make sound scraping along the ground, and the enemy ends up finding her. So she can’t use it for much more than gazing at the protagonist from the shadows. Isn’t that wonderful?

 

■啬堋酒孥】

けんのう。コ`ドキャスト、スキル、宝具とはカテゴリ`の`う特殊能力。

事象の印rg流の操作、国造り、といった、世界を造しうるレベルの力をこう呼ぶ。

神代と呼ばれるr代……およそ6000年以上前……に在ったが、西芬越怠⑷祟の文明レベルが向上した事でようやくその任を解かれ、^去のr代に引退したもの。

通常のスキルは『このような理屈でこういう事ができる』というものだが、啬埭稀氦郡馈そうする乩があるのでそうする』だけのもの。

神クラスのサ`ヴァントなら持ち得ていて然るべきものだが、このr代にその赝を振るうにはそれなりの代（自身の崩玻─虮匾とする。

ＣＣＣではム`ンセルをみこんだモノがこの域に_する。

 

Authority [miracle] P179

Kennou. Authorities are special abilities that fall into a different category than Codecasts, Skills, and Noble Phantasms.

An Authority is a power that is on the level of creating a world, and includes things like altering events, time-flow manipulation, and kingdom building.

Authorities existed in the age known as the Age of Gods, which was about 6000 years ago, but after entering the Common Era human civilization advanced to the point where Authorities were no longer needed, and so Authorities became a relic of the past.

Normal skills achieve a certain result based on some logical process or principle, but Authorities realize a result simply because the user has the right to do so.

A God Spirit Class Servant should naturally possess Authorities, but to use them in the modern age requires a corresponding compensation to be paid (involving strain/damage inflicted on the user).

In CCC the one who swallowed up Moon Cell has reached a level of power that is Authority class.

 

■降下エレベ`タ`【ロケ`ション】

}杯檎において、六日gのq予期gをKえ、七日目を迎えたマスタ`たちをQ訾怂亭胱爸谩￥饯卧冥攴饯辖袒幛曰谑窑怂皮搿

ファイヤ`ウォ`ルで区切られた密室の中、マスタ`たちは最後の会を交わす。

お互いの^去、未来、思想、因F、それらを再_Jする最後のrg。

手を取り合う事のできない长任斗健

けれど、わかり合えたかもしれないvS。

数分後に椁い蜷_始するI者の心のeらぎを、ム`ンセルはQyする。

 

Descending Elevator [location] P179-180

In the Holy Grail War, after the six day moratorium, this elevator takes all the Masters to the Decisive Battleground on the seventh day. The appearance of the elevator is similar to that of a church’s confessional.

Within the sealed domain behind the firewall, the Masters exchange words for the last time.

It’s the final chance to reconfirm each others past, future, thoughts, and connections.

Enemies and friends who shouldn’t be able to come to an understanding.

But perhaps there is a way to come to understand each other.

Just a few minutes later the battles begin, and Moon Cell is watching, recording the fluctuations of each combatant’s heart and mind.

[TL NOTE: The Japanese literally says “grace period” but it could also mean postponement or extension or even delay, but it’s hard to judge due to not having played the game. Please edit “grace period” if appropriate.]

 

■皇帝特亍茎攻ル】

赤セイバ`が持つスキル。

本来持ち得ないスキルも、本人が主する事で短期gだけ@得できる。

当するスキルはT\、g、芸g、カリスマ、略、等。このスキルランクがA以上の龊稀⑷馓迕妞扦呜荷（神性など）すら@得する。

究Oの不正行椁趣いΔ、绚りというか。

かの帝国の皇帝は神も同然。すべてのスキルはロ`マ……じゃなくて皇帝に集まる。皇帝が\といえば白でも\になるのである。

とはいっても、さすがに何の素Bもない状Bでスキル@得はできない。赤セイバ`は万能の天才かつ好奇心旺盛なので、たいていの技《タレント》は体Ygみ。

とつぜん「余だって旅客Cぐらい操kできるぞ！なに、高度をはかってC体を{整するだけであろう、それぐらいなら余のk明したジェット檐と浃铯椁踏筏剩　工胜螭o茶を言い出しても、ホントに旅客Cスキルを自己解iで会得してしまうのである。

……まあ、きっぽさと^痛のダブルパンチで会得したコツをすぐに忘れてしまうのだが。

 

Imperial Privilege [skill] P180

[[officially localized as both Royal Prerogative and Emperor’s Prerogative]]

One of Red Saber’s skills.

She doesn’t normally have this skill, however if she asserts her Imperial right, it’s possible for her to obtain this skill for short periods of time.

Skills that fall under this category include horse riding, swordsmanship, fine arts, charisma, military strategy, and more. When this skill is used at a Rank A level or above, she gains the ability to physically burden the bodies of her enemies (like [the] Divinity [skill]).

It’s an incredibly unfair and ostentatious ability.

The Emperor of that empire might as well be a God. All roads skills lead to Rome... err gather in the Empire. If the Emperor wanted to say the color white is black, it would indeed, be black.

With that being said, of course a Servant can’t gain skills with absolutely no training in them.

But seeing as Red Saber is an all-round genius and a very curious spirit, she has thoroughly tried out most any practical skill.

 

“A passenger plane? Even I can pilot such a simple vehicle! All you have to do is check the altitude and adjust the angle of the airframe a bit, right? It’s no different than the jet-tank I invented!” Were Red Saber to suddenly spout something unreasonable like this, you would think her crazy. But she would actually grasp enough piloting skills just from reading a book about it and reflecting on it alone. … But it remains to be mentioned that the double whammy of becoming bored with the subject and getting a headache would soon make her forget the knowledge she gained.

 

■５－１０君【ＮＰＣ】

ご`・とう君。

旧校h一A、ジナコが引きこもる用T室の前にいる一般生徒ＮＰＣ。

モノマネが得意……というかライフワ`クで、前日にたフェイバリット映像に影され、その役になりきるというよく分からないスキルを持っている。章ごとに台~回しが浠するのはそのため。

五章以降、なぜ彼が消えているのかはI部前のＮＰＣがZってくれる。

 

5.10 [NPC] P180

Gou Tou-kun.

Found on the first floor of the Old School Building

An ordinary student NPC you find in front of the caretaker’s office where Jinako has holed herself up.

He is good at imitating people... well maybe it’s better to say that imitation is his life. He has the rather odd ability to completely take up the role of characters from movies he has recently watched. This is why his lines, behavior, and mannerisms change from chapter to chapter. From chapter 5 onwards he disappears. The reason for this is explained by the NPC found in front of the school store.

 

 [TL Note: His name Gou Tou is a word play on the Japanese pronunciation of 5 and 10]

 

■コ`ドキャスト【スキル】

空gで使用される易g式《プログラム》。

ウィザ`ドはあらかじめコ`ドをO・u造しておき、これに魔力を通して起婴丹护搿

外付けによる消耗型《ワンオフ》と、自身の体……子造にMみzむ修得型《インスト`ル》に分かれる。

インスト`ル型のコ`ドキャストは力だがg者の性|を浠させるため、これをxぶウィザ`ドは少ない。礼装によるコ`ドキャスト使用はこの中gにあたる。

 

Codecast [skill] P180

A program (read: simple spell) used in cyberspace.

A wizard writes and compiles the program code in advance, and activates it by passing magic through it. There are two types of Codecast. External Codecasts are one time use consumable Codecasts, while Internal Codecasts are installed into the body... or rather the spiritron structures [that make up one’s body in cyberspace].

Codecasts that have been installed are very powerful, however seeing as they change the fundamental nature of the user, not many wizards choose to use them. Codecasts implemented through the use of a Mystic Code fall somewhere in the middle [in terms of power and effects on the user].

 

■黄金鹿と工我埂颈具】

ゴ`ルデンハインド／ワイルドハント。

ライダ`の奥の手にして日常とも言える宝具。

主船・黄金の鹿号を中心に、o数の小船を展_、R倒的火力をもって长绀工搿

スペインのo撑を破った「火船」の逸と、ヨ`ロッパ全域で怀肖丹欷搿工我埂工我菰がミックスされた宝具。

ドレイクが指]していた船猡蛲鲭として呼び出し、一欧呕黏蛟・婴护胛锢恁昆岍`ジだが、F在の所持金に辘袱骏昆岍`ジになる、という妙な特性を持っ﻿ている。このため、シンジと宝箱を取り合うトレジャ`ハントイベントの成果によってダメ`ジ数が婴工搿

 

◆

                                   

o撑破りはドレイクを魔のo《エルドラゴ》とまでスペイン人にいわしめた有名なエピソ`ド。

千トン以上の大型100b以上を主Sとし、合6万5千人からなる英国征服──通称、o撑にして、エルドラゴは英国の副司令官（g|的指]官）として参椤Ｓ⒐趣榱Δ洗の数こそスペイン趣2倍だが、小型船ばかりで兵T数はその半分をさらに割っていた。

しかしこの小型船ばかりの容こそがエルドラゴ必伽尾撙恰⒈耍ū伺）はh距xからのh椁蛑魈澶摔筏椁ぁ⒔酉悉工毪长趣儇をQしようとするスペイン趣蚪K始翻弄した。

そして特に恐怖を持ってZられたのが、エルドラゴの得意とした海\榉ā被鸫”である。

これは小船などに大量の可燃物をeみzんで火をかけ、炒に突っzませる榉à扦ったのだが、エルドラゴはここで最低でも百トンクラスの船（今殛Lに用いているのと同サイズ）を”火船”に仕立て、何bも}荬送护棉zませた。

Y果として、スペイン趣嫌⒐征服を目的にをTしたにもかかわらず、まったく上することすらできずに大・摔工搿

太の沈まぬ王国、スペインの落日である。

一方、ワイルドハントとは暴L雨や吹雪などの工位身で、d犬や山羊、Rや武装した兵士、怪物などの姿でFれるとされる。

これを率いる者は、徽hでは魔化したア`サ`王や古代の神オ`ディン、最初の咎人カインなどであるとされ、そうした者たちの中でもイギリスで冥信じられているのがフランシス・ドレイクである。

原t的にはその土地の荒ぶる英雄や有名人、古代の神などがワイルドハントの首Iとなる。

余ではあるが、スコットランドでは工我工伍Lはア`サ`王とされている。

 

The Stormy Night of the Golden Hind [noble phantasm] P180-181

Golden Hind/Wild Hunt.

This Noble Phantasm is Rider’s trump card, but it sees a lot of use.

With the flagship Golden Hind at the center, countless small ships swarm out and exterminate the enemy with their overwhelming firepower.

It’s an anti-army Noble Phantasm based on a mix of the Fire Ships that destroyed Spain’s “invincible” armada, and the widely known European legend of The Night of Storms.

This Noble Phantasm summons the fleet of ships that Drake once commanded in ghost form, and the fleet ships proceed to blast out flame in unison causing physical damage. This attack has the rather strange property of dealing an amount of damage that corresponds to the amount of money Drake’s Master has.

This means that the damage largely depends on the player’s result in the event where you compete with Shinji to find treasure chests.

 

◆

 

The episode of Drake destroying the “invincible” armada is extremely famous, and after that Drake came to be known in Spain as El Draque (Demon Dragon).

The invincible armada consisted of over 100 huge ships that were each 1000 tons or more and had more than 65,000 troops aboard. They were setting out to conquer England. To counter the Spanish Armada, El Draque, whose formal title was vice-commander (but effectively the top commander), led the English fleet to battle. The English fleet had double the ships of the Spanish Armada, but they were all small ships, and they were manned by less than half the number of soldiers that were aboard the Spanish Armada.

However, this mass of small ships was part of El Draque’s surefire victory plan. He (she) fought using primarily long range cannon combat, so the Spanish Armada ships couldn’t get close enough to allow it’s sailors to board the English ships, which was the Spanish battle plan. The result was that the Spanish Armada was completely toyed with and tossed about by the English fleet.

In accounts from after the battle, one could see that the Spanish especially feared El Draque’s Fire Ships which employed pirate-like tactics.

These were ships stuffed with combustibles that were rammed into Spanish Armada ships. El Draque had to deal with fighting the Spanish Armada’s massive 1000 ton class ships (the same size as used in modern naval combat today), so he used these Fire Ships to quickly destroy many Spanish ships.

The result is that the troops aboard the Spanish Armada couldn’t even reach land at all; nothing less than complete defeat.

This was the downfall of Spain, the kingdom where the sun never sets.

 

On the other hand, Wild Hunt is an incarnation of extremely strong winds, rain, or snow that brews up as part of a storm. It appears as a raging storm of Hunting dogs, mountain sheep, horses, soldiers clad in armor, monsters, and other terrible creatures.

The leader of this storm of beasts is said to be a demonic King Arthur, or the ancient god Odin, or the criminal Cain. In England, the most widely believed is Francis Drake.

In principle the leader of the Wild Hunt is that area’s wild or savage hero, famous person, or ancient god.

To digress, the leader of the Wild Hunt in Scotland is said to be King Arthur.

 

■五停心Q【g式】

ごじょうしんかん。

⑸院キアラが_kした医ソフト。

メンタルケアを目的として作られたg式《コ`ドキャスト》で、精神の淀み・乱れをy定し、これを物理的に摘出する事で精神を安定させる。

もともとは患者の精神マップを作り、これを理解するために作られたとか。

本来、ＳＧはrgをかけてゆっくり浮きりにしていくものだが、五停心Qによってk、即、摘出が可能となった。

ＳＧは秘密ではあるが、同rに_示されるべき事柄だ。lだって秘密を守りたいが、同rに知ってほしくもある。

秘密を守り通していると心が『苦しい』。

人gはSになりたがる生き物だ。

lにも知られたくない秘密だからこそ、lかに打ち明け、理解してもらい、赦しを求める。

五停心Qはそんな深酉陇斡求を叶える、人々の真の相互理解を目指して作られたものらしい。

 

Thesis of the Still Heart [codecast] P181
Gojyou Shinkan.

Healing software developed by Kiara Sesshoin.

It is a codecast used to perform mental maintenance. It first determines the areas of the mind that are stagnating or out of order, and then physically removes them, thereby returning stability to the users mind. This program was originally made to map out a patients mind and then understand the connections found in their mind.

 

For the most part a Secret Garden is supposed to be a place where you would relax and be relieved of your ailments over a period of time, but the Thesis of the Still Heart enables the rapid discovery and removal of mental troubles.

Of course Secret Gardens are secrets, but at the same time their contents should be revealed. It’s natural that everyone wants to protect their secrets, but at the same time there is also that feeling of wanting others to know.

It’s “painful” to always be protecting a secret.

And it’s only human nature to want to be free of burden.

Precisely because it’s a secret you don’t want anyone to know, you desire exoneration, so you break it to someone and have them understand your situation.

Thesis of the Still Heart seems to have been made to fulfill this subconscious, fundamental desire through true mutual understanding.

 

■神五兵【宝具】

ゴッド・フォ`ス。

バ`サ`カ`が持つ人・・城宝具。

尾挤钕趣沃魑淦鳏趣筏浦れ渡っている、I手武器・方天画戟の真名。六形Bに湫韦工毳蕙毳隶抓毳Εē荪蟆尾家蝗摔钎旦`ヴァント六人分の宝具を持っているようなもので、

『切亍护悉らゆる物理防御をo炕、ないし切断し破菠工氪螗昆岍`ジ攻摹

『刺突』はスタン（によるきによる行臃猡福┡卸āかつk列の长蜇通する大ダメ`ジ攻摹

『打摹护暇薮螭驶\手化して尾激畏烙力をあげる。もしくは相手の攻膜蚴埭敝工帷⒎丹固厥夥烙、

『Sぎ』は横皿列の长Bう大ダメ`ジ、

﻿『Bい』は物理系の攻膜きながらダメ`ジを与える特殊カウンタ`、

そして『射摹护悉撙螭蚀蠛盲・大口径による波映hじみた尾讥萤`ム。

「もうアイツひとりでいいんじゃないかな」と他のサ`ヴァントがぼそりと咳いてもおかしくない。

方天画戟は既にして、兵器として名作である。

切亍⒋掏弧⒋摹⑺Sぎ、Bい。

大型I手武器の特栅工伽苹瞍した万能武器であるからだ。（※ただし、gHには北宋r代の武器であり、尾激活Sしたは存在していない）

 

この神五兵は君主をY切るたびにF地にっていく尾激韦郡帷⒊・mが考案した中Aガジェットの茏鳏扦る。

・mは尾激さ、姿に神をた。

中国の古い神・蚩尤《しゆう》は楦・J・弓矢のk明者と言われ、その六腕すべてになる武器を持っていたとされる。

mはこのイメ`ジを尾激吮护弧⑽逍Bに湫韦工氤兵器を考案。尾激味嗖胜胜胛浃蚩k横o尽に_花させる、人工宝具を生み出すに至った。

ただし、尾激膝些`サ`カ`化しているため、EXTRA本ではその多性は失われている。

 

The War God Five Soldiers [noble phantasm] P181-182

God Force.

This is Berserker’s anti-person, anti-army, and anti-fortress Noble Phantasm.

The War God Five Soldiers is the true name of Lu Bu’s main weapon, which is a two-handed halberd. It can be changed into six different forms, which makes it as though Lu Bu has six Servant’s worth of Noble Phantasms.

1.Slash: This nullifies all kinds of physical defense and causes heavy damage.

2.Thrust: A heavy damage attack used to pierce through multiple enemy units that are lined up straight. It also stuns the enemy (the halberd piercing the enemy seals their movements).

3.Strike: The halberd is transformed into a pair of giant bracers and increases Lu Bu’s defense. It can also be used in a special defensive manner to stop the enemy’s attack in its tracks and perform a counter move.

4.Mow Down: Destroys a horizontal line of enemies with huge damage.

5.Exterminate: A special counter move that reflects physical attacks and damages the enemy.

6. Shoot: Everyone’s favorite “Lu Bu Beam” that shoots from the halberd transformed into a large wave-motion cannon.

It wouldn’t be strange to see other Servants muttering, “Isn’t he more than enough by himself?”

His halberd is quite the masterpiece.

Slash, Thrust, Strike, Mow Down, Exterminate. It’s an omnipotent weapon that can be used to cover all the large two handed weapon attacks. (＊However, this weapon didn’t actually exist in the time of the Song Dynasty which is when Lu Bu was alive.)

 

The War God Five Soldiers is a Chinese gadget masterpiece designed for Lu Bu by the super tactician Chen Gong.

The tactician Chen Gong saw Lu Bu’s strength as that of a war god.

China’s ancient god of war, Shiyuu, is said to be the inventor of the battle axe, the shield, and the bow and arrow. He is also said to have carried a different weapon in each of his six arms.

Chen Gong imagined Lu Bu in a similar fashion, and so he designed this weapon with a main form and five additional forms. Lu Bu’s multifaceted weapon could blossom freely on the battlefield, and was on the level of a man-made Noble Phantasm.

However, Lu Bu is a Berserker, so he cannot use anything but the main halberd form in EXTRA.

 

■言峰神父【人名】

あるrは}杯檎のO督役。

あるrはツクヨミ温泉の番台。

あるrはI部のT。
