そしてまたあるrはLしボスとしてランサ`にo茶ぶりをするいつものエセ神父。

「言峰をI部の店Tにしていいですか？」

とスタッフさんに言われたrは”石川さん……F方疲れているのよ……”と心配になったものですが、はまればはまるものでＣＣＣでは立派な店TとしてC能しています。あんな怪しい店Tがいるか、というツッコミはなしの方向で。

サ`ヴァントの私服を婴盲皮れるのはこの人だけ。彼はあの私服を手入れるため、虚数空gに眠るカオス空g『藤猛虎八BL（ふじもうこば`れんとうは）』にダイブ、Kみいる豪たちを打ち倒して生したという。そのあたりのスピンオフはＫＫＵＭＭ先生（…一hによるとO伸映一郎…）に丸投げにするとたいへん美味しくいただけます。

 

Father Kotomine [name] P182

Sometimes he is the supervisor of the Holy Grail War.

Sometimes he is the attendant at Tsukuyomi Onsen.

Sometimes he is the teller at the school store.

And sometimes he is the fake priest that we all know who is a hidden boss that’s always making unreasonable demands of Lancer.

When asked by one of the staff “Is it okay if I make Kotomine the school store teller?” I became a bit worried about their health and replied “Ishikawa-san… you must be tired….” But if it works it works, hence Kotomine makes his appearance as our wonderful teller in CCC. We took his design in a new direction so players wouldn’t balk at the existence of such a suspicious person working as a teller.

Kotomine is the only one who sells alternate clothing for servants. In order to obtain these clothes he dives into the slumbering chaos of the imaginary number space “Fuji Fierce Tiger 8th Battle Arena” and defeats the fearsome opponents there in order to return alive with his haul.

If we made this into a spin-off and had KKUMM-sensei (Mashin Eiichiro according to one theory) do it, I’m sure it would be rather awesome.

 

■金色白面【事柄】

こんじきはくめん。

キャス狐のＳＧ３で垣gられる、九つの尾の神。太をM神化したもの。やさぐれた天照大神。

キャス狐が九尾状Bになるとこの姿になる……ワケではない。これはあくまでbかな昔に在り、今も在りAけているキャス狐の大元である。このクラスの神になるとrgSとかほんとvSないのです。

本来ならあのRに入ったr点で人gは燃え尽きるのだが、さすがWらのザビ夫／ザビ子、燃えないばかりかいつもの蛮勇（バカxk枝）をせつける。

本来なら裸エプロンならぬ裸ナインテイルなのだが、理の壁を突破する事はできず、きちんと礼装をpっていただいた。

ちなみに簸韦胜と碎gがあそこに行くと、Rには巨大な太がえるだけである。

 

Golden White Face [event] P182

Konjiki Hakumen.

This is the nine-tailed Godspirit form of Cas-ko. In this form she is a pseudo-god that is a deification of the Sun. You get a peek of her like this in her 3rd Secret Garden.

The apathetic Sun Goddess (Amaterasu Oomikami).

Just because Cas-ko has attained her nine-tailed state it does not necessarily mean she will take on this form. This form is Cas-ko’s origin, and is now just something that’s been part of her since long ago and continues to be a part of her.

When she becomes this high level of a Godspirit, the time axis (and whatever else) is no longer a limiting factor to her.

In all reality upon entering that mausoleum any human should be burned to a crisp, but as expected of our Zabio/Zabiko [nicknames for the male/female protagonist] he or she flaunts their recklessness in the face of danger (the stupid alternative), and somehow pull through.

Originally we wanted to feature her without clothing (In her lovely nine-tailed Godspirit form wearing only an apron (naked-apron)), however unable to break through the ethical wall that is our consciences, she appears properly clad in her ceremonial attire.

By the way, when someone who has no dream enters the mausoleum the only thing that can be seen is a giant sun.

 

【さ行】

 

■サクラヴェ`ル・グランデ【地形】

ム`ンセル中枢への到_を阻む最後の壁の名称。

またの名を理への挑椤

初期案ではサクラヴェ`ル・ディ`バだった。

ディ`バはゴディバに近いイントネ`ションでk音してほしい。ゴッデス・ディ`バ。略してゴディバ。

……最後の最後でコメディにするのもどうかと思い、グランデに涓された。

 

Sakura Veil Grande [terrain] P183

This is the name of the final obstruction preventing the player from reaching Moon Cell’s Nucleus.

Its other name is “A Challenge to Morals”.

In our initial design plans the name was Sakura Veil Diva.

We wanted players to pronounce “Diva” with a similar intonation to “Godiva.” Goddess Diva; abbreviated to Godiva. …we wanted to use it as comedic relief at the very end of the end, but couldn’t really make it work, so Diva was changed to Grande.

 

■サクラファイブ【その他】

没になった旧プロットに存在したアルタ`エゴ。

墼鳌⒖S、、慈邸f邸と五つの感情から﻿作られたＢＢの分身たち。

ＣＣＣ最初期案では、

第一A婴违堀工铣啷楗螗旦`、

第二～第六A婴违堀工膝单ラファイブ、

第七A婴违堀工希拢陇\幕、という成だった。まさにサクラ地z。おi入りになって良かったような、残念のような。

ちなみにアルタ`エゴたちは女性の扇情的な身体部位をシンボライズしている。

リップは胸、メルトは脚。

残りのアルタ`エゴたちは目、唇、背中。

 

Sakura Five [other] P183

The Sakura Five were a group of Alter Egos that were cut from the game during development when we changed the plot.

They were all avatars (bunshin off-shoots) of BB. Each was based on one of the following five emotions: love-hate, pleasure, purity, affection, desire (craving).

In the very first design concept of CCC:

The boss of the first layer was Red Sakura.

The bosses of layers two through six were the Sakura Five.

The boss of the seventh layer was BB or some mastermind behind the bad stuff in the story.

Sure enough it was Sakura Hell. On one hand I’m glad it was cut, but on the other hand it’s a bit regrettable.

By the way, the suggestive theme of each Sakura was symbolized using the appearance of their body.

Passionlip's theme was represented by her chest, and Melt Lilith’s through her legs and feet.

The remaining Alter Egos themes were revealed through the eyes, lips, and back.

 

■サクラ迷m【ロケ`ション】

月のY趣顺霈Fしたiの造体。

表の}杯檎におけるアリ`ナを模して作られたもので、定型を保つコトが困yな虚数空gの中でもg数を保ちAけられるI域。

巨大な@の浃思膜晏恧Δ瑜Δ讼陇叵陇丐染Aいている。サクラ迷m、という名称はこれに由来する。生徒会では「サクラ迷mではあんまりなので」と代案もあげられたが、そのどれもが酷いものだった……。

ちなみに初期名称はサクラダンジョン。ダンジョンに突入する、攻略する、というきが直接的でいやらしかったのだが、新ビジュアルの完成と共に没となった。ちょっと淫靡《いんび》さがpったＣＣＣでしたとさ。

 

Sakura Labyrinth [location] P183

The mysterious structure that appeared on the far side of the Moon.

It mimics the arena of the Holy Grail War on the surface, so maintaining a fixed form is a difficult task. This is because it is an area within the imaginary number space that continues to maintain the existence of real numbers.

Nestled closely around the trunk of a giant sakura tree, it wraps further and further down. This is the source of the name Sakura Labyrinth. The student council deems the Sakura Labyrinth to be getting out of hand and comes up with some alternative plans for it, but all the plans are pretty bad….

By the way, initially it was called Sakura Dungeon. But the directness of this name, which evokes the idea that you have to bust in and clear everything inside, was thought to be pretty disgusting, so when the new visuals for this area came along the name was axed and changed to Sakura Labyrinth. With this we managed to decrease the amount of linguistic obscenity in CCC.

 

■サクラメント【事柄】

月のY认薅à呜拧

EXTRAにおけるＰＰと同じだが、ＢＢが偈证恕弗单ラメント」と名前を浃à皮筏蓼盲俊

摇を@、にかえたようなもの。

もともとＰＰとは『月のY趣摔ける（Ug扭趣筏皮危┠ЯΑ护扦る。魔力＝メモリとルビをふるとたいへん分かりやすい。

空gにおいて、何かを作る、浃à搿婴すために必要なもの。全体のt量はQまっているが、基本、一w所にたまる事はなく、流婴筏匹互楗栅蚧丐工猡巍

﻿

ＢＢ「でもＰＰとか名前が可郅ないから改名しちゃいました♥サクラ印の、元荬摔胜毳单抓辚幞螗取…略してサクラメントです！」

t茶「…………（宗教的な秘もサクラメントというのだが、ここはaっているのが思いやりだな……）」

 

ＢＢにはおかん的な萸菠い颏工爰t茶であった。

また、一hによると、初期案では拧顶单ラメント》を管理する、y行^取みたいなアルタ`エゴがいたとかいないとか。もちろん、u品版ＣＣＣには菖浃郡辘趣獾訾筏蓼护蟆

 

Sakurament [circumstances]  P183-184

A currency that is only used on the far side of the Moon.

It’s the same as PP in EXTRA, but BB one-sidedly decided to change its name to “Sakurament.”

It’s basically as though yen were changed into sakura.

By nature PP is essentially equivalent to magic power (economically realized) on the far side of the Moon. It’s easy if you think of it as Magic power = Memory and Ruby.

Within cyberspace is it necessary to make, change or activate things. The total amount available is a set number, however the currency doesn’t tend to build up in just one persons hands, and flows freely around within SE.RA.PH. 

BB: “But like, y’know PP just isn’t a cute name at all, so I improved it! Now it’s a sakura flower shaped supplement that cheers everyone up! …in short Sakurament!”

Koucha: “………(Sakurament sounds the same as sacrament, but it seems wiser to stay quiet about that now…).”

 

Just Koucha being coldly considerate of BB.

Also, according to another report, in the initial design plans Sakurament was supposedly managed by a Bank President-esque Alter Ego. Of course in the final CCC consumer product such a character isn’t hinted at and doesn’t make the slightest appearance.

 

■弁天五L琵琶【宝具】

サラスヴァティ・メルトアウト。

ＢＢがアルタ`エゴに与えた心宝具。

心ではあるが、空gにおいては都市、界宝具としてC能する。

材料になったものは七福神の一柱であり、宗像三女神、宇R神などと同一される女神、弁天。

水を集め、放ち、あらゆるものをみこむuの力。

本来は殛Lに用いるものではなく、一定の文明をBいた文明に用いるもの。

メルトリリスの蜜は肉体だけでなく精神まで甘く溶かす。この宝具はそのコミュニティ`の良R、道预颏趣恧堡丹弧⑷禾澶韦瑜Δ艘惶寤させてしまう。

そうして身も心も社会もスライム化したものを踏みにじり、吸Г工毪韦本来の力である。

非殛LTにして~大な抗をk]するあたり、メルトリリスの性|《たち》のさがにじみ出ている。

初期案では相手を水のuに落としzんでから、婴堡胜い饯翁澶氐椎膜缩恧甑工贰⒒イい私~を迎えてフィニッシュするというアレな宝具だった。

そして当然のように没になった。芸gの神も理定には伽皮胜ったよ……。

 

Benzaiten’s Five String Biwa [noble phantasm] P184

Saraswati Meltout.

This is an anti-heart Noble Phantasm given to the Alter Egos by BB.

While formally anti-heart, in the cyber world it effectively functions as an anti-city or anti-border Noble Phantasm.

This Biwa was made from the Goddess Benzaiten, who is one of the Seven Deities of Fortune, also regarded to be the same as Ugajin or the three Munakata Goddesses.

The Biwa creates a vortex of power that gathers and releases water, and can swallow up all things.

This Noble Phantasm was not meant to be used in combat. It was meant to be used against an area where civilization has advanced to a certain level.

Melt Lilith’s honey doesn’t just melt a person’s body; it also sweetly melts their mind. This Noble Phantasm melts away all the common sense and morals from a community, and unifies the melted pool of people as a single-body colony.

This Noble Phantasm’s primary power is crushing and then absorbing the slime transformed bodies, minds, and societies.

Considering the massive effect and damage to non-combatants in the area this Noble Phantasm is used, one can see how ill-natured Melt Lilith really is.

The original concept for this Noble Phantasm was a vortex of water that sucked the enemy in and made them unable to move. Melt Lilith would then thoroughly kick the crap out of the immobile victim, finishing with both the victim and her climaxing. [TL NOTE: think S&M]

So of course, it was axed. Even the god of art couldn’t win against the code of ethics.

 

■シアリム・エルトナム・レイアトラシア【人名】

ラニの匠。ラニを造した最後のb金g。

ラニを月に送り出した後、病死している。

アトラスのb金gとして自己の研究にのみ没^していたが、最後に”人gとして”ラニを作り出し、永眠した。

彼女がラニに「月に行きなさい」と命じるのは、自分たちを含めた人にとって、肉体を韦皮胧陇摔胜腚世界に人存Aの可能性はあるのか、とOめるためでもあったとか。

アトラスのb金gは他の魔gたちとは`い、”生命体として高次の段AへのM化”を目的としていない。

アトラスの最先事は”绀婴挝蠢搐蚧乇埭工搿堡长纫坏恪ＲはLく生き延びられるのなら、Nとして涮・退行してもかまわない、という考えであり、彼女もその思想を守り通したのだろう。

……その一端として、「ム`ンセルが手にえない怪物なら、自身ごと却せよ」という冷酷な命令も残している。EXTRAではラニが「父」とか言っていた荬するが、すまん、忘れろ。また、シアリムには出br、死にeれた双子のがいたとかなんとか。

 

Sialim Eltnam Re-Atlasia [character name] P184

Sialim Eltnam Re-Atlasia is Rani’s teacher. She was also the last Alchemist, and the one who created Rani.

After sending Rani off to the Moon, Sialim died of sickness.

As an Atlas Institute Alchemist she was completely focused on her research and only her research, but as her final work before death, she worked not as an Alchemist, but as a human being, and created Rani.

The reason that Sialim orders Rani to go to the Moon is to verify if the humans can abandon their bodies and continue to live in the cyber world.

Magus pursue the goal of “evolving to be higher level beings” but Atlas Institute Alchemists do not.

The Atlas Institute’s primary goal is to avoid a future where mankind is destroyed.

In short, this means that Sialim is not bothered if all of the human race must change form or regress as long as they secure their continue existence. Sialim surely just wants to carry out the Atlas Institute mission.

…Also to that end, Sialim coldly ordered Rani, “If Moon Cell doesn’t have what it takes, and is a monster that cannot be controlled, incinerate it completely, including yourself.”

In EXTRA you might have noticed that Rani says “father” at one point. Sorry, just forget about that. Also, when Sialim gave birth to Rani, Rani may have had a twin sister who died, or maybe she didn’t.

 

■ＳＧ【事柄】

シ`クレット・ガ`デン。

﻿直Uで秘密の花@。まんまである。

その人物がLしていたい、けれど知ってほしい、というアンビバレンスな趣味嗜好のこと。

人gはきれい事だけでは生きられない。真の相互理解を迎えるには心の_示は避けて通れない。

ＳＧはそれを明_なカタチにしたもので、ＳＧを暴く事は侵略行椁扦り、同rにH坌椁扦猡る。

コ`ド}から没になったが、センチネルたちのＳＧには背允群谩⒍嗪怪、ニンフォマニア、といったものもあったとかなかったとか。

また、偿互螗隶庭毪坤堡扦胜味方サ`ヴァントにもＳＧは存在する。

サ`ヴァントエンドを迎えたいのなら、ちょくちょくサブイベントをこなしてサ`ヴァントＳＧをコンプしなくてはならない。

余ではあるが、ア`チャ`とギルガメッシュのＳＧ画面のはっちゃけぶりは_kスタッフ内でも

「ちょっと待て、冷静になれ我々。いいのかコレ、まだあわてるrgじゃないぞ？」

とhを白幛丹护郡、Y局は”uずかしい事から逃げない”というＣＣＣのコンセプトが倮した。

 

SG (Secret Garden) [circumstance] P184-185

Secret Garden.

Translated literally it means secret garden. Which is precisely what it is.

It consists of an ambivalent preference or something that the character wants to keep secret, but at the same time also wants others to know about.

No human being can live completely without making a mistake, or be perfect in the eyes of all. You can’t avoid opening up your heart completely in order to achieve true mutual understanding.

A character’s SG presents their true self clearly. To open up a SG is both an invasion, and an act of love and affection.

Although it was axed due to moral issues, the Sentinel SG’s may have included things like their views on morals, very sweaty situations, and nymphomania.

Also not only the enemy Sentinels, but also allied Servants have SGs.

If you are aiming for a Servant ending, must complete their SG by doing the character related sub events.

To digress, the liberties we took with the CGs for Archer’s and Gilgamesh’s SGs had the staff saying, “Just wait a second. We need to cool down and think this over logically. Is this really okay? Shouldn’t we be worried?”

There was a lot of debate about the CGs, but they were kept in since the concept of CCC is about being unable to run from embarrassing things.

 

■ＣＣＣキャスタ`ＥＮＤ【ネタバレ】

タマモナイン！そういうのもあるのか。

これはＣＣＣ初期、アルタ`エゴたちが五体おり、サクラファイブと呼ばれていたの名残……というのは置いておいて。

キャス狐ＥＮＤでのSE.RA.PHはどうなったのかについてのa足を少々。

キャスタ`によって破菠丹欷骏喋`ンセル中枢は即座に自己驮するも、その在り方を改浃贰C能をQyメインからh境メインに移行しました。

]じられていた第二の宙《ソラ》は一般公_され、人はあらたな_拓地を手に入れたのです。

ようはオ`プンワ`ルドになったSE.RA.PHということ。これにより地球はおろか、々な天体から知的生命体がアクセスする事になり、子虚世界は新たなk展を遂げるのでした。めでたしめでたし。

まあ、それを台oしにするのもキャスタ`の行なんですけどね。

セイバ`ＥＮＤもここまでオ`プンにはなりませんが、似たような状rになっています。

 

CCC Caster End [spoiler] P185

Tamamo Nine! There’s even something like this in the game.

This is the name from early in the development of CCC when there were still 5 Alter Egos called the Sakura Five…

A little additional explanation about what happened to SE.RA.PH in the Cas-ko end is in order.

After Moon Cell Nucleus was destroyed by Caster, SE.RA.PH immediately self-reset and changed its mode of operation from being primarily observation to being primarily an environment provider.

The sealed second sky was opened to the public; a new frontier for mankind.

In short, SE.RA.PH became an open world. After that SE.RA.PH started being accessed not only by people from Earth, but also from other planets, and then the fabricated spiritron world came to be well developed. And everyone lived happily ever after.

Well, just leave it to Caster’s misbehavior to ruin it all.

The Saber end isn’t quite as open ended as Caster’s, but finishes in a similar situation.

 

■ＣＣＣ真ＥＮＤの主入公【ネタバレ】

真ＥＮＤで目める主人公ですが、あれは『元になった彼／彼女』が眠っている日本の私Oではなく、まったく`う鏊にある、放された医施Oでの。

天の逆月のKわり、最後に@が言った「すごいズル」とは、ム`ンセルの技gをtTして、ＣＣＣの主人公を地上に送り出す事でした。

ようは人工的に作られた完全な人g体に意Rを生させたということ。

（@は元がＡＩなので、人gとは`うまたeの素体）

その後、月の}杯檎がどうなったのかは月からxれた二人に知るよしはない。

レオが僬撙摔胜盲匹喋`ンセル中枢で彼とQするのか、はたまた生き残るのは凛かラニか。

あるいは正史通り、ＣＣＣという出来事を切りxした、最弱のマスタ`が中枢に至るのか。

それは数限りない、可能性という名の希望に氦沥课蠢搐卧である。

 

CCC True End Protagonist [spoilers] P185

This section is about when the protagonist wakes up during the True End and he/she is not in the private Japanese facility where his/her original is slumbering. He/she is in a completely different location, which is an abandoned medical facility.

In the conclusion of Heaven’s Fall, Sakura mentions something at the end about a “big cheat.” This refers to Moon Cell employing all of its capabilities to send the protagonist to Earth.

This means that the protagonist’s consciousness is reincarnated in the real world with an artificially created human body.

(Since Sakura is an AI, the base of her existence is different from that of humans.)

After that, since they are now far from the Moon, Sakura and the protagonist have no means of finding out what happened with the Holy Grail War.

Perhaps Leo won and is facing off against Moon Cell in Moon Cell Nucleus. Or one of the other remaining Masters might have won, so possibly Rin or Rani.

Or is it true to history and the weakest Master, who was not involved in the events of CCC, made it to the Nucleus?

There are countless possibilities, all which speak of a hope filled future.

 

■シ`ルド【地形】

サクラ迷mに点在するy不可能の防壁。

迷mにされた少女たちの秘密を守る心の壁。

ＳＧとB婴筏皮り、秘密が明らかになればそれを守る意xを失い、消绀工搿

あまり菠愤^ぎてもいけない。

 

Shield [terrain] P185

Unobservable defensive barriers that are scattered throughout Sakura Labyrinth.

These walls protect the secrets held within the hearts of the girls who were placed in the Labyrinth.

As in the Secret Garden, if their secret is revealed they lose the will to protect it, and are destroyed.

Secrets that are too fondly thought of are also risky.

 

■ジナコ・カリギリ【人名】

ＣＣＣで登訾工毳蕙攻咯`。

サ`ヴァントはランチャ`ことカルナ。

西欧のゲ`ムチャンプで、プレイヤ`スキルよりはプレイrg、やりこみ度で名をYせる人。ハンド﻿ルネ`ムは「じな子」。

日系ドイツ人で、母が日本人、父がドイツ人。

そこそこ格な家で、そこそこ大事に育てられた一人娘。中学のrに事故でIHを亡くし、そこそこの生活で一生食っていける程度のzbを手に入れた。

高校にM学せず、

（意思があってM学しなかったわけではない、ただ、lも行けといってくれなかったからズルズルと）

根っからオタク葙|のあった彼女は、世界中のオタクアイテムをぼちぼちIいあつめ、そこそこオタク雅なひきこもり生活を送り始める。

PieceJournal（略称ＰＪ）という欧州の巨大魇景澶摔瑜出没し、そこが彼女のオタコミニュケ`ションの觥Ｒするにネット人。

ＰＪでは『zbで引きこもり＝伽两M』などチヤホヤされてまんざらでもない生活……だと思っていた。

しかし、周欷危ㄖ醒生の同生）とか、ネット上のオタク友_が就やY婚といった}を出し始めるにつけ、なにか不安になっている。

 

「いやいや、ニ`トは真の伽两Mっすから」

 

……でも、何か、大事なものを置いてきてしまったような。

ネット上ではたとえがりでも作ったキャラであっても、一r的に不安は忘れられる。

しかしネットからxれ、ふと自分の部屋に振り返ると透明な不安に覆われる。

死ぬまで生活Mに困らないジナコには、金E面での不安はない。けれどこの先、一生『この生活』を送っていくのか、と考えると^にもやがかかって、シ`ツをかぶって眠りに逃げてしまう。

ジナコを包む不安は自分の人生への『Bめ』と、やはり自分の人生への『反省』である。

 

◆

                                   

ネット中毒者だったジナコはXい莩证沥锹}杯檎に参加した。

}杯檎に参加した理由は「人生のやり直し」。できればパパとママが死ななかった未来で、普通のオタク高校生として学校に通っている自分になりたい。

普通の友_と、普通の彼氏（…ができるのであれば）と、普通の女の子の人生をやりなおしたい。

それが彼女の本当のいだった。

しかし}杯檎に参加してみればまわりは天才だらけ、ゲ`ムは本荬钎伐鹰で逃げ訾胜贰

チキンなジナコは椁η挨らボイコットし、偶然つけた校hの隙g（}欤─艘きこもってしまう。

「ここで僬撙出るまでLれていれば}ないッスね～。ジナ子さん、マジ天才」

と自分にしてがるも、}杯檎がMむにつれ、七回椁Kわれば自分も消される事に荬扭い皮筏蓼Α

校hの隙gにある用T室で、彼女は校hからQりく校内放送に耳をAける。

}杯檎が五回椁たりになると『七回椁Kわったら校hごと消える』というFgを直できず、精神を病み、自]症そのものとなる。差し迫った死の恐怖に自家中毒を起こし、k狂寸前、あるいはk狂していたr、月のY趣寺浃沥朴を失った。

ＣＣＣでは死の\命から逃れられるかも、と少しだけ希望をいだすも、性格は浃铯椁骸⒅魅斯たちには非f力的。助かりたいと思うも、自分の心をられたくない、というスタンスでのらりくらりと状rに流されていく。

主人公にしてのみガ`ドが甘いのは、主人公がジナコと同じ”凡人”だから。

とことん自分本位で、樗伎激恰ぐうたらな十代のダメ人g。

が、カルナの言う通り、カタツムリにもカタツムリなりの衿持はある。最K局面において、ジナコはギリギリになりながらも、最低限の『自分の任』を果たそうと踏みとどまるのであった。

 

Jinako Karigiri [character] P185-186

Jinako is a Master that appears in CCC.

Her servants are Launcher and Karna.

A shut-in, and a game champion in Western Europe, however rather than winning through pure skill she made her name by emphasizing play time, speedruns, highscores and other unique play-throughs of games.

Her handle name is じな子(Jinako).

Her nationality is German. Her father is German, and her mother is Japanese.

An only child from a fairly strict household in which she was treated and raised fairly well. When she was a junior high student she lost both parents in an accident, and inherited a fairly large amount of money which was enough to live decently for the rest of her life.

She did not attend high school (Although she did not consciously decide to not go to high school, there was simply no one who told her to go, so she stayed home).

An avid otaku by nature, little-by-little she bought up otaku goods from around the world, and enjoyed a fairly comfortable hikkikomori (shut-in) otaku lifestyle.

Often haunting a mega popular European internet BBS called Piece Journal (Abbreviated as PJ) which served as her means of communication with other otaku. In short she is a net-hikky (internet hikkikomori / net recluse).

On PJ she was fawned over with the likes of “big inheritance + hikkikomori = you win at life” and for awhile Jinako thought that her lifestyle wasn’t half bad at all… but as news began to roll in of her otaku friends and old classmates from junior high getting jobs or getting married, Jinako started to feel a little uncertain about her lifestyle.

 

“No no no, being a NEET is being a true winner at life y’know.”

 

…But at the same time she somewhat felt like she wanted to leave behind something important.

Living through the strong fronted personality she built on the net, and pretending to have no troubles came to only provide temporary relief from her worries.

So when she would turn around into her room, away from her computer and the net, she found herself covered in a transparent unease.

Of course, with Jinako having enough money to live out her life, she was not worried about her financial situation. She was looking beyond that, pondering if she should really continue living like this forever. Thinking about her future clouded her thoughts , so she would hide under her sheets and escape into sleep.

The worries and unease that enveloped Jinako were made of her feelings of wanting to give up, and, as expected, her reflection on the life she had lived so far.

 

◆

 

Jinako, a former net addict, casually decided to participate in the Holy Grail War.

The reason she decided to participate is “To redo my life” and if possible she wants to create a future where her mother and father didn’t die and she goes to high school and lives out a normal high school otaku life. Normal friends, and a normal boyfriend (…if she can get one), and a normal girl’s life is what she desires. This is her true wish.

But after joining in on the Holy Grail War, she found herself surrounded by talented geniuses in a game with no place to run.

The chicken Jinako tries to boycott the war before the battles begin, and ends up holing herself up in an empty storage closet she finds by chance in the school.

“If I just hide here until the winner is decided there’ll be no probs~. Jinako, you are one smart cookie!”

Despite putting on a strong face like this just for herself, as the Holy Grail War progressed she realizes that once the seventh round has ended she too will be erased.

She realized because she could hear the announcements that sounded throughout the school building. About when the fifth round was happening Jinako, still unable to face the reality that once the seventh round finishes the school will completely disappear, fell mentally ill and became completely overcome with self-centered emotion. Due to the fear of imminent death she becomes addicted to her temporary home in the storage closet and just before going insane, or possibly at the very moment she went insane, she fell to the far side of the Moon and lost all her memories.

She may have escaped her fate of death in CCC, but after finding the smallest of hopes, her personality went back to normal and remains unchanged, and she is rather uncooperative with respect to the protagonists. Despite wanting to be saved, she doesn’t want to face her problems and what’s in her own heart, so she maintains a noncommittal stance and just goes with the flow.

The reason Jinako lets her guard down a little when around the protagonist is that the protagonist is also an “ordinary person” like she is.

Self-centered through and through, and with a defeatist mentality, she is a worthless good for nothing in her _0s. [TL  NOTE: the number is intentionally censored in the Japanese so we do not know if she is in her 20s, 30s, 40s etc]

However, like Karna says, “Even snails have their own dignity.” In the end, although just barely, Jinako stands firm and tries to fulfill the minimum level of her responsibilities.

 

■主人公【人物】

最弱のマスタ`。

デフォルト名は岸波白野（きしなみはくの）。

﻿Oめて一般的な17才の学生像。

クラスで三番目ぐらいの美形、というコンセプト。

……とは言うものの、女主人公のあまりの可郅丹ら「あれで三番目って、どんだけレベル高いクラスだよ`」と多くのユ`ザ`に指摘された。

ＲＰＧの主人公らしく、ゲ`ム中ではo口・o性・中立で通っている。

xk肢のテキストそのものが彼／彼女のk言で、普段はモノロ`グとして素朴な主QをZっている。

魔g《ウィザ`ド》としての能力は平均的。

魔g回路の|こそ高いが、目めるまでまったくえていなかったので宝の持ち腐れになっている。

}杯檎に参加したものの、予xがKわっても『月に来る前の』を思い出せず、自分は何者なのか、なぜ}杯檎に参加したのかを@得するためにLいをAけていく事になる。

适Г趣い盲皮馍活Tはえているので、日常生活に}はない。

ゲ`ム本では右も左も分からない白状Bだが、修得している一般教Bはちょっとおかしいレベル。

マトリクスの断片から各英たちの正体をあてる「真名当てイベント」では名探嗓肖辘瓮评砹Δ虬k]する。もとはs史マニアなのかもしれない。

どうでもいいだが、フランシスコ・ザビエルの人生について一家言持っているがある。

 

◆

                                   

また、ある欠片が望んだ希望でもある。

主人公はどうしようもないほど平凡であり、椁いらoFのh境で育った羊だった。

胩欷巫で待つ者は想う。

今回の}杯檎はどうあがいてもレオのものだ。

彼がそれに足る逸材であり、F在の地上の王だという事を把握している。レオとの面、その会はたとえ理解し合えなくとも意xのあるものになるだろう。

あの少年王は、g`いなくs代最の僬撙摔胜毪扔柘毪筏皮い俊

───だからこそ。

だからこそ、そのレオを破った主人公の『非凡の身で最を倒すほどに成Lした』在り方に、彼は感激し、救いをた。

椁い长饯人gを成Lさせる。

椁い瓮酩胩欷巫で、

己が思想のY晶を待ちAける。

驻郡・欷瑜Δ认イ蛘郅椁胜った彼／彼女が、燃え尽きた自身の骸《むくろ》を\り越える、その瞬gを。

 

Main Protagonist [character] P186-187

The weakest Master.

The default name is Hakuno Kishinami.

An exceedingly normal 17 year old student.

We designed him/her with the idea that he/she would be about the third most attractive in their class.

... Is what we intended anyway. A lot of players pointed out that with the female protagonist being as cute as she is, her class would have to be pretty high level in terms of student appearances.

Just like the protagonist of an RPG, Hakuno doesn’t speak throughout the game, has no personality, and maintains a neutral stance.

Hakuno usually expresses his/her ideas through simple monologue, but when the story comes to a branching point, the options presented are his/her own words.

He/she is a wizard of average ability.

Hakuno possesses high-quality magic circuits, however up until the point of their awakening he/she had not practised using them at all, so they are mostly wasted.

Although Hakuno ends up participating in the Holy Grail War, even after the preliminaries are finished he/she is unable to remember his/her memories from before coming to the moon. Hakuno has no idea who he/she is, or why he/she is participating in the Holy Grail War, and he/she continues to fight in order to find the answers to these questions.

Although Hakuno is affected by amnesia, he/she still retains basic knowledge about the world, so there is no problem managing his/her every day life.

After entering the main storyline of the game Hakuno is still in a completely blank state where he doesn’t even know the difference between right and left, and it seems like his basic education was rather odd.

Hakuno sports some amazing detective skills and inference ability in the sections where he/she needs to guess the true name of each heroic spirit by only going on the fragments he/she has gathered from the game matrix. Perhaps Hakuno was a history maniac in the past.

While not significant in any way, there is a passage in the game where Hakuno has his own opinion about Francisco Xavier.

 

◆

 

Also, Hakuno holds onto hope that was born from within some tiny part of him/herself.

Hakuno is extremely average in every way, and is like a sheep who grew up in a pen where there is no danger or need to fight for one’s survival.

So he holds on to the hope that he is indeed worthy of being in SE.RA.PH.

No matter how you look at it, this Holy Grail War belongs to Leo.

Leo is an outstandingly talented individual who is well suited to win the Grail, and Hakuno understands that Leo is essentially the king of the real world. When facing Leo, even if they are unable to come to terms, their meeting is surely something significant.

The young King Leo is anticipated to become the strongest individual yet to win the Grail.

―and that’s precisely why.

It’s precisely because Leo is the strongest that Hakuno can improve his/her ability through his/her prodigious body and manage to defeat his/her strongest opponent and catch sight of salvation.

It’s precisely because there is conflict that humans improve.

The King of conflict will take up SE.RA.PH’s throne, and propagate the crystallization of their ideas.

No matter how many times Hakuno was defeated, his/her knees did not buckle, and we await the moment where Hakuno overcomes the limits of his/her burned-out husk of a body.

 

■上ＡＩ【事柄】

}杯檎を一にMめるために作られた⑾肷命。

u造されたUはＮＰＣと同じだが、上ＡＩには_固たる人丐热烁瘛⒒辘与えられている。

上ＡＩは制作コストが高いため、一度の}杯檎ではオ`ルリセットされない。

彼らは定番のキャラクタ`として次の}杯檎に移行する。

マスタ`たちのO督役である言峰神父、

マスタ`たちの健康管理を担う@のほか、

校内の`法行椁虮OするLo委T、

日常を演出するミス・タイガ`、

iの\豹マキジ……等が_Jされている。

中にはマスタ`をIPする叵蓼虺证磨伐攻咯`カレンなる上ＡＩもいるらしいが、主人公が参加した}杯檎にはFれなかったようだ。

また、上ＡＩは@得したhを自分から消去する事はできない。どれほど惨なでも残しAけ、ム`ンセルに提出する事が彼らの大原tであり、存在意xだからだ。

 

High Level AI [circumstances] P187

These are artificial lifeforms created in order to allow the holy Grail War to proceed smoothly.

They may seem the same as NPCs because they are manufactured beings, but High Level AI have firmly defined liberties and personalities, and they also are bestowed with a soul.

Due to the high cost of manufacturing High Level AI, they are not reset even after a Holy Grail War has finished.

They make an appearance filling standard character roles in each Holy Grail War.

High Level AI include:

Father Kotomine, whose duty is to supervise the Masters.

Sakura, whose duty is to manage and maintain the Masters’ health.

Disciplinary Chairperson, who keeps an eye out for bad conduct within the school.

Ms. Taiga, who directs the schedule each day.

The mysterious black panther Makiji.

...and more.

 

The group of High Level AI also seems to include Sister Karen Caren, whose jurisdiction is carrying out the punishment of Masters, however she doesn’t seem to make an appearance in the Holy Grail War that the protagonist participated in.

Also, the memories that the High Level AI have obtained are unable to be deleted by themselves. No matter how sad and depressing a memory may be they are forced to keep it with them forever, and of course submitting their memories to Moon Cell is the reason that they exist.

 

■初期コンセプト【その他】

あくまで”EXTRAの後に作れたらいいな”レベルの妄想ではあったが、ＣＣＣの草案自体はFate/EXTRAの_k後期からスタ`トしていた。

_kは二三しF在のカタチに落ち着いたが、そのコンセプトは初期から浃铯盲皮い胜ぁ

「Fate/EXTRAの主}は「}杯檎」だったが、

ＣＣＣの主}は『人のエゴ、女性のエゴ』。

﻿ＲＰＧとしてSしみながら、

｜女の子（ヒロイン）の内面・秘密をのぞきる、女性の本性・欲望と峙する、といった要素を前面に打ち出す事を目指した。

以下は２００９年での初期企画。

 

『\@５人においまわされるＲＰＧ。

凶なモンスタ`に追いまわされるのではなく、半裸のボンデ`ジ美女に追いめられるインモラルな世界Q。ヤンデレスト`キング不思hのダンジョン。

五人の\@はそれぞれエロ可郅ぁエロ怖い、エロうざい、エロいたい、どうてもライダ`さんです本当に（以下略）、といったものに。

根本にはバカゲ`の要素もある事を忘れないように。どうしてこうなった！的な隙をいれること』

 

うん。基本的なラインはプレてない。きっと。

また、シナリオ面としてのテ`マとして欲望のF`（きせん）があげられる。

Fate/EXTRAのラスボス・トワイスはあの世界におけるト摔坤盲俊

彼はとして描かれるが、その日的は『人救罪or人のk展』で、k端はhいものではなかった。

に彼が}杯檎の最K的な倮者になったとしても、人は激pこそすれ缤訾悉筏胜い坤恧Α

してＣＣＣのラスボス候a（あるいは元凶）であるキアラは、彼とは正反の立ち位置として生み出された。

キアラの目的は『自分だけが永hに快Sを得る、そのために人を咨にする』という、利己主xの鼗じみたもの。

そのい自体は『Oめて平均的な、ちっぽけな人gのエゴ』なのでとは言い切れないが、そのY果はなとしてC能する。

EXTRAボスの大きないより、ＣＣＣボスの小さないの方がより大きな暮Δ颏猡郡椁筏皮筏蓼Α

Fate/EXTRAの骨子にあるものが『生存争による相互理解（肯定）、成L、咨、未来」であったのにし、

ＣＣＣの骨子にあるものは『生存套扭摔瑜胂嗷ゲ焕斫猓拒~）、退行、淘汰、K未』とする事で、EXTRAとＣＣＣは表Y一体になるよう制作された。

ＣＣＣ全体に漂う空荬Fate/EXTRAとg逆の、退的で野の狭いものになるが、最K的に与えられるものは本同、『Aいていく未来』をY末としている。

 

Original Concept [other] P187-188

CCC was at best a far-off idea that didn’t surpass, “Well it would be nice if we could do a follow-up to EXTRA sometime” and the first draft of CCC was only started after the development of Fate/EXTRA was complete.

During development CCC saw many big changes regarding what shape it would take before being finalized, but in the end we stuck with the very first concept we had for it.

Fate/EXTRA’s theme is “The Holy Grail War” and CCC’s theme is “An individual’s ego, the female ego.”

Alongside the RPG element we wanted to include another central gameplay element where the player would discover and confront what’s on the inside of the heroins; their thoughts and secrets, true nature and ego (desire).

Included below is the initial plan we set out in 2009.

 

“An RPG where five Black Sakura chase you around.

Rather than being chased around by evil monsters, the player will be chased around in an immoral world by half naked beauties wearing bondage themed attire. A strange dungeon filled with yandere stalkers. Each of the five Sakura take on one of the following traits: erotic-cute, erotic-scary, erotic-annoying, or erotic-pain. However you look at it, basically the same as Rider-san, really... (continuation omitted).

Please don’t forget that this game is meant to be a silly, ridiculous game. Why did things turn out this way?”

 

Indeed. There was little deviation from the initial concept. Probably.

Likewise with respect to the scenario the game does approach the ups and downs of human desire.

The last boss of Fate/EXTRA, Twice, was a great person within that world.

He is depicted as evil, but the goal of this was to make clear the choices of “salvation of mankind” or “development of mankind” and his origin is not an evil one.

Even if he ended up being the ultimate victor of the Holy Grail War, the world population might plummet, but mankind wouldn’t likely be completely wiped out.

In contrast, the candidate for last boss of CCC (or at least the main candidate) Kiara was created as the complete opposite of Twice.

Kiara’s goal is to attain eternal pleasure for herself, and in order to achieve that she plans on sacrificing all of mankind. She is an incarnation of selfishness.

Her goal itself is rather average, the result of the ego of a person who is very small minded, so it’s hard to classify her as evil based on this alone, however the actions and results born from her desire are purely evil.

The small wish of the boss of CCC would bring about a far greater disaster than the big wish of the boss of EXTRA.

Central themes in Fate/EXTRA are mutual understanding born from the fight for survival (mutual affirmation), growth, sacrifice, and the future.

In contrast the central themes of CCC are mutual lack of understanding born from attachment to one’s existence (mutual rejection), regression, elimination, and the end of things.

When put like this we can see that CCC and EXTRA were developed to be two sides of the same coin.

The general atmosphere that surrounds CCC is the complete opposite of Fate/EXTRA, making for a rather degenerate and shallow mood. However, in the end CCC offers a conclusion that is the same as EXTRA with its “continuing future.”

 

■女性敬称【その他】

レオ会Lの、会Lたる由Fのひとつ。

どんな相手であれきちんとミスをつけるのは士として当然の嗜みです。

ただしＡＩにしてはそのかぎりではなく、@はサクラと敬称なし。

ジナコ「なんでいちいちミスとか付けるッスか」

レオ「未婚の女性をミスと呼ぶのは礼xでしょう。それに、ミス、というきはたいへん素长坤人激い蓼工。皆さんもそうでしょう？」

凛「わたしは断然フロイライン派。き的に可zなコトこの上ないったら」

ラニ「私は……そうですね。女性の敬称は各国それぞれ素晴らしいものですが、マドモアゼル、が好みです」

ジナコ「やっぱりアンタらとは相容れね.凡っス。腐女子、オレらで十分だっつ`の」

 

Honorific Title for Females [other] P188

One of President Leo’s presidential affinities.

Regardless of who you are talking to, adding “Miss” before a female’s name is etiquette expected of a gentleman.

However, he does not use “Miss” when talking to AI, and he calls Sakura by solely her name.

Jinako: “Why do you always use “Miss” for every girl you meet?”

Leo: “Addressing unmarried women with “Miss” is proper etiquette. But more than that, the sound of the word “Miss” is simply marvelous. Don’t you all think so too?”

Rin: “I’m completely in the “Fräulein” camp. There’s nothing that could sound lovelier you know.”

Rani: “Hmm… as for me, well I think that each country has its own wonderful honorifics for women, but my favorite has to be “Mademoiselle.”

Jinako: “Oh man. You gals are birds of a feather y’know. Using just “Fujoshi” (腐女子) and “Orera” (オレら) is more than enough for god’s sake.”

 

■真言立川天流【M】

しんごんたちかわえいてんりゅう。

西罚玻埃常澳辘蓼蔷Aいた、真言立川流の傍流。

１９７０年以後も旧世界の魔g理をg践し、人里xれた山奥で小さなコミュニティを作っていた”生きた化石”だったが、２０１８年をCに教xを改め、ネットワ`ク社会に辘筏啃率澜绀文g馓澶趣筏铺Kった。

真言立川流の教えが基Pにあるため、その理は『自性清・二者合一・超力招来』の三脚からなる。

カルトながら急激に信徒をやしていったが、急激な信者大によって内部での亓φいが起こり、2020年にはその活婴蛲Ｖ工筏俊

教猡あったコミュニティには身内同士でし合った信者たちの亡骸が今も野ざらしになっているという。

 

Shingon Tachikawa Eternal Heaven Sect [organization] P188-189

Shingon Tachikawa Eitenryuu.

A branch of the Shingon Tachikawa sect that existed up until 2030.

Even after 1970 the Shingon Tachikawa Eternal Heaven Sect engaged in the practice of old world magic theory. Essentially a “living fossil” this organization was a small community created in a remote mountain area far from prying eyes. In 2018 it took the initiative to reinvent its teachings, and revived itself as a new-world magus organization that had adapted to the internet society of modern times.

The fundamental principals in Shingon Tachikawa teachings are: Luminous Mind, Union, and Great Power Development.

As a cult it rapidly increased its followers, but due to overly fast expansion there were internal power struggles, so in 2020 it stopped recruitment.

Members of this religious community fought each other to the death, and it is said that the bodies of the dead followers still lie in plain view.

 

■真言立川流【事柄】

真言立川流は真言密教の一派であり、『理趣U』（般若波_蜜多理趣品）をその根本U典とし、茶枳尼天をした教え。

`}r代に真言宗の阿w梨である仁が、B羽天皇暗⑽此焓录（永久の洌─巫铯且炼工伺淞鳏丹欷空邸そこで武i国立川のであるらとf同で生み出したg式がその基Aとされる。

その後、立川流は真言宗の最大派yとなるまで隆盛。

さらに`}幕府の衰退をて取った立川流は、幕府から天皇家への鞍替えを企恧工搿

立川流の奥xを会得した後醍醐天皇は吉野において南朝を_く。以降、立川流はほぼ常に南朝と共にあった。そして立川流は南朝の衰退と共に绀婴皮いのである。

……立川流のRは、邪宗である事やその教理に}があったからではなく、南朝方であった事に起因する。そして北朝方であった高野山（真言宗高野派）によって、その赝は氐椎膜素められ、教理U典は抹消されてしまった。

 

Shingon Tachikawa Sect [event] P189

Shingo Tachikawa is a branch of Shingon Vajrayana (Shingon secret tantra teachings) that is based on “Rishu-kyo” ([Full name:] Hanyaharamittarishishurishu-kyo or [Sanskrit:] Prajñāpāramitā-naya-śatapañcaśatikā) and its teachings revere dakini-deity.

In the Kamakura era, a high monk of Shigon Buddhism, Ninkan, failed in an attempted assassination of Emperor Toba (Eikyuu Era  [Eternal Era]) and was exiled to Izu as punishment. It is said that there, in the province of Musashi, Ninkan gave birth to the fundamental systems of Shingon Tachikawa in cooperation with the Onmyouji (spiritual medium) Kenren (from Tachikawa).

After that, the Tachikawa Sect spread and prospered to the point where it came to be the largest faction within Shingon Buddhism.

Furthermore, with the decline of the Kamakura Shogunate in sight, the Tachikawa Sect schemed to have the Imperial Family change its loyalties to prioritize Tachikawa over other sects. Emperor Godaigo, who mastered the secrets of Tachikawa, starting from Yoshino, spread it across the lands of the Southern Dynasty. After that, the Tachikawa Sect teachings were almost always present with the Southern Dynasty.

So with the decline of the Southern Dynasty, the Tachikawa Sect also fell into ruin.

...The suppression of the Tachikawa Sect didn’t occur because it was heretic or there was some problem with it’s teachings, it was due to its connection with the Southern Dynasty. Mount. Koya  (the birth place of Koya-san Shingon Buddhism) lies within the territory of the Northern Dynasty, and almost all the authority figures in Koya held contempt for the Tachikawa Sect, and has all the Tachikawa scriptures destroyed.

 

[TL NOTE: This stub presents a point of view that is somewhat different from what historians actually say about the Tachikawa Sect. The stub also seems to be written assuming that the reader has a decent idea of the history of Tachikawa Buddhism. Nasu basically took Tachikawa history and altered it a bit. Nasu does this in more than a few sections of this book.]

 

■真言立川流の概要【教x】

真言立川流のg式、および理は三つの点に立脚している。

ひとつめは『理趣U』に基づく自性清贰

人gの本性や生来の婴撙媳纠辞澶椁な物であり、悟りにがる物である。これは`解されがちだが、欲望を肯定する物ではない-密には、惑いや迷いにがる欲望は悟りの妨げであるが、\生の利益をったり、そのために自己を保つべく自己保存欲求を持つのは悟りにがる欲望であるとして肯定するという考え。

oこの概念は非常にyしく、真言宗の_祖空海をしてほとんどの弟子には教授しなかったという曰く付きのもの。原t的に阿w梨《あじゃり》以上でなければそもEのS可がない。

ふたつめは、二者の合一による一者へのNA、または⑦という概念。

これは道の『Yびついて太Oとなる』という概念から来たもので、おそらくは修Y道の天地自然との一体化からY力を得る技法や仙道の房中g、タントリック・ヨ`ガの手法も入されているものとられる。

みっつめが、自己の境界を破菠工毪工胧陇恰『その向こう』から力を引き出す技法である。

多くの龊悉稀⑷摔淙馐场Ⅳ~食、酒などで僧としての自律、理性、理Qなどを崩菠丹护郡趣いΑ

（ただしこの技法それ自体は、立川流ではg椁丹欷胜ったとするhもある）

立川流は、この三Nの技法をMみ合わせて、「茶枳尼天＝大日如来＝天照大神」と一体となることを最K目的とするものだった。

すなわち、自らをして宇宙の根本原理そのものとなす事で悟りを得ようとしたのである。

……キャス狐さん、なんかF方の下の方々、たいへんな事になってますよ……:？

 

General Overview of the Shingon Tachikawa Sect [doctrine] P189

Shingon Tachikawa’s scriptures and theories are based on three points of view.

The first is Luminous Mind based on “Rishu-kyo.”

Sex is a natural part of being human, and originally was considered to be something very pure that is connected with enlightenment. Sex tends to be assumed to be a simple pleasure, but strictly speaking it is not actually an act that affirms your desire. Desires that are connected with infatuation and indecision are an obstacle to enlightenment, but a pure sexual desire is a desire for the benefit of all living things, and it is something that you should maintain as part of your survival instinct. It is just affirming our survival instinct and thus is connected with enlightenment.

Of course, this overview is extremely difficult to understand, and it is said that even most of the disciples taught directly by the founder of Shingon Buddhism, Kukai, were not taught it. As a rule, those who were not of high monk rank or above were not permitted to read the related scriptures.

 

The second is Union, which is the concept of two beings sublimated into one being, and/or being reincarnated.

This is derived from the concept of Onmyoudo (Taoist) “Cosmic dual forces connected together become taiji” that was unified with the Shugendou concept of the universe and nature. It is from this unification that the techniques of miracle efficacy, Sennin art of love making, and tantric yoga methods were introduced into Tachikawa.

 

The third is the method of drawing out power from “beyond” by breaking down your own boundaries.

Is it said that this method made many monks lose their self-control, power of reasoning, and moral values due to murder or eating meat, eating fish, or drinking alcohol (However it is theorized that this method may have not actually been put into practice by the Tachikawa Sect).

 

Through the combination of these three kinds of thoughts and methods the Tachikawa Sect considered the unification of “Dakini = Dainichi Buddha [Vairocana] = Amaterasu Oomikami” to be the ultimate goal.

Namely, they tried to achieve enlightenment by becoming one with the fundamental truths of the universe.

...uhhh Cas-ko-san, it seems like your followers are pretty wack... is everything gonna be all right...?

 

[TL NOTE: taiji: The principle that embodies all potential things, incl. time and space]

 

■真言立川流の禁忌【教x】

々な黄嫘≌hで骋郅摔丹欷ちな立川流だが、それはO端な例にすぎない。

立川流の基本技法自体は真言宗の主流派となった折に真言宗全体に冥蓼盲皮り、真言立川流のgそのものは邪なものではないからだ。

真言立川流の行の代表とされる、髑t本尊（どくろほんぞん）などは日本の庑gではそれなりに一般的な外法^のg式の湫韦诉^ぎず、`}当rの_人であれば多かれ少なかれ了解、または使用していておかしくない技法である。

このため、真言立川流の禁忌もまた、原t的には教教猡谓忌と相通じている。

その最大はに逆らうこと。

教は原tとして、となった尊からその悟りに至る技法を授けてもらうというと弟子のvSから出﻿kした。

そして尊は、弟子に自分の考えに疑を持たずにひたすらそれに兢κ陇蛘hいた──疑っていいのは、弟子になるまで。弟子になるまではいくら疑ってもよく、むしろ疑い尽くしてそれがo理になってから弟子となる事がよいとされた。

ちなみに上の理由から、教は常にと弟子のvSを基本とし、悟りに至るための力や法力は、基本として血}（弟vSの不断のBA）によって受け@がれていると考えられている。

つまり教で悟りを得たり、法力を持つ事ができるのは尊のhいhいO弟子のvSにある者だけとされる。破Tとはこれを断ち切られる事であり、教ではそれまでの修行すべてがoにす事を意味する。

 

Shingon Tachikawa Taboos [doctrine] P189-190

The Tachikawa Sect is often made out as the villain in a lot of romance novels, but the novels are simply drawing on an extreme example and it does not represent the real Tachikawa Sect.

The fundamental methods of the Tachikawa Sect follow the main teachings of Shingon Buddhism and expand upon them. The methods of Tachikawa are not evil on their own by any means.

The representative “evil deed” that is taken up by others is the use of skulls as an object of worship, but really the use of skulls in rituals was not uncommon across Japan and in the Kamakura period the use of skulls was endorsed by many a Buddhist master, and the use of skulls was not considered to be something out of the ordinary.

Like this, the taboos of Shingon Tachikawa more or less align with those of fundamental Buddhist teachings.

The greatest taboo is to defy your master.

Buddhism is fundamentally a system where you [the disciple] attain enlightenment by using the methods left behind by the founder of Buddhism [the master] who became a Buddha, Shaka (Gautama Buddha. [TL NOTE: In Japan they usually say Shaka or Shaka-sama, but Gautama Buddha is his name in the Pali language (his original language, though now a dead language)) Seeing as the original Japanese text in this book writes it and annotates it as simply Shaka, I have left it as such throughout the whole book. The name Gautama Buddha would likely be familiar to more readers though, and is completely interchangeable with Shaka, so feel free to change it if you like.] So the relationship between master and disciple is core in the Buddhist system. And Shaka preached that disciples must not doubt his ideas in any respect, and must only obey― the only time a person may have doubt, is before they formally become a disciple. It’s fine to doubt as much as you like before becoming a disciple, but it best to only become a disciple once all your doubts have been cleared.

So for the above stated reasons, Buddhism has always been centered on the relationship between master and disciple, and the power of Buddhism to reach enlightenment is fundamentally passed down through the “bloodline” (the unbroken and perpetual master-disciple link continuity [TL NOTE: not an actual parent-child style bloodline]).

So essentially the only way to attain enlightenment through Buddhism is to become a very, very distantly connected disciple of Shaka, as it is he who has the power of Buddhism. So if you are excommunicated by your master, it means your link to Shaka will be severed, and all your ascetic practices (Buddhist training) until that point will be reverted to naught.

 

■真性魔【事柄】

EXTRA世界にあっても、魔の概念は人にとって最大の障害としてQわれる,

神が全知全能であるのなら、魔は人知o能の存在。

手の届く欷摔りながらQして理解できないY（ふち）だ。

staynightにおいて魔は挝铯筏存在せず、

本物───受肉した魔に人gは太刀打ちできないとされる。

（※受肉した魔を退散させた例は一件のみhされているが、それはまたeの）

たいてい魔は{くものとされ、人gの体を用いて受肉しようとPくが、苗床になる人gの精神が耐えられず、周欷四Г颏蓼散らして自菠工毪韦通例。

中には自らのIによって入gではなくなってしまい、Y果的に魔のカテゴリ`に含まれる人gもいるが、これは魔人化と呼ばれるもので真性魔ではない。

EXTRA世界において、魔{きであれ、自らのIで浠したものであれ、真性魔を生み出したF象は２０３０年F在、一つの成功例もない。

魔、魔人化、と打ってはいるが、その在り方はなる文明、なる惑星に住まう高次元生命体と浃铯椁胜ぁ￥胜摔筏恧长握JR宇宙における『人』ではなくなったのだから。

その在り方は二十世oに流行した、とある作神における邪神の在り方に近い。

ＣＣＣの真ル`トで渖《へんじょう》したある人物はこの域に_しながら、些なミスによって神の座から落した。

 

True Demon [circumstances] P190

Even in the Extra world, things which fall under the category of demons are treated as the greatest obstacle to mankind’s continued existence.

Humans think of God as a being who is all-knowing and all-powerful, but a demon is an existence that cannot be comprehended through human intelligence or knowledge.

The concept of what a demon truly is lay within reach, but it is part of an abyss that is impossible to truly comprehend.

In Fate/stay night, the only demons that appear are fakes; humans could never match up to a true flesh-and-blood incarnated demon.
(There’s only one record of a flesh-and-blood incarnated demon being dispelled, but that’s another story).

Demons are normally said to be beings which possess humans and try to make a human body their own, but the mind of any human they posses to make their own is unable to bear the great burden, and so the body and demon end up disintegrating into pieces which spread evil power into the surroundings.

This definition of demon also includes humans who have lost their humanity due to their actions and as a result fall into the same category as demons. However a human who has transformed into a demon is not a True Demon.

In the EXTRA world, in present day 2030, a True Demon has never been successfully born into the world, this includes through demons possessing humans and humans transforming into demons through their actions.

We talk about demons and humans transformed into demons, but really as far as we are concerned demons are no different than beings from a higher dimension that are also from a different planet with a different civilization. No matter where you go in the known universe, they would never be recognized as “people.”

The existence of a True Demon is close to that of the evil gods from a certain fictional mythology that was popular in the twentieth century.

In the True End Route of CCC, a certain reincarnated person who is essentially attained True Demon level loses their seat as a god due to a clumsy mistake.

 

■新部部L【ＮＰＣ】

エクストラP寺。略してエトマ。

}杯檎の予xでマスタ`候aたちをГ、野性味と崦廖丁そしてとろ味の混じったス`パ`ヒロイン。

もともと上部部LのO定であり、たいへん素晴らしい俊足なのだが、得意科目につかせるとり切ってうざい事この上ないので新部の部Lに涓された。

ＣＣＣでは一瞬しか出番がないのが悔やまれる。

彼女の活Sがたい人は漫画『晔窑翁斓亍唬磨伸映一郎／著一迅社）をポチるか、『マキジ大作椤护扦挨挨臁

 

Head of the Newspaper club [NPC] P190

Extra Makidera. Abbreviated as ExMa.

She guides the Master candidates through the preliminaries of the Holy Grail War. She is our Super Heroin who is rather rough around the edges, speaks vaguely and is not particularly quick to think.

Her original setting was to be the very talented captain of the track and field club, but as a character who specializes in being extremely annoying, we changed her as she fit better as the head of the newspaper club.

Regrettably she only makes a brief appearance in CCC.

For those of you who want to see more of her, check out (and buy) the manga “Ice Box Universe” (晔窑翁斓 by 磨伸映一郎(Mashin Eiichirou). Published by 一迅社 (Ichijinsha) [TL NOTE: https://twitter.com/eiitirou] ) or google マキジ大作(Makiji Daisakusen).

[TL NOTE: Yes all this stuff (aside from the twitter which I included for convenience) is actually written in the Japanese. I didn’t randomly add in this shout out to that manga.]

 

■スイ`ツ英【その他】

青キャスタ`ことキャス狐が自称したもの。

真名をLすとか、魂を^明するいとか、マスタ`のになるとか後回し。

とにかくロマンスとラブとハッピ`のために、日々面白おかしく生きる英をこう呼ぶ。

﻿キャス狐にとって}杯檎に伽敛肖胧陇膝マケみたいなもので、本命は主人公を幸福にする事らしい。

 

Sweets Spirit [other] P190-191

The self-appointed title of Cas-ko (Blue Caster).

Forget about hiding your true name, or proving the existence of your soul, or becoming your Master’s faithful weapon.

“Sweets Spirit” is what Cas-ko calls the heroic spirits who live for amusement and fun in the name of romance and love and happiness.

To Cas-ko surviving to the end and winning the Holy Grail War is no more than a bonus, and it would appear that her true mission is to bring happiness and good fortune to her master.

 

■水天日光天照八野石【宝具】

すいてんにっこうあまてらすやのしずいし。

スイ`ツ英・キャス狐の宝具。あまり使えない。

EXTRAではRとして表Fされているが、玉藻石《たまもしずいし》とよばれる神宝の中の神宝である。

石は出にて祀られていた、武日照命が天より持ち来たったという神宝であり、出大神の神体。

日本の述によると、朝廷の要によって出より持ち出され、後に河内に祀られるようになった。

おそらくは後の八咫《ヤタ》Rであり、つまりは天照大神の神体である。

石は物部の十N神宝《とくさのかんだから》の原型と考えられ、魂と生命力を活性化させる力を持ち、死者さえもKらせる冥界の力を秘めた神宝なのだとか。

あまりにチ`トなので、ゲ`ム本ではo限の魔力供oというカタチで手を打たれている。

また余ではあるが、玉藻石を祀っていた大国主とは神にとっての神みたいな存在。

キャス狐はああえてトップランクの神サ`ヴァントなのであった。

 

Eightfold Blessings of Amaterasu on the Weight Stone under the Sunlit Watery Heavens [Noble Phantasm] P191

Suiten Nikkou Amaterasu Yanoshizuishi.

The Sweets Spirit Cas-ko’s Noble Phantasm. She doesn’t use it much.

Within EXTRA it is described as a mirror, but it is the Tamamo Shizuishi, a very great sacred treasure.

The Shizuishi was enshrined in Izumo, and it is a sacred treasure said to have been brought to Earth from heaven by Takehideri no Mikoto, and is thought to be a vessel that holds the spirit of Izumo Daijingu.

According to the writings of Japanese scribes, it was taken from Izumo at the request of the Imperial court and was afterward enshrined in Kawachi.

It’s probably the Yata Mirror that came afterwards, in short, it’s the vessel that holds the spirit of Amaterasu Oomikami.

The Shizuishi is thought to be the prototype of Mononobe’s Ten Sacred Treasures (Tokusa no Kandakara), and is said to have the power to activate the soul and life force and even revive the dead.

This is far too powerful and cheat-like, so in the game we made it to just provide unlimited magical power.

This is once again digression, however the Ookuninushi that enshrines the Tamamo Shizuishi is basically the god of gods. Depite Cas-ko appearing as she does, she is indeed a top rank God Spirit class Servant.

 

■スペシャルマイル`ム【イベント】

EXTRA本でのスペシャルイベント。

味方サ`ヴァントの^去やらトラウマやら真名をける、本筋とはeの番外のこと。

スト`リ`をMめつつ、こまめにマイル`ムでサ`ヴァントとセラ充（SE.RA.PH充g）していればる事ができる。

ただし何のg`いか、キャス狐のみ五回橐越丹违榨楗疤跫がしい。

マイル`ムでのサ`ヴァント会xk肢で、キャス狐に「セ`ブポイントからやり直してくださいまし」と言われたらたとえ二rgぐらいセ`ブしていなくとも妞驻螭扦浃曛堡工伽贰

 

Special My Room [event] P191

This is about the Special My Room you can access while in the main story line of EXTRA.

It is a place that is removed from the rest of the game (the main plot) where you can discover many things about allied servants, such as their past, the trauma they’ve gone through, or even their true name.

You can access the Special My Room by continuing to progress the story, frequently visiting the My Room of allied servants, and fully upgrading SE.RA.PH. [TL NOTE: As far as I understand this says upgrade SERAPH but it could also be complete (as in clear seraph’s storyline or something?), prepare, or fill? Please edit if it turns out you can’t actually upgrade SERAPH in the game.]

However, while you may think it a mistake, from the 5th round onwards, the conditions that must be met to raise Cas-ko’s flag (and only for Cas-ko) become very severe.

When talking to her in her My Room, after selecting one of the conversation options if you hear her say “Would you be so kind as to try again from your last save point?” then even if you haven’t saved your game in the last two hours, you should definitely swallow your tears and reload.

 

■セイヴァ`【サ`ヴァント名】

者《ブッダ》。救世主のサ`ヴァント。

者とは悟りに至ったものを示す。

このサ`ヴァントを@得するマスタ`は、善はどうあれ『人を救う』理念に_眼している。

もっとも有名な者である尊は、自ら悟って者となった。彼は生きながらあらゆる苦から_放された。この『者になる教え』が教である。

しかし教では「これを学べば救われる」とは一言も言っていない。

教とは尊が者にいたった理念であり、尊は「この教えだけがへの道である」とは述べていない。者になる方法は人それぞれにある。

教において、人はみなになる可能性を秘めているとされる。人gは最K的にはみな悟りに至る。善もも有情もo情も、すべてはその^程にすぎない。

セイヴァ`がサ`ヴァントとして召兢辘袱郡韦稀そのマスタ`の苦があまりにも韦皮たく、また罪深かったからだ。

”この魂には一切の救いがない。

ならばせめて、彼がった人のY末まで、

ともに有りAけましょう───”

セイヴァ`はマスタ`にカをJしたのではなく、

椁い瓮酩舜缺を示したにすぎない。

……そのQ生から死去まで檎と向き合いAけた人物。檎を憎みながらも否定しきれず、苦行をiみAけた男の最期を看取る、沙_洹钉丹椁饯Δ袱濉筏位à韦瑜Δ恕

 

Saver [Servant] P191

Buddha. The Savior Servant.

Being a Buddha means that one has attained enlightenment.

The Master who summons this servant, regardless if they are good or evil, must have awakened a strong desire to “save mankind.”

The most famous Buddha Shaka achieved enlightenment on his own. While still alive he was liberated from so-called “suffering.” His “teachings to attain Buddhahood” are what makes up Buddhism.

However in Buddhism there is nothing that says, “If you study this you will be saved.”

Buddhism is the collection of principles that Shaka followed to reach enlightenment, and Shaka never proclaimed that his teachings were the only path to attain Buddhahood.

The path to enlightenment varies from person to person.

As far as Buddhism is concerned, the potential to become a Buddha is present within everyone. Every human will eventually attain enlightenment. Of course this includes those who are good as well as those who are evil, those who are kind and those who are heartless; everyone is subject to the process of becoming a Buddha.

The reason that Saver answers the summons to become a servant is that the master’s suffering is too great and cannot be ignored, or the master’s sin is too great.

“There is no way for the soul to be saved.

Well then at least until he has realized the result he desires for the human race,

I will walk alongside him.”

Saver has no desire to lend his powers to a master, he only cooperates out of mercy and benevolence he feels for the king of fighting.

... For this person who has been constantly embroiled in battle from birth and till death. Savior will become a shield for the final chapter of this poor soul who despite resenting war, was unable to deny it, a forced to walk a pain-filled path. Like the flowers of a saul tree.

 

■西欧y【M】

ハ`ウェイをP^にしたUg馓濉

EXTRA世界における地上の王。

来るべきY源枯fを早い段Aから予、杞nし、その解Q策として北Oの管理に心していた。

その基Pにはい信仰の力があり、ハ`ウェイの下に多くのYbが集まった理由として、}堂教会の助けがあったと言われている。

﻿このr代における}堂教会の事g上の指д摺ラウレンティス枢C卿とハ`ウェイは┮猡伍vSにある。

 

West Europe Plutocracy [organization] P191-192

The economic organization headed by Harwey.

Harwey is effectively the king on Earth in EXTRA.

At a very early stage Harwey predicted that the world’s resources would run dry, and developed an unsuitably large fear of what might happen. He came up with the solution of carefully managing the north pole, and gave his undivided attention to it.

The foundation of his organization had a lot of religious power, and it’s speculated that the Holy Church helped him out because a huge amount of financial resources soon gathered under Harvey.

The defacto leader of the Holy Church in the world of EXTRA, Cardinal Laurentis, does have a good relationship with Harwey.

 

■}堂教会【M】

世界を二分する宗教の一つ。

大崩菠斡绊でその宗教基Pを失いはしたものの、新たな方のもと道修正をし、えXTRA世界においてもい影力をS持している。

主による奇を鳏菠肼}堂教会と、

人による神秘を目指す魔gf会。

この二大萘Δ椁いFate/staynightでのバックボ`ンでもあるが、EXTRA世界においては、椁い僬撙下}堂教会となっている。

とはいっても}堂教会もその在り方が立rより浠しており、刂\g数を得意とするラウレンティス枢C卿がイヤイヤながら法王をもり立てている。

彼が嫌がっているのは「自分のような逆のが法王の後@人など片腹痛い」という理由らしい。

 

The Holy Church [organization] P192

One of the two big religions in the world.

Although the Holy Church somewhat lost its religious foundation due to the effects of the Great Collapse (the pole shift), it developed a new policy and adjusted its trajectory, and within the world of EXTRA maintains considerable power and influence.

On one hand there is the Holy Church, that praises the miracles that come from their holy one.

On the other hand there is the Mage’s Association, that aims to uncover all the mysteries related to man.

The battle between these two great forces form the backbone of Fate/Stay Night, however within the world of EXTRA the victor has already been determined as the Holy Church.

Well, even with that being said the Holy Church has changed since the time of its founding, and Cardinal Laurentis, who usually specializes in trickery and working behind the scenes, has begrudgingly accepted to become the Pope.

Purportedly the reason that he doesn’t want to become the Pope is because, “I’m such an atrocious fellow that it’s ridiculous to think that I could be the successor of the Pope.”

 

■セイバ`【サ`ヴァント】

主人公と契sするメインサ`ヴァントのひとり。

rやかな赤色のドレスに身を包んだ、自称・男装の少女士。他のセイバ`と混同しないよう『赤セイバ`』と呼ばれる事が多い。

一人称は『余』。あるいは『この身』。彼女が「私」と口にするrは皇帝でなくなったrだけである。

主人公の呼び方は、

契s者として身をAけるrは『奏者』。

いっさいの私情を挟まず、ただに丐筏胜てはならないrは『マスタ`』。

ひとりの乙女として接するrは『そなた』。

ちなみに、}杯檎中セイバ`が『そなた』と呼びかけるのは主人公だけ。

 

自らを万能の天才と称し、たいていの事は（ムリヤリ）gF化させるワガママ皇帝。

尊大なB度、自信骸─拾k言から暴君と勘`いされがちだが、基本的にあらゆる者の在り方を”それはそれで良し”とJめ、拒~しない性格。

彼女が定めるものは社会的な善ではなく、人g的な美しさの在り方が基胜趣胜搿

演　⒏琛⒔}画、刻、と芸gに理解があり、ことあるごとに作品を作っては

「これはどうだ？良いであろう？で、出来は少々マニアックかも知れぬが、ちゃんと良いであろう？」

と婺郡窃uを求めてくるかまってちゃん。

本来ならセイバ`のクラスにはパラメ`タ`が届かないのだが、そこはそれ、皇帝特丐扦胜螭趣した。正しくは指]官系のサ`ヴァント。

 

サ`ヴァントとしての主、望みはない。

なぜなら彼女はそこにあるだけで完壁だからだ。

少なくともセイバ`本人は

「余は、余として思い、Zり、眠るだけで完全なのだ。いかなr代であれこの身がある事。それ自体が、ロ`マの威光をFしている」とZる。

すでに完壁だから、これ以上求めるものがない。

ただ自分が自分ごしてある事が最高の褒美なのだ、と_Qしている。

このように、自分の中に~のもの……信念、Q……があるので、たいていの出来事には反kしない。

セイバ`にとってjれないものは”自分が、自分らしく振る舞えない事”である。

唯我独尊なセイバ`がサ`ヴァントとして使われる事に{得しているのは、サ`ヴァント自身が”最を^明するもの”として契sするものだから。

 

「ん？自分が最高である事を^明するのであろう？

その在り方なら文句はない。余は余にuじない椁い颏工毪坤堡韦长取Ｂ冶─试、余の契s者がカエルであっても、カエルとともに椁ぁ⒆预椁uじる事なく僬撙郡甑盲毪韦扦れば、それは余にとっての誉れになろう」

 

という、すごいポジティブシンキング。

そんな赤セイバ`なので、未熟な主人公を叱る事は﻿あまりない。不甲斐ない、弱々しい、呆れかえる、と感想はこぼすものの、心底から下しはしない。

”弱々しい”等は、彼女にとってホントに素直なuにすぎないのである。

なので、主人公がマスタ`として成Lし、信mを深めるとよりい、まっすぐな好意を抱くようになる。

「ええい、もう少し余にかまえっ！

そなたの契s者は余だぞ、余を一番にQうがよい！」

かまってもらいたくて仕方のない、ワンコ皇帝の爆Qである。

 

◆

                                   

しかし、彼女を召兢工毳蕙攻咯`はまずいない。

彼女の真名はある宗教Qでは大にあたり、彼女の人生のY末も悲惨なものだった。

セイバ`は皇帝であると同rに、自分を天才と疑わない廿耳g家で、彼女にとって~の正xとは”美しくあること”のみ。

味方であれ、长扦れ、市民であれ、自分であれ、この定xから外れたものを彼女が郅工胧陇悉胜ぁ

それは契s者であるマスタ`も同じ事。彼女はQして、hいものには兢铯胜ぁ

そんな『美』などという主Qを判断基胜摔工氡器を\婴筏郡る魔gはいないだろう。この英との契sは、あまりにもリスクが大きすぎるのだ。

 

「……まあ、それも当然よな。

魔gとは明で、かつ算高いものよ。

余を信mし、命をAけるR鹿者であるQがない」

 

などと、英の座でアンニュイに^ごしていたセイバ`。

寂しがり屋だが、それ以上にFり高い彼女は自分の安婴辘悉护骸⒆陨恧韧格の天才としか契sする荬悉胜ったのである。

そうして、何度目かの予xのKわり。

今回も自分を呼ぶ者はいなかったな、とx定の訾螂xれようとしたr、彼女は小さな声をいた。

振り返れば、そこにはl死でありながらも立ち上がろうとする、名も知らぬ何者かの姿があった。

くはない。

xばれた才もない。

そもそも一人前の魔gですらない。

けれど───暗中の星のようにきらめく、Qして消えないN火をた。

瞬g、彼女はlけだしていた。

胸にあるのは伏した何者かへの情（なさけ）ではなく、そびえる天への怒りだった。

彼女とて英雄として没した者。

祈りは届かず、弱者は弱者のまま消え去るのが世の常だと知っている。

知っているからこそ我慢は出来なかった。

あれほどの想いをき届けなくて何が天か。

あの者は死中においてさえ、『もういい』ではなく「まだ椁Α护瓤工盲皮い搿

 

「そのないに辘à踏趣いΔ韦胜椤もはや天\などどうでもよい！あの莞撙せ辘谓肖婴恕⒂啶辘à氦筏坪韦趣工氅ぉぉぃ　

 

セイバ`はマスタ`による召兢扦悉胜、自らの意思でx定の訾宋瑜そ丹辘俊

あれほど嫌がっていた自分の安婴辘祟^痛をえつつも、彼女は名もoい人gにZりかける。

 

「辘à瑭ぉぉい饯胜郡余の奏者《マスタ`》か？」

 

◆

                                   

ＣＣＣでは白い花嫁衣装で登觥

セイバ`ブライド、嫁セイバ`、といった鄢皮つけられている。アポクリに赤いセイバ`さんも出てきた事だし、そろそろEXTRAとＣＣＣ共通の鄢皮蚩激à郡ぁ５は楼互ぅ些`……だめか。だめだな。

ＣＣＣにおけるライバルは赤ランサ`。

アイドルとして切磋琢磨しあうvSになってほしい。どん引きのUsを持つ者同士、いろいろなところでみを共有できるvSになりそうだし。

また、『着替え・水着』をゲットしたrのボイスは﻿必。丹下セイバ`のハ`トキャッチカのＭＡＸが、あそこにある。

 

Saber [servant] P192-194

Saber is one of the main Servants who can be contracted by the protagonist.

Her body is wrapped in a bright red dress. However she is a self proclaimed cross-dressing young swordswoman.  She is often called Red Saber in order to differentiate her from the other Sabers.

She refers to herself with 余 (yo) or この身(kono mi C literally: this body). She only uses 私 (watashi) after she has lost her position as Empress.

When contracted by the protagonist she refers to them as奉者 (houmono C literally: revered person).

Red Saber never lets her personal feelings interfere, and only at times when she must make use of her sword does she call the protagonist Master.

When talking to a young maiden alone she refers to them with そなた (sonata).

By the way, the only one Red Saber ever says そなた (sonata) to during the Holy Grail War is the protagonist.

 

Red Saber is a self-proclaimed genius who is talented in everything. She is a selfish Empress who can realize almost anything she wants (through force).

She is often misunderstood and thought to be a tyrant because of her arrogant attitude and extremely confident way of speaking, however she usually acknowledges each individuals unique way of life and does not deny the lives of people who are different from herself.

Red Saber doesn’t judge others based on social standards of good and evil, her standards revolve around the beauty of a person’s existence.

She has tried her hand at most fine arts including writing plays, songs, painting, and sculpting.

After completing a new work she begs for approval with teary eyes:

“What do you think of this? It’s quite good don’t you think? It might be a bit on the maniac side of things, but it’s good nonetheless, right?”

As you can see, she is quite the attention seeker.

Her parameters and stats don’t make her good enough to be a Saber class Servant, but she somehow managed to snatch Saber class with her Imperial Privilege.

Properly she should be a commander-type Servant.

 

Red Saber has no particular wish or desire as a Servant.

Why? Well that’s because she is already perfect simply by existing.

At least, as Red Saber likes to say:

“I am complete just with my thoughts, my words and speech, and sleep. Regardless of what era I’m in, I will always be as such. This in itself symbolizes the authority and power of Rome.”

She is already perfect, so there is nothing more to wish for or desire.

She has the philosophy that simply being herself is the greatest reward of all.

She has unshakable, absolute beliefs and values within herself, so she doesn’t feel the need to oppose whatever is happening around her.

The one thing that Red Saber can never accept is acting in a manner that is unlike herself or not true to her values.

The egocentric Red Saber can accept becoming a Servant because being a contracted Servant is part of proving that she is the strongest.

“Hm? You desire that I prove I am the best? I see nothing wrong with that. I simply will fight so as to not shame myself. To speak vulgarly, even if my Master was a frog, and I could fight alongside that frog to victory in a manner in which I do not shame myself, it would certainly be a great honor to me.”

She is a very positive thinker.

 

This is why it’s rare for her to scold the inexperienced protagonist. Although she is surprised at and complains about the protagonist’s timidity and frailness, from the bottom of her heart she isn’t looking down on him/her.

“Frail” and similar are actually, as far as Red Saber is concerned, just honest appraisal.

So when the protagonist improves as a Master, and the trust they feel for each other deepens, she is able to be affectionate in a more direct manner.

“Oi, you need to pay more attention to me!

I’m the one with whom you have a contract, so you shall put me before all others!”

This is how the attention-starved puppy Empress who really, really wants you to pay attention to her came to be.

 

◆

 

In the first place, however, there is no Master who wants to summon her.

Her true name is the same as that of a great evil in a certain religion, and her life ended in a wretched, miserable manner.

At once Red Saber is an Empress, and an artist who has no doubt about her own genius talent. To her absolute justice is only “beautiful things.”

Whether ally or enemy, her citizen or herself, she refuses to love anything that doesn’t fall under her definition of beauty.

Masters are, of course, subject to the same treatment. Red Saber will never obey someone who fails to meet her criteria.

It goes without saying that there is no Magus who would want to employ a weapon that judges all things based on “beauty.” There’s just too much risk involved in contracting her.

 

“…Well, that’s only to be expected.

Magus are wise, and very calculating people.

There is surely no one so stupid as to trust in me.”

 

These are the words of Red Saber who spent many idle, boring days in the Throne of Heroes.

Although lonely, her high pride won’t let her settle for just anyone, and she plans on only contracting with a genius who is on her level.

And so, at the end of the umpteenth Preliminaries, as she was about to leave the Servant selection room, thinking that once again there was no one who would call her name, she heard a small voice.

When she turned around, she saw someone on the verge of death trying to stand up, a person whose name she didn’t know.

They weren’t strong.

They had no outstanding talents.

They weren’t even a qualified Magus.

But…there was a kindling flame that refused to fade like a star in the pitch black sky.

She immediately rushed toward them.

In her heart she held no sympathy for the figure prostrated on the ground, rather her heart was filled with anger against the heavens.

Even though she was rejected as a Servant, she knew that it was the way of the world for the weak to disappear from the world with their prayers left unheard.

It’s precisely because she knew this truth that she couldn’t stand the heaven that would abandon such a strong desire.

The figure on the ground was on the border of the afterlife, yet still they didn’t give up and chose to fight on.

 

“If the heavens won’t answer the impeccably pure wish of this pour soul, the will of the heavens is no longer of any matter! How could I not answer the cry of that noble soul!”

 

As such, Red Saber was not summoned by a Master, instead she imposed her own will on the Servant selection room.

Despite rejecting settling for something other than a genius of her level to the point that she had a splitting head ache, she asked the nameless person the following:

 

“Answer meCCCare you my Master?”

 

◆

 

In CCC Red Saber appears wearing a white bridal dress.

Earning her the loving nicknames of Bride Saber and/or Wife Saber. Seeing as there is now another Red Saber in Fate/Apocrypha I feel like we need to think of a nickname in common for the EXTRA and CCC version(s) of Red Saber. Tange Saber…no? Yeah, I guess not.

Her rival in CCC is Red Lancer.

I hope they can become good friendly rivals. Seeing as both of them have a pretty bad track record as far as reactions to their performances go, they probably have a lot in common.

Another thing to note is that the voice line Red Saber says when you acquire the swimsuit item is a must-hear. That line, more so than any other line, is said by Tange Saber in a way that will make you fall for her.

 

■}杯【事柄】

かつては『あらゆるいを叶える望C』を指した言~だったが、EXTRAでは『ム`ンセルの使用亍护蚴兢埂

膨大な地球のシミュレ`トhを保管するム`ンセルをEすれば、そこにはかならず『F方が望む未来の地球』が存在している。

ム`ンセルを使える事になった『F方』は、ただ一言、ム`ンセルに告げればいい。

『この、私にとって理想の未来を再Fしろ』と。

ム`ンセルは速やかに地球をその未来のカタチに\んでいくだろう。そのための方法を、g行手段を、月はすべてRっているのだから。

例えば『地球人の女の子ぜんぶワイの妹にしてほしい』とえば、きっと十年ぐらいで地球はそのような社会形式になると思われる。

あるいは、その簸『リアルにられる』装置を作るため、地球全体がそのように\婴丹欷搿

人gは人gが想像する欷摔いて、gFできないものはない。それがどのような幻想、}空事であっても、体Yする手段はあるのである。

 

Holy Grail [circumstances] P194

In previous works the term Holy Grail referred to a wish granting machine that could grant any wish, but in EXTRA this term refers to the right to use Moon Cell.

If you browse through the massive amount of records and data that Moon Cell holds, you will certainly be able to find a version of Earth with the future that you desire.

The you who has obtained the right to use Moon Cell need only say the following to Moon Cell:

“Create the future that is ideal to me.”

Moon Cell will quickly set about to bring the state of Earth to match the shape of the future you desire. The Moon has all the necessary knowledge and physical means to change the world.

For example, if you were to wish “Make all the girls on Earth my little sisters.” It’s thought that in about ten years or so all societies on Earth would have changed to be so.

Or alternatively, all of Earth would be managed and directed to work in order to make a device to allow one to experience that dream realistically.

There’s nothing that the human race can’t realize as long as it’s within the scope of human imagination. No matter what kind of fantasy, no matter how unrealistic, there is a way to realize and experience it.

 

■}杯檎【事柄】

 

『け、数多の魔gよ。

己が欲望・で地上を照らさんと、

T君らは救世主たる罪人となった。

いかなるr代、いかなるr月が流れようと、椁い颏猡盲祈点をQするのは人の理。

 

月に招かれた子の世界の魔gたちよ。

汝、自らを以て最を^明せよ。

胩臁钉筏皮蟆筏斡褡は、

最もいいのみを迎えよう───』

 

◆

 

ム`ンセルによって_かれた}杯争Z椤

月の内部に作られた七つの海を舞台にした、128人のマスタ`による生存争のこと。

ム`ンセルは定期的に地上から人gを呼び集め、一度だけム`ンセルの使用丐蛴毪à胧陇蟪辘吮摔椁蚋わせる。

椁い膝醛`ナメント方式で行われ、128人のマスタ`たちが一T打ちで椁盲皮い、最後の一人になるまでAけられる。

一回椁搐趣税胧のマスタ`が散っていくデスゲ`ムであり、一度参加した以上、最後の一人になる事でしか生は叶わない。

ム`ンセルは"最の一人"を求めているのではない。この生存争そのものがQ察象であり、人gを知るための物差し《スケ`ル》としてC能している。

もちろん僬撙何を望み、どんなY果を招くのかも人gを知るための数として入力される。

 

Holy Grail War [circumstances] P194

“Many Magus of the world. Listen.

Thou must illuminate the world with thy desire,

My friends, who are even deemed criminals in the eyes of the Savior.

In any era, as long as time continues to flow,

Achieving the summit through battle is the providence of man.

 

To all Magus who were beckoned by the Moon to its cyber world.

Thou must exceed thyself and prove thee be the strongest.

The throne of SE.RA.PH is,

Bound to only answer the strongest of wishes――”

 

◆

 

The Holy Grail War created by Moon Cell.

This is the fight for survival between 128 Masters that takes place on the seven seas stage that was created inside the Moon.

Moon Cell regularly summons and gathers humans from Earth, and makes them compete for the right to use the power of Moon Cell just one time.

The competition is carried out in tournament style, and the 128 Masters fight single elimination battles until there is only one standing in the end.

This competition is a death game where half the participants are eliminated each round. Once you have entered the Holy Grail War, the only way to return home alive is to become the ultimate victor of the tournament.

Moon Cell does not desire “the strongest individual.”

This battle for survival is just an object of observation, and functions as a method to adjust and calibrate the metrics used to measure humans.

Of course regardless of what the victor wishes for, and what kind of conclusion their wish may bring about, everything is recorded in order to better understand humans.

 

﻿■世界情荨臼卤】

それはgやかでありながら、

いずれLれるK末を受け入れた世界。

 

１９７０年代にk生した大崩病顶荸`ルシフト》を皮切りに、急速なY源不足から人の生活はp衰、bIのs小もあいまって破b、破`する国家がA出した。

二次暮Φ膜首匀暮Αバイオハザ`ドも多kし、２０００年には地球のt人口は三分の二にまで激p。

石油Y源は枯fし、使用を制限され、アラブT国はかつての力を失った。

人は新たなエネルギ`窬虻・北Oの_kに\り出すが、その支配丐未蟛糠证衔髋罚ē烯`ウェイをはじめとするy）にあり、事g上、彼らは地球の３０％を手にする事になった。

西欧yは独裁者にはならず、よき指д撙趣筏瀑Y源を管理し、ヨ`ロッパだけではなく地球人全体の存Aに努める事を宣言。人Nをわないy民の受け入れに努め、新r代の都市国家を形成した。

西欧yの管理下にある地域では困、争はなく、理想的な都市\婴なされる事になった。

Y果、先M的な文明はユ`ラシア大西部に集中。以後は困にあえぐ国々にY源援助を行い、阆陇思{めながら大していった。ハ`ウェイをP^とする西欧yが地球の指丐蛭栅盲克查gである。

西欧yは都市を管理しながらも宇宙_kにvわる技gMiをすべて鼋Y。

“人にこれ以上の技gSMは必要ない”とし、氐驻筏抗芾砩缁幛蚰恐袱筏皮い搿

 

その一方、西欧とイスラムとの立はより激化し、争は~えない。

イスラムは西欧yの『C械的な都市管理・Y源管理』を非yし、氐卓椁えに入っている。

が、国としてのカタチを失いつつあるイスラムではゲリラ的な椁い筏Aけられず、彼らが西欧yにl逐されるまであと五年ほどと言われている。

 

World Situation [circumstances] P195

On the surface it is a calm and gentle world,

But it is in fact a world that is facing its final curtain call.

 

Starting with the Great Collapse (the pole shift) that occurred in 1970, human civilization declined due to a sudden lack of resources, coupled with the reduction of industrial production, a continuous stream of nations faced bankruptcy and failure.

Compounded with the effects of the Great Collapse, numerous biohazard zones caused by natural disasters appeared, and by the year 2000 the population of the Earth was only 66% of what it once was.

Oil was mostly exhausted, and its use became regulated. With this the Arab oil countries lost the power they once held.

Mankind turned to develop a new energy frontier: the North Pole. However the rights to the North Pole were mostly held by the West Europe Plutocracy (Harwey’s Plutocracy), and the Plutocracy came to be the defacto owners of 30% of the world.

The West Europe Plutocracy did not act like a cruel dictatorship, and declared to all that it would manage and distribute the remaining resources to ensure the survival of mankind, so they helped not only Europe but everyone around the world. The Plutocracy ushered in a new era of city-nations and strove to promote universal acceptance of refugees regardless of race.

Under the direction of the West Europe Plutocracy, cities around the world created an ideal system of city management which eliminated most poverty and strife.

The result; an advanced civilization was realized, mainly focused in the western part of the Eurasian continent. From then on countries who were suffocating from poverty were given resource assistance, and the Plutocracy continued to expand its umbrella of protection. This is when Harwey, as head of the Plutocracy, effectively gained enough power to be considered the ruler of the world.

Alongside its management of cities, the Plutocracy also put a freeze on all outer space related technology development.

Proclaiming, “Mankind has no need for further technological advancement.” the Plutocracy aimed to refine and regulate the management of society.

 

Meanwhile hostilities between West Europe and Islam intensified, and there was endless conflict.

Islamic countries blamed their downfall on the “machine-like management of cities and resources” and prepared to relentlessly fight back against the factions of West Europe.

However, the Islamic countries were losing their identity as nations, and were unable to continue fighting back properly, so they were resigned to just using guerrilla warfare. It is said that the Islamic resistance will be driven back and defeated in about 5 years.

 

■⑸院キアラ【人名】

ＣＣＣで登訾工毳蕙攻咯`。

二十代後半の日本人。正しくは⑸院祈荒とく。

サ`ヴァントはアンデルセン。

尼僧服の、天然でエロいおさん。

「あらあらまあまあ」とおどけながらも、その仕草はアルタ`エゴたちより扇情的という困った人。正直、性欲を持て余す。

尼僧服に身を包んでいるものの、服の上からでも分かる体のラインは~世の美女のもの。ちなみに、は剃しておらず^巾の下に{めている。

一人称は「私《わたくし》」。

三人称は「皆さん」、名前にさん付け。

基本的には清楚な女性口{に。

柔らかで淑なQ、言~遣いでありながら、言~のはしはしに妙な色っぽさを持つ。

性格は内向的、弱荨⒛拥摹

温厚だがeO的。病弱そうにえて活k。人情に弱く慈悲に深い。ものの道理をとらえ、万人の心情をiみ取り、彼らの立・苦を正しく理解する思]深さを持っている。

外も中身も、楚々とした美しさで氦沥坎排……なのだが、どこかぽんやりしているというか、耳年なところがあり、『}女』というよりは『しいおさん』になってしまう。

毒舌サ`ヴァント・アンデルセンに手をきながらも笑をたやさない人格者である。

 

殛L能力は乏しいが、心の解析、治に秀でたウィザ`ド。ＣＣＣではＢＢに兢フリをしながら、主人公たちのサポ`トに出精する。

本来なら攻略不可能のサクラ迷mを突破するには彼女のコ`ドキャストが不可欠となる。

たいていの人gを好ましく思うキアラだが、ガト`だけは苦手のようだ。

またどうでもいい豆知Rだが、Fate/EXTRA四回椁摔いて、ガト`モンジが彼女の名前をサラッと口に﻿している。

 

◆

 

真言密教立川流の傍流、天流のの娘。

山奥のコミュニティで生まれ、育ったが、幼少期は不治の病に冒され、十四rの春は迎えられないと言われていた。

そのの彼女の唯一の支えだったものは、父の信者たちが舞いの品として置いていった}本である。

雪の降る夜、酬われないまま死を迎えた少女の物Zに感じ入り、

地上と月ほどの隔たりがありながら、`う世界の性に一目惚れし、自らの声と引き替えににあがった少女の物Zに憧れたという。

その後、ネットによって床についたままでも世界を知るようになり、その知Rで不治の病から回汀Ｗ杂嗓诵婴扦るようになってから、彼女の中でその思い出はの隅に追いやられた。

 

成人してからはその人g性から多くの信者を@得し、}者として自らの教えに尽くした。

しかし、彼女を独占しようと私欲にかられた信者によってされる。

……とは言っても、そのの彼女は万色悠滞によって自身を疑似子化させており、地上の肉体が死绀筏郡趣长恧潜伺には何の}もなかった。

キアラは己のフィ`ルドを空gに移行しており、一印める欲望をすくう道に没入した。

その在り方は护く第三魔法、魂の物|化であるヘブンズフィ`ルに近いものと思われる。

 

Sesshouin Kiara [name]  P195-196

Kiara is a Master that appears in CCC.

She is a Japanese woman in her late 20s. Her name is properly written ⑸院祈荒 (rather than the oft written ⑸院キアラ).

Her servant is Andersen.

Dressed in a nun’s attire, she is an air-head ero-older-sister type.

Despite her troublesome tendency to brush off what others say, her attitude and behavior is even more suggestive than that of the Alter Egos. Truth be told, her sexual desire is beyond her control.

Although she is wearing a nun’s clothing, it’s still easy to tell from the lines of her body that she is an unmatched beauty of a woman. By the way, she doesn’t cut her hair (tonsure) and instead just keeps it tucked under her nun veil.

She refers to herself using “私” (わたし).

She usually refers to others using “皆さん” (みなさん), and usually adds -san at the end of peoples’ names.

She is essentially a proper lady with a neat and tidy way of speaking.

She has a soft personality, and a chaste set of values, but when she speaks, oddly enough her words carry a hint of sensuality.

Her personality is introverted, timid, and active.

She is very gentle and mild-mannered, but also positive and motivated at the same time. It may seem as though she has a weak constitution, but she is energetic and full of life. She is deeply compassionate toward others. She is deeply considerate and is good at grasping the reason or truth. She can read almost everyone’s feelings and correctly understand their position or suffering.

Both on the outside and the inside, she is a talented woman overflowing with graceful beauty...

She seems wonderful, but at the same time she is a bit absent-minded, and seems to have a lot of knowledge about sex... rather than “Holy Woman” she would be more appropriately labeled as a “kind older sister.”

While she has trouble controlling her poison-tongued servant Andersen, she remains an upright character that never loses her smile.

 

While she is rather lacking in combat ability, she is a wizard at analyzing the hearts of others, and also excels at healing. In CCC while pretending to obey BB, she diligently supports the protagonist.

Originally we had made it so that her Codecast was essential to being able to clear Sakura Labyrinth.

Kiara thinks well of most people, but it seems that she has a distaste for Gatou.

This is just some useless crumbs of info again, but in the fourth round, Gatou Monji uses her [first] name without hesitation.

 

◆

 

Kiara is the daughter of a high ranked monk in the Eternal Heaven Sect, which is a branch of Shingon Mikkyo Tachikawa. [TL NOTE: Mikkyo means secret teachings]

Born and raised in a community located deep in the mountains, when she was young she was afflicted by an untreatable disease, and the doctor said she wouldn’t live to see the age of 14.

Around that time the only thing that supported her and kept her together was a picture book she received from her father’s religious followers when they came to visit her sickbed.

On snowy evenings, this young girl who was headed for a meaningless death would fawn over the book and its story.

Kiara greatly admired the story of the girl who, despite there being a difference in situation as great as the difference between the Earth and the Moon, fell in love at first sight upon seeing a man from a world apart from her own, and then proceeded to trade her voice for the ability to ascend to land.

After that, due to the spread of the Internet, despite being stuck in bed she was able to learn about the world, and using the knowledge she gained she was able to recover from her untreatable disease. Once she was able to move freely again, her memories of the book were relegated to a small dusty corner of her brain.

 

After becoming an adult Kiara was able to gather many followers due to her great kindness, and as a nun she completely devoted herself to teach them.
