However, she ended up being killed by a follower who selfishly wanted to have her all to himself.

... Well even with that being said, at that time she had already transferred herself into spiritron form, and it was no problem for her to lose her physical body on Earth.

Kiara took it upon herself to continue her religious work in the cyber world, and dedicated herself even more to teaching others how to manage their worldly desires.

Her existence is similar to tertiary magics passed down only by mouth, and is thought to be similar to Heaven’s Feel which is the physical materialization of the soul.

 

■制・反逆・没落【その他】

赤セイバ`の嫌いな言~。

制は言わずもがな、反逆と没落は彼女の生前の出来事から。何度落を眺めようと亭辘胜け┚である。

ちなみに、ＣＣＣでライバルになる赤ランサ`の嫌いな言~は、脱走、反逆、くちごたえ。

 

Moderation C Treason C Ruin [other] P196

These are Red Saber’s hated words.

Moderation goes without saying, but treason and ruin are related to events from when she was alive. No matter how many times the sun sets, she is a tyrant who doesn’t learn her lesson.

By the way, in CCC, Red Saber’s rival Red Lancer’s hated words are desertion, treason, and back talk.

 

■SE.RA.PH【事柄】

SERIALPHANTASM。

ム`ンセル内に作られた子虚世界。

模が巨大になったム`ンセルが自身を\婴工毪郡幛俗鳏盲俊痹陇蚧丐苟际行庭ē螗弗蟆薄

要はム`ンセルが後からBした追加エンジン、追加メモリである。

人gの点ではム`ンセルのネットワ`クは光としかJRできないが、魂を子化できる魔gなら情螭趣筏浦し、一ユニットとして参加する事ができる。

人gを知るために行われる}杯檎も、このSE.RA.PHを利用して行われている。

SE.RA.PHはム`ンセル内に点在し、中には既に旧型としてされたものの、いまだに崩菠筏皮い胜ざ雷灶I域もあるとか。

 

SE.RA.PH [circumstances] P196

SERIAL PHANTASM.

The fabricated spiritron world that was made inside Moon Cell.

It’s a Moon-Powering-City-Type Engine made to manage the inside of the massive Moon Cell.

In short, it is an additional engine and additional memory that Moon Cell added on while expanding itself.

From the perspective of a normal human, Moon Cell’s network is only seen as light, but a Magus who can transform their soul into spiritron is able to perceive the information held within that light, and join in as a unit attached to the network. SE.RA.PH is also used to carry out the Holy Grail War, which is for the purpose of better knowing and understanding humans.

SE.RA.PH is scattered around within Moon Cell, and includes, among other things, parts which are already old, obsolete and abandoned, and also independent areas which still haven’t collapsed.

 

■xk枝【イベント】

いま起きている出来事にして、何らかの反辘蚯螭幛椁欷rに出るもの。

アナタは}数の行婴沃肖ら一つの答えをxkしなくてはならない。

このrばかりはスト`リ`の流れではなく、ブレイヤ`が主人公としてQ断・k言する。

会中に起こる「返答」の龊稀すべてのxk枝はどれも等なので、プレイヤ`が思い描く”主人公像”として返答してあげてほしい。

バカ回答をxぶのもEXTRAの醍醐味である。

むしろバカ回答ほど、相手のLされた一面を引き出す事が多い。

 

Branching Choices [event] P196

These appear when some kind of reaction is desired with respect to what’s currently happening in the game.

You must choose just one option from the many possible actions.

Only when the branching choices appear is the flow of the story interrupted, and the player imposes his/her own decision and opinion in the place of the protagonist.

This is different from the “responses” you can choose in regular conversation. For “responses” all the options available have equal value, and we want you to reply as you think the protagonist would.

Choosing the silly replies is also one of EXTRA’s real pleasures.

Contrary to what you might think, the silly replies actually often bring out the calm and controlled side of the characters.

 

■センチネル【事柄】

ＢＢによって改造されたサクラ迷mのl士。

各A婴违幞ぅ螗偿であり、迷mそのもの。

良|な魔g回路と”心”を持つ少女にしか栅蓼椁胜い郡帷⒐バ豫抓恁哎楗啶韦瑜Δ肆慨bはできない。

﻿マスタ`からは凛やラニ、ジナコが咨となり、センチネル化してしまった。

センチネル化のさい、外付けの端末としてＢＢの意Rを差しzまれるため、多少なりとも性格が淀んでしまうようだ。きっと。たぶん。凛やラニの名誉のため、とりあえずそう言っておきたい。

センチネルになった少女は、その子核……魂を迷mの核《コア》として封印され、五感すべてを迷mのB材料として使用される。

迷mの造を浃à郡辚去楗氓驻やしたりするのはセンチネルにとっても苦痛をともなう行椁胜韦馈

また、大我は核となって封じられるが、小我……それそれ独立した趣味・嗜好の人格は『欲身《エゴ》』と呼ばれる分身になり、それぞれ担当する迷m内の管理人となる。

余ではあるが、迷mを涓铯丹护毪郡岣叨趣恃菟隳芰Δ虮匾とされる。凛とラニは基を氦郡筏皮い郡、ジナコは基を氦郡筏皮い胜った。彼女の迷mの作りが素なのはそのFれだろう。

 

Sentinel [circumstances] P196-197

Sentinels are the special guards of Sakura Labyrinth. They are beings that were remodeled by BB.

They are the main core of each level of the Labyrinth. They are part of the Labyrinth itself.

Only girls who have good quality magic circuits and a “heart” can become a Sentinel, so it’s not possible to mass produce them like Attack Programs.

From among the Masters, Rin or Rani, and Jinako become sacrifices and are transformed into Sentinels.

When creating a Sentinel BB acts as an external terminal, and inserts her consciousness into the victim. The process ends up imprinting some of BB’s personality on the victim. Surely. Probably. For the sake of Rin’s and Rani’s honor, let’s assume that’s what happens.

Any girl who has been made into a Sentinel has had her spiritron core (their soul) sealed away by making it into part of the core of the Labyrinth, and furthermore all her five senses are used as building materials to expand the Labyrinth.

This means that changing the structure of the Labyrinth, or increasing the number of traps is a very painful procedure for the Sentinels.

Also, while the essence of the ego (the atman) is sealed away as part of the Labyrinth core, the more personal bits of the ego, such as the individual interests/preferences part of the personality, become avatar (bunshin off-shoots) which are called “Ego” (desire bodies). These “Ego” become managers of the various areas of the Labyrinth.

While this is digression, high level computational ability is necessary to change or reform the Labyrinth. Rin and Rani have enough ability to fulfill the basic requirements, but Jinako does not. This is probably the reason why her part of the Labyrinth is so plain and simple.

 

■ソ`ド・キャメロット【g式】

Q着g式《ファイナリティ》と呼ばれる特殊なコ`ドキャスト。かつて魔gの名家に护铯盲皮い俊その一族秘iのg式。

}集うkAの城《ソ`ド・キャメロット》はハ`ウェイ秘iのコ`ドキャスト。名誉を重んじるふたりのT士が、余人に阻まれる事なく雌雄をQする椁纬扦扦る。

周欷蚋菠ρ驻伪冥向T士たちの椁い水を唱えられる}の担い手でなければ破菠扦ない。

ちなみに、ある魔法使いがスッゲ`高なzbをぶっ菠rに使用した魔も、いずれQ着g式のカテゴリ`に含まれる。

 

Sword Camelot [codecast] P197

Sword Camelot is a special kind of codecast known as a Finality.

It is a greatly prized spell passed down through generations of a famous Magus family.

Sword Camelot is the Harwey family’s prized codecast. [TL NOTE: the literal meaning of Sword Camelot written in kanji in this text is: The Gorgeous Castle where Holy Swords Congregate]

Sword Camelot is a castle which is used as a place for two knights who considered honor to be of great importance to do battle without anyone else interfering.

There is a wall of flame that surrounds the two knights, and it can only be destroyed by a wielder of a holy sword who objects to the duel taking place.

By the way, the priceless relics that a certain magic user likes to destroy to use as magic projectiles also fall into the category of Finality.

 

【た行】

 

■魂【事柄】

知性持つ生命ひとつひとつに宿る、肉体的ではなく精神的な命。

EXTRA世界では"その容器を生命たらしめる根源"と言われている。

かつての医学界では、肉体は生命:……魂を婴すための出力装置であり、生命活婴胜して魂はk生しないと考えられていた。

しかし魔g世界ではその逆、魂はe次元にある”意思”であり、その意思が肉体に宿っている、と考えた。

どちらが正解なのか未だ答えは出ていないが、EXTRA世界では疑似子理が_立され、以後、魂は肉体がなくとも稼Pする"その人gの源"としてQわれる事になった。

 

The Soul [circumstances] P197

A soul resides in all life forms that are intelligent. It is spiritual life that is not part of any physical phenomenon.

In the world of EXTRA it is said to be the source that enables a container to have life.

In the past, in the medical community, it was thought that the body = life, and the body was an output device needed to power the soul. Without a living body, a soul could not be generated.

However, in the Magus community the opposite was thought to be true. The soul is a “will” that lies in another dimension, and that will is occupying a body.

Which school of thought is correct still remains unknown today, however in the world of EXTRA Virtual Spiritron Theory has been established. From this theory it became clear that the soul can activate even without a physical body, and as such the soul has come to be treated as “the source of a person.”

 

■ダン・ブラックモア【人物】

英国から派遣された元人のマスタ`。

女王からT士《サ`》の称号を授かったs椁伪士で、若いは狙氖证趣筏皮饷をYせた。

英国王室は西欧yの一翼ではあるが、その指丐蜓菠盲匹烯`ウェイと立している。

ハ`ウェイがム`ンセル・オ`トマトンにアクセスし、これを独占する恐れがあるときつけた女王はもっとも信mするプライベ`ト・ソルジャ`を月に派遣した。それがダン卿である。

ダンは古い家柄の出で、その体には魔g回路が浃铯盲皮い俊Ｄgの血を嫌っていたダンだが、女王陛下にmみとされては断れない。

退役g近であっても彼は人であり、人として生きたからには、最後まで栅蛉うするのみ。

こうして一年gの・{整をUて、彼は子ハッカ`となった。h六十r、WDきの魔gとして。

 

ダンが}杯檎に求めるものは『T士』としての椁い扦る。

サ`の称号を戴きはしたが、彼は多くの訾蚨嗓iいた人だ。その^程で多くのものを失ってきた。

理想も、伴Hも、若いに粝毪筏孔苑证稳松も、榛黏沃肖け落ちた。

﻿そうして生き延びた彼に与えられたものは退役というKわりだけ。

明_な引き、明_な椁い蛏右庾Rで求めていたダンにとって、}杯檎はT士として椁à胱钺幛违隶悭螗工趣筏朴长盲郡韦坤恧Α

ダン・ブラックモアが主人公に提示するものは『信念』だ。

老兵はZる。

 

「後悔はあっても、それを言いUにしてはいけない。

私は与えられた道で最善を尽くした。

たとえその道がいびつなものであったとしても、私は、私の魂を示しAけた」

 

潮をし、妻を失いながらも、武器を手にした事を彼は`魔化しはしなかった。

武器を手にした以上、人は任をわなければならない。した相手にも、その道をxんだ自分という命にも。

いまだ椁σ饬xをいだせずにいた主人公を、老兵はzれみ、送り出す。

任の智をわれるのは最後のrだ。

それまで、君が立ち止まれる理由はない、と。

それは或るT士の物Z。

がらず、}杯を求めていた理由さえ崦沥手魅斯にとって、そのz言は背中を押す父Hのようですらあった。

 

Dan Blackmore [character] P197-198

Dan is a former soldier, and a Master dispatched by England.

He served as a soldier for many years, and was knighted by the Queen. When he was young he made a name for himself as a sniper.

While the Royal Family of England is a part of the West Europe Plutocracy, it opposes the one who holds the power to lead the group, Harwey.

After hearing that Harwey had accessed Moon Cell, and that there was the possibility he might be trying to monopolize it, the Queen sent her most trusted private soldier to the Moon. That soldier is Sir Dan.

Dan comes from an old family, and his body possessed magic circuits. Dan resented his Magus blood, but one cannot refuse a direct request from her Majesty the Queen.

Although close to retirement, he was still a soldier, and thus he could only carry out his duty to the end.

With this, he went through one year of training and adjustment, and he became a spiritron hacker. At the ripe age of 60 he was a late bloomer of a Magus.

 

What Dan desires from the Holy Grail War is to be able to fight as a “Knight.”

While he has already received the title of Sir, he is a soldier who has crossed many battlefields. He came to lose many things through the battles in his past.

His ideals, his wife, and the life he imagined for himself when he was young. All of it burned away by the fires of war.

After living his life as such, all that he would be rewarded with was the end known as retirement from military service.

Dan greatly desires a clean separation between battle and everything else, and he only wants a clean fight. And now the Holy Grail War has presented itself as his last chance to be able to fight as a Knight.

Dan Blackmore suggests the importance of conviction to the protagonist.

The old solider speaks:

 

“Even if you have regrets, you should never use them as an excuse.

I did my best while on the path that I was presented with.

No matter how warped or crooked that path may be,

I continued to represent my own soul.”

 

Despite killing many a foe, and losing his wife, when Dan takes a weapon in his hands, he is under no illusion. After taking up arms, you must bear responsibility for your actions. This goes for both the enemies you killed, and you who chose this path yourself.

To the protagonist who had not yet discovered the reason and meaning behind fighting, the old soldier compassionately sees him off.

Only at the very end are the mistakes you are responsible for brought into question.

Until then, you have no reason to stand still.

For that is the story of another certain knight I know too well.

To the protagonist whose memories still haven’t returned, and who holds but a vague desire to obtain the Grail, these final words from Dan were like those of a proud father.

 

■天}王【宝具名】

チャクラ・ヴァルティン。

セイヴァ`の小宝具。本来なら徒手空拳の者が持つ、相手を倒すための武具。

}王《てんりんじょうおう》とは古代インドヴェ`ダr代における理想の王のこと。

チャクラ・ヴァルティンは者の上空に展_する、七Nメ`トルの光《チャクラム》。ゆっくりと回しながら、の中にいるサ`ヴァントヘビュンビュンと光の矢を放つ。

全天包煨・自右映h台……とお考えください。

光のをレ`ルにみたてて、その上をh台が移婴筏皮い搿みたいな。

rg《タ－ン》ごとに光のはえていき、最K的には七つにまで大。この七つのは}王が持つ七つの宝と同xである。

その姿は虹を思わせ、椁い最高速に_したところで真名_放による最K攻摹币护诉る生”がk印

光のがガコン!と音をたてて一つに合体、高速回していき、やがて大日如来が背う後光っぽいものに浠、プレイヤ`サ`ヴァントへ３６０度から光の柱が集Y、ブラックホ`ルを思わせる束から大爆k、みたいな。

───とまあ、ここまで制作コストを考えぬ字コンテなので、当然のように没になった。この手のスペクタクルはアクションゲ`ムでやってろってですよ。

 

Turner of the Wheel [noble phantasm name] P198

Chakravartin.

This is Saver’s minor Noble Phantasm. It’s a weapon based on an implement used by usually unarmed Buddha to defeat their enemies.

Chakravartin (Turner of the Wheel) is the concept of the “ideal universal ruler” that was used in the Vedic period of ancient India.

The weapon Chakravartin is a 7km wide chakram of light that is expanded into the sky above the Buddha. While revolving slowly, it shoots arrows of light at the Servants within its ring.

Think of it as a mobile artillery platform that can shoot in any direction. The ring of light is like a rail that the artillery platform moves along.

The number of rings of light increase each turn, until it has reached the maximum of seven. These seven rings correspond to the seven treasures that the Turner of the Wheel (ruler) possesses.

The rings are reminiscent of rainbows, and at the peak of battle this weapons ultimate attack “Transmigration Into One” can be activated by calling it’s true name.

The rings of light combine into one with a clang and the ring starts spinning at high speed. Before long it morphs to resemble the ring that floats behind the Celestial Buddha Variocana, and pillars of light coming from the entire 360 degrees of the ring are focused on the player’s Servant, and the convergence causes a huge explosion that resembles a black hole.

…Well of course this is a written description that didn’t take production costs into consideration in the slightest, so of course it was axed. I guess if you want this level of visuals, you have to do it in an action game.

 

■月のY取臼卤】

ＣＣＣの舞台。

月を_に二分割し、地球に向いてる趣畏证虮恧趣贰その逆……地球からではQyできない趣蜓Yと考える。

Fate/EXTRAが月の表・第一婴ら第七印中心に向かうものとしたら、ＣＣＣは月のY龋A婴胃拍瞍胜罚─ら中心を目指すもの。道行きは`えどゴ`ルはどちらもム`ンセル中枢となる。

月のY趣膝喋`ンセルが不要と判断した情螭虮９埭工鏊で、その在り方は訾私い。

性情螬ぉぉと祟、ひいては知的生命体にとって害にしかならないもの───とカテゴライズされたデ`タをひたすらみこむ虚数空gである。

月のY趣膝喋`ンセル中枢の『眼』ですら立ち入りを禁止した最高禁句I域。

ここに入ったデ`タは人gの性にまれ、存在意xを失ったあげく、意味消失してしまう。

月のY趣膝喋`ンセルがQyする度にやしてしまうA染物|をためこんだ海、とも言える。

レオが用意したワクテカ斫猡悉饯韦たりたいへん﻿分かりづらい。ユリウスのブリ`フィングを”ヴジュアル系すぎて柯胜い”と言っておきながら、レオもかなりのゴシック好きである。

 

Far Side of the Moon [circumstances] P198-199

This is  the setting of CCC.

If one thinks of the Moon as being perfectly divided into two, the side facing the Earth is the Near Side, and the opposite side, which cannot be observed from Earth, is the Far Side.

Fate/EXTRA takes place on the Near Side, and the player progresses from the first layer to the seventh layer, and finally on to the Moon Cell Nucleus. CCC takes place on the Far Side (no layers though), and the player similarly aims to reach the Moon Cell Nucleus. Although the path is different, the goal is the same; Moon Cell Nucleus. The Far Side of the Moon is the place where Moon Cell keeps information and data that it has judged to be unnecessary; it’s essentially a dumping ground.

It’s an imaginary number space that swallows up all data categorized as malicious information, which is information/data that could only ever prove harmful to mankind or other life forms.

The Far Side of the Moon is a strictly off-limits area, and even the “eye” of Moon Cell Nucleus is forbidden from entering.

All data that finds its way to the Far Side of the Moon is swallowed by human evil nature, and is eventually deprived of all meaning.

The Far Side of the Moon can be said to be the result of Moon Cell stashing away polluted information and data. This ocean of polluted data increases in size as Moon Cell continues to make its observations.

The illustration that Leo excitedly prepares for the player is extremely difficult to understand. Despite Leo complaining that Julius’ briefing was inefficient because it was too “Visual Kei,” Leo actually likes Gothic themed stuff quite a bit.

 

■月の女王【人物】

ＣＣＣの第一A婴ゴ蟆顶哎飑`ト》なボス。

赤ランサ`を使役し、迷mにやってきた主人公たちを笑わ……否、苦しめたセンチネル。

その正体はなんとh坂凛だった（棒iみ）。

ＢＢに意Rの半分を占有されていたが、その言婴悉蓼盲郡プレなかったあたり、彼女の意志のさがうかがえる。

余ではあるが、凛が月の女王として登訾工rは服装をきわどいパンクファッションにする予定で、ワダさんのデザインラフまであがっていたが泣く泣く没になった。

 

The Queen of the Moon [character] P199

The first big boss in CCC.

The Queen of the Moon employs Red Lancer, as well as the Sentinels from the labyrinth who made the protagonist laug― err, who made the protagonist suffer.

Her real identity turned out to be, who would guess... Rin Tohsaka. Wow. (monotone voice)

Despite having half of her consciousness occupied by BB, Rin manages to be completely as usual. This is certainly a testament to the strength of her will power.

To digress, when we decided that Rin would appear as the Queen of the Moon, she was supposed to get a special and rather risqué punk fashion outfit, and its design progressed to the point where Wada had done some rough drawings, but sadly, sadly, so sadly it was axed.

[TL NOTE: Wada is CCC’s main character artist.]

 

■月海原学@【ロケ`ション】

つくみはらがくえん。

SE.RA.PHに作られた二十一世oの学@L景。

}杯檎の舞台になる建物。マスタ`たちはここで自分用の私室を与えられ、Lい椁い颂簸嗍陇摔胜搿

校hは一つだけでなく、}杯檎一回椁摔掀撙膜涡Ｅhが同rに\婴丹欷皮い搿

二回椁扦隙つに限定され、四回椁摔いて、生き残ったマスタ`たちは最後の校hに集められる。

校hはSE.RA.PHという海に浮かぶコロニ`、船のようなもので、回椁Mむにつれ、その深度をしていく。

最K的にはム`ンセル中枢にまで{り着き、最後のマスタ`を送り出し次第、惰螭未uの中で崩菠筏皮いという。

 

Tsukimihara Academy [location] P199

Tsukimihara Gakuen.

It is a school made within SE.RA.PH that is similar to your typical 21st century school.

This school becomes the stage for the Holy Grail War. The Masters are given their own private room within the school while they are on their arduous battle-filled journey.

There is more than one single school building, and during the first round of battle there are actually seven school buildings that are in use.

From the second round this decreases to two school buildings, and from the fourth round the surviving Masters are gathered in the last remaining school building.

School buildings are essentially colonies that float in the sea known as SE.RA.PH, and are similar to boats in that respect. When progressing to the next round, the depth increases.

The last school building ultimately reaches Moon Cell Nucleus, and it is said that after safely delivering the last remaining Master there that the school collapses and crumbles away into the great whirlpool of information surrounding it.

 

■デザインベビ`【事柄】

z蛔硬僮鳏侨斯さ膜俗鳏椁欷孔庸。

z坏膜衰惟`マルなIHからでも、魔g回路を持った子供を生み出す事ができる。EXTRA世界ではシンジやユリウスがこれに当する。

勘`いされがちだが、レオはデザインされた子供ではない。彼の知R・UYは生後に行われた睡眠学によるもので、人工的に作られた整体部品は}w所もない。彼の在り方は人の手によるものではない”天性の王”という事だ。

 

Designer Baby [circumstances] P199

A Designer Baby is a child created with artificially modified DNA.

With this it is possible even for parents who have completely normal genetics to bear a child who possesses magic circuits.

Within the world of EXTRA, Shinji and Julius (among others) are designer babies.

Contrary to what people often think, Leo is in fact not a designer baby. His great knowledge, intellect and experience were instilled through a hypnosis learning method, and his body does not contain a single speck of artificially created parts. His existence is not something that was realized through human intervention, he is just a “Born King.”

 

■h坂マネ`イズパワ`システム【その他】

e名、h坂ＡＴＭ。

凛の、凛による、凛のための集金制度。

主人公からひたすらサクラメントをかっぱぐために作られたル`プシステム。

このシステムに囚われた者は凛が作った訾恰⒘荬韦郡幛Pき、凛のA金をeみ七げていく。

そもそも第一A婴狭荬涡膜胜韦恰この中で『お金を稼ぐ』行椁饯韦猡韦矛盾している。

攻性プログラムは凛の心を切り崩して作られたもの。プログラムを破菠工毪去单ラメントにQされるが、それはもともと凛の『心のA金』だ。

どれだけ主人公が攻性プログラムを破菠贰⑿′Eに﻿Qし、h坂ATMに振りzんだところで凛の得るサクラメントt量はまったく浃铯椁胜ぁ

凛が求める金~は、既に凛の中にあるワケである。

このあたりのおかしさに荬扭い皮い胜いたり、欲身《エゴ》凛の迷走っぷりがうかがえる。

gHのところ、お金がほしいのか、ワガママをいてほしいのか。

月の女王さまの命令に、あえて兢盲Pくことで、莞钉ないうちに好感度フラグが立っているのかも。

それはそれとして、Pは尊いもの。

面倒くさがらず攻性プログラムを倒していくのが正道である。くれぐれもハ`ウェイトイチシステムにmってはいけない。ちなみに、指定された金~を振りzまなくてもボスは倒せる。その龊悉闻王さまの反辘猡沥绀盲让姘驻ぁ

 

Tohsaka Money Is Power System [Other] P199-200

Alternate name: Tohsaka ATM.

It is a money collection system by Rin, from Rin, for Rin.

It is a loop system created solely for the reason of snatching sakurament from the protagonist.

Anyone who is caught in this loop ends up at a workplace that Rin created, and they must then work for Rin and present Rin with all the money they earn in order to increase her savings.

To begin with, the first layer in CCC is Rin’s heart, and within it resides the contradictory desire to “make money.”

The Attack Programs are created from crumbling bits of Rin’s heart. When you destroy an Attack Program is turns into sakurament, which was originally the “Savings of Rin’s heart.”

No matter how many Attack Programs the protagonist defeats, they all turn into sakurament which is then deposited into the Tohsaka ATM, however in spite of that the total amount of sakurament that Rin has available to her will not change in the slightest.

This is because the amount of money that Rin desires already lies within her.

When she realizes this contradiction, we get the chance to see Ego Rin stray from her usual behavior.

In reality it’s hard to tell if she actually wants money or if she just wants people to listen to her selfish demands.

You might unexpectedly find yourself triggering affection flags when you obey her orders and work for the great Queen of the Moon.

In that respect, the work is indeed valuable.

The correct decision is to go and defeat the Attack Programs without being lazy. It’s not good to immediately give up and rely on the Harwey Ten-Ten Loan System. [TL NOTE: a トイチ or ten-ten loan is an illegal loan where 10% interest is charged every 10 days. The Japanese literally says ten-one, but this “one” means 十分の一 which is 10%.]

By the way, you can actually still defeat the boss even if you don’t deposit the required amount of money. If you try depositing less than the Queen demands her reaction is also quite interesting.

 

[TL NOTE: Sakurament is the in game money.]

 

■h坂凛【人物】

とおさかりん。

}杯檎に参加したマスタ`。

ハ`ウェイの支配にを唱える了ハッカ`。

国籍は不明。F在は中|で活Sしている。菡嗓钎丧楗いQを持っているが、根は姐御肌かつ正xの人なため、ここ一番で人情に寄るところがある。

赤い服、ツインテ`ルにミニスカ`ト、とFateではおZ染みの役。

元は国BMの一Tで、アジア地域の医活婴臼陇工耄危牵馓澶钎堀楗螗匹％としてシステム管理技のな仕事をしていた。

しかしハ`ウェイの支配によってBQに支配され希望を失った未来に疑を抱いていた凛は、困にあえぐ国々をwび回るうち管理社会の限界を感じ、これと椁Φ坤蜻xんだ。

その後、ＮＧＯからxれ、レジスタンス活婴松恧蛲钉袱毪瑜Δ摔胜搿

以後はレジスタンスMと共Lはしているが、活幼蕴澶人で行っている。一般市民の咨者は出さないのがポリシ`。

ここ一年は争地である中|に腰を据え、半分信念、半分ビジネスとしてハ`ウェイの私Oと子椁蛐肖盲皮い郡、レジスタンスMから}杯の情螭蚵き、仕事として正式に『月に登り、ハ`ウェイを打倒する』ミッションを受けた。

サ`ヴァントはランサ`。

魔gとしての基本能力《スペック》はレオに一ijるものの、マスタ`としてのg力……g殛LのUYの差ではレオを上回る俸蜓aのひとり。

 

◆

 

ＣＣＣでも登訾工搿㈩mりになる名解h。

五回椁K了したタイミングで月のY趣寺浃痢ＢＢに意Rをジャックされて主人公たちの长趣胜搿

钠皮丹欷酷幛险荬蛉・し、罪绀埭筏趣肖りに生徒会に参加、以後はオペレ`タ`として活Sする。

赤いドラ○もんか、という指摘が入るぐらいのなんでも屋。たいていの作榱案は凛が一でやってくれます。

生徒会での役は副会L。有能な参\としてサクラ迷m攻略のサポ`トをする。

また、同じサポ`ト役としてラニとH好を深め、後半では互いにJめ合う女友_となった。

 

Rin Tohsaka [character] P200

Rin Tohsaka.

She is a Master who participates in the Holy Grail War.

She is a spiritron hacker who raises a voice of opposition against Harwey’s rule.

Her nationality is unknown, and she is currently active in the Middle East.

She has a firm and unsentimental set of values, but her true nature is someone who looks out for others and pursues justice, so she is suspect to be sympathetic at the critical moment.

Red clothes, twin tails, and a miniskirt. She is a well known heroine from Fate/stay night.

Previously she was a member of a United Nations organization, and was volunteering as a system management engineer of sorts for an NGO that provides medical assistance across Asia.

After Harwey imposed his rule, Rin found herself losing faith in her dream and had many doubts about what the future would hold.  After visiting a broad range of countries that were suffering from poverty Rin could see the limits of such a strictly controlled society, and so she decided to fight back against Harwey.

After that she left the NGO and devoted herself to supporting the resistance.

From then on she fought alongside the resistance, however she operated completely independently. Her policy is no civilian casualties.

For the past year she has resided in the strife-filled land of the Middle East. Half for her own conviction, and half for the sake of money, she engaged in cyber warfare against Harwey’s private army. Upon hearing about the Holy Grail War from the resistance, she formally accepted the mission to ascend to the Moon and defeat Harwey.

Her servant is Lancer.

Her specs as a Magus are slightly inferior to Leo’s, but her ability as a Master exceeds Leo’s, which comes from her greater real-world combat experience. This makes Rin a top candidate for winning the Grail.

 

◆

 

Rin also appears in CCC as a trustworthy advisor.

When you fall to the far side of the Moon at the end of the fifth round, you bump into Rin, whose consciousness has been turned into junk by BB, and she becomes your enemy. After defeating Rin, she regains her sanity, and then joins the student council as if to atone for her sins. From then on she acts as an Operator.

Rin’s room is filled with random stuff to the point where you might think she is a Red Doraemon. Rin does up most of the strategic plans for you each night.

Her position within the student council is vice-president. She is a great strategist, and supports your efforts to clear the Sakura Labyrinth.

She also gives you a hand in deepening your relationship with Rani, and in the latter half of the game Rin and Rani become good friends.

 

﻿■トワイス・Ｈ・ピ`スマン【人物】

１９７０～１９９９年に生きた医学者、科学者。

人工x肢を目的としたサイバネティックス技gにA倒しながらも、外科と子工学、ネットワ`クのk端にも功を成した。

F在〔２０３０年）におけるインフラO浃位Aにかかわった一人。アムネジア・シンドロ`ムの解析や榈丐摔ける医活婴胜伞⒍啶の功からト摔趣筏护à椁欷皮い搿

７０年代、|南アジアで行われた代理檎の中、榈丐巧を受けたアメリカ人兵士とF地人のハ`フ。

榛黏沃肖巧まれ、K殚gHにIHを失い（といっても夫の方はいきずりの行椁胜韦扦趣盲に前に出て樗坤筏皮い耄、墓工趣筏颇氦椁筏皮い郡ウィザ`ドとしての才能をIわれB子となる。ピ`スマン姓はそのおりにあてがわれたB父のもの。

（もっとも、その事gを彼が知る事はなかった。

トワイスがB子となったのは五rなので、このの出来事を本人はしていなかったとされる。

跫も改Zされているので、死のgHまで自分が墓工扦る事を彼は知らなかった）

大学卒I後、有名猡违伐螗タンクから将来を有望されたが、本人のい意志でこれを辞退し、野に下る。以後、彼は周欷畏や疑を余所に、eO的に争が起こった地に向かい、『檎をg体Yする』工学者として知れ渡るようになる。

１９９９年、O|における未来都市のモデルケ`スで起きた暮κ鹿胜卧助にボランティアとして参加し、多くの人命を救うも、テロ活婴摔瑜盲扑劳訾筏俊

 

Twice H. Pieceman [character] P201

Pieceman is a medical researcher and scientist who lived from 1970 to 1999.

He specialized in the use of cybernetics to improve prosthetics, while also doing significant work in brain surgery, electronic engineering, and even development of the network.

He is an individual who played a big role in laying the foundation for the infrastructure that is used in the present (2030). He is a great man whose many meritorious achievements include analyzing the amnesia syndrome disease, and providing medical assistance in war zones among others.

He was born in the 70s, in the midst of a so-called proxy war taking place in Southeast Asia, as the mixed-race son of a local and an American soldier.

Born in the fires of war, which would claim the lives of both his parents by its end (that being said his father died early on in the war after being sent to the front lines). He lived as a war orphan, but was eventually adopted for his potential as a Wizard. The name Pieceman belongs to his adoptive father.

(It’s reasonable to assume that he is not aware of this. Twice was adopted when he was around the age of five, and it is assumed that he no longer has memories of that time. His adoptive family went as far as altering their family registry, and even up to his death he never found out that he was a war orphan.)

 

After graduating from University, he was offered a promising future working at the think tank of a famous conglomerate, but he declined this to follow the ideals he strongly believed in, and so he left the safety of home. After that, disregarding the opposition from the people around him, he headed to strife-filled, war-torn areas, “To experience war firsthand.” and became widely known for his work as an engineer.

In 1999 he traveled to an experimental future city in the Far East to help as a volunteer in the aftermath of a disaster. He helped save many people, but then died in a terrorist attack.

 

【な行】

 

■のoい王【宝具】

ノ`フェイス・メイキング。

vア`チャ`が持つLし宝具。

自然の化身であるロビンフッドは、成立後にそのままケルトのLであるベルティ`ン祭（春の祭り）を受け@いだ「五月祭《メ`デ`》」に取り入れられた。

五月柱（メイポ`ル）という村の訾沃醒毪肆てられた柱の周りを欷螭怯护昝鳏すというこの祭りでは、年の女性は「五月女王《メイクイ`ン》」、

年の男性は「五月王《メイキング》」に扮する。

この「五月王」こそロビンフッドの比嗓扦る。

この祭りでメイキングがまとう衣装はv色の肌にぴったりした衣装に茶色のアクセントが定番とされている。いうまでもなく~っぱのvと证尾枭（グリ`ンマン）であり、ここでもロビンフッドは自然の化身であることが{されている。

五月王の衣は着る者の菖浃蛳し、その姿を自然に溶けzませるという。ロビンフッドと同一される妖精パックもこの能力を持っているとか。

祈りの弓（イ`・パウ）よりい、と言われるvア`チャ`の奥の手。殛Lでのiみ合いをo郡摔贰⒁环降膜舜颏伽磨俩`トアイテム。

狙氖证扦るロビンはこのマントで姿をLし、アサシンまがいの行婴顺訾搿

それをマスタ`であるダンに替められ、殛L以外での”のoい王”の使用を禁じられてしまった。

ＣＣＣでも意外な使い道をせるが、リップの手によって残念なY果にKわってしまう。

 

Faceless King [noble phantasm] P201

NoFace Mayking.

This is Green Archer’s hidden Noble Phantasm.

Robin Hood was established as an incarnation of nature, and treated as such and celebrated in the May Day festival which succeeded the traditional Celt Beltane Festival (a spring festival).

In the center of the village there are pillars erected called May Poles and the villagers gather around them and dance the night away. In the May Day festival girls and boys who will soon be of adult age dress up as “May Queens” and “May Kings.”

“May King” especially is a metaphor for Robin Hood.

In this festival the standard costume for May Kings is tight fitting green clothing with brown accents. It goes without saying that this is the green of leaves and brown of tree trunks, so even the costume is designed to emphasize that Robin Hood is an incarnation of nature.

A May King’s attire is said to hide their presence, and allow him to melt away into nature. So Robin Hood essentially has the same ability as the fairy Puck.

 

This Noble Phantasm is Green Archer’s trump card, and is said to be even more powerful than his Yew Bow Noble Phantasm. It’s a cheat-tier item that makes it impossible to read Green Archers moves, so he completely one-sidedly defeats his enemy.

Robin uses his cloak to hide among the trees, and snipes his enemy from afar like an assassin.

Since Dan think using the Faceless King Noble Phantasm is cowardly, he has forbidden its use outside of combat.

You get to see this skill being used in an unexpected way in CCC, but Passionlip brings that to an unfortunate end.

 

【は行】

 

■ハ`ウェイカレ`【攻磨攻ル】

旧校hのY庭にて、ドラム缶をもちいて作られるブラックカレ`。{理人はユリウス。

その味はべったりとしてコクしかなく、口当たりはザワやかで胃にこびりつくようにいつまでも残る。辛﻿いかどうかのレベルにすら到_していない、ぶっちゃけただのコ`ルタ`ルである。

意外なことに、西瓜にかけて食べるとおいしい。

さらに余ではあるが、生徒会の面子の中でもっとも美味しい料理を作るのはガト`・モンジ。彼の五Y粥はキアラですらおかわりを求める~品とのこと。

 

Harwey Curry [Offensive Skill] P201-202

This is a black colored curry that’s made in a big metal drum found at the back of the old School building. Julius is the one who makes it.

Its flavor can only be described as heavy and sticky, and its unrefined taste and substance feels like it’s going to stick in your stomach forever.

The curry hasn’t even reached a level where you can debate if it is spicy or not, and frankly it’s probably just some coal tar.

Surprisingly, it tastes good if you put it on watermelon.

This is even more digression, but among the members of the student council and the best one at cooking is Gatou Monji. His five-grain porridge is a masterpiece that even has Kiara coming back for seconds.

 

■バ`サ`カ`（白）【サ`ヴァント？】

四回椁椁κ陇摔胜毳旦`ヴァント、そのに。

マスタ`はガト`モンジ。

乱れた金と、深tの凶眼を持つファニ`ヴァンプ。ファンサ`ビスと人の言う。

正しくはサ`ヴァントではなく、ガト`が地球からBれてきたiの存在。ネコだったり柚ねえだったり素生物になったりと、出番がないようで多忙なおさま。一刻も早いリメイクが待たれる。

ところで、物|世界より情笫澜绀畏饯主流となっているEXTRA世界においては、そう最なワケでもない。

情笫澜绀扦徽hが真となるため、自然F象をM神化したいわゆる”神”が、元になった自然F象以上の力を持つ事が多々あるからだ。

そうはいっても正荬ればチ`トになるのはg`いない。『舞台が月であるなら、あらゆる象の能力を六分の一にする』啬埭贤じチ`トの长丐斡郡抗手段だろう。

概念による数浠なので、月にいるかぎり防ぐ手段は存在しない。ム`ンセル化したＢＢですらこの制限を受けてしまう。

EXTRA、ＣＣＣだけのなら、金色白面を『どれほど俾胜低くとも钠皮扦る状rにできる』のは彼女ぐらいである。

 

Berserker (white) [servant] P202

Berserker is the second Servant you end up fighting during the fourth round.

Her master is Monji Gatou.

She is a Funny Vamp [localized as Temptress] with tousled blond hair and crimson eyes.

She is a fan service character.

Technically not a wizard, she is just some strange creature that Gatou brought along from Earth. Sometimes a cat, sometimes Yuzu-nee, sometimes a silicon creature, Berserker is a princess that doesn’t seem to have a proper place in the game. She desperately awaits a redesign.

Incidentally, in the world of EXTRA where the information world (digital) takes precedence over the physical world, she is no longer the strongest.

This is because in the information world legend becomes reality, and natural phenomena that have been incarnated as “Gods” can often hold more power than their original natural existence does.

Well even with that being said, if Berserker regained her sanity she would easily be considered a cheat-tier Servant. Her power, “The stage is the Moon, so all targets have their power reduced to a sixth of their usual.” would be extremely useful against other similar cheat-tier Servants.

It’s a conceptual numerical alteration, so it is unavoidable when on the Moon. Even the Moon Cell transformed version of BB would be limited by it.

As far as EXTRA and CCC go, we needed to make her be at a level that, “No matter how slim the possibility, still possible for Konjiki Hakumen (Golden White Face) to defeat.”

 

■バ`サ`カ`（危【サ`ヴァント】

ひとめただけではとうていしょうたいのわからない、なぞのさ`ばぁんと。でかくてつよい。

……くそ、どこの尾激胜螭馈いったい。

正荬长绞Г盲皮い毪猡韦巍㈤L躯たくましく、きらびやかなzは勇壮な将を思わせる。

マスタ`はラニ＝Ⅷ。

バ`サ`カ`の宿命か、叫んでばかりでロクな台~がないため、彼がどのような人格かは不明。

初期デザインでは人R一体のケンタルウス形Bだったり、そもそもメカだったりとy航したが、尾激悉浃盲绚昙中ALでないとネ！という事で落ち着いた。

バ`サ`カ`になった英は、パラメ`タ化と引き替えに理性を失い、培った技gも大部分が使用不可状Bになる。

このバ`サ`カ`も生前の武芸百般がpなわれているが、その代わりにスキル・反骨の相も封じられている。『反骨の相』は君主に逆らう性|を表したもので、これが封じられているかぎり、この英がマスタ`をY切る事はない。バ`サ`カ`のクラス特性を正しく使った希有な例と言える。

……もっとも。

この武人が生前に郅房瘠盲科・貂蝉《ちょうせん》に似た面影を持つ少女《ラニ》をめる荬摔胜盲郡は疑ではあるが,

 

Berserker (Lu) [servant] P202

Berserker’s (Lu) true name is hard to guess by just looking at him. Very mysterious. He is big, and strong.

...Just who the heck is this Lu Bu anyways? Really.

Although he has lost his sanity, he possesses a tall, strong body, and appears as the majestic general he is in his brilliant armor.

His master is Rani VIII.

As is the fate of those in the Berserker class, his lines are all just incomprehensible yelling, so we don’t know what his real personality is like.

The early designs of him included him being a half human, half horse centaur, or even him as a mech (which was too tough to work out), but in the end we had to go with the true-to-form pure ancient Chinese style Lu Bu.

All heroes who are summoned into the berserker class lose their mind in exchange for a strengthening of their parameters, and as a result they also lose the ability to use most of their special trained skills.

This berserker has lost all his military related skills from when he was alive, but in exchange his defiant nature has been sealed away. “Defiant Nature” means the disposition to defy one’s lord, but as long as this nature is sealed away, this Heroic Spirit will never betray his master. It can be said that this is a rare case where this features of the berserker class is being employed correctly.

…at least theoretically.

This warrior madly loved his wife Chousen when he was alive, and has a questionable penchant to kill any woman who has a similar face.

 

■r血魔荨颈具】

バ`トリ・エルジェ`ベト。

赤ランサ`ことエリザベ`ト・バ`トリ`の宝具。

宝具名が本人の名前の母国iみなのは、EXTRAのランサ`・ヴラド公爵と同じ法t。

言うまでもなく、どちらも吸血鬼のモデルとしてQわれた人物である。

エリザベ`トのドラゴンブレスを最大限にk]した豚……じゃなくて宝具。

エリザベ`トがその生涯に渡り君Rしたチェイテ城を展_し、周欷丝证毪伽ス`パ`ソニックを叩きつける音破脖器。

キャス狐曰く、ゴリラとクジラを元ネタにして造された怪王のブレスと浃铯椁胜ぁとか。

日本の文化を知り、究Oの偶像《アイドル》を粢るようになったエリザベ`トにとって、この歌こそ「F族として、死にいくものに与える最大の延と褒美よ！」なのだ﻿そうだ。

しかし当然ながら先的すぎて地球での理解者は赤セイバ`だけという、まことに悲しいY果となった。

なるか、金星での再デビュ`。

 

Fresh Blood Witch [noble phantasm] P202-203

Elizabeth Bathory.

Red Lancer’s (Elizabeth Bathory) Noble Phantasm.

The naming of her noble phantasm (which uses the native reading of her name) follows the style also used in EXTRA for Lancer Prince Vlad.

As we all know, both the lives of Elizabeth and Vlad were used as a base for modern vampire legends.

Fresh Blood Witch is Elizabeth’s anti-pig…err anti-army Noble Phantasm. It is her Dragon Breath attack used to its maximum potential.

Elizabeth brings out the Csejte Castle that she controlled during her life, and booms out a terrifying supersonic attack from her acoustically destructive weapon. [TL NOTE: In the game her castle is a giant speaker]

According to Cas-ko it’s just like the monstrous combination of gorilla and whale breath.

After learning about Japanese culture, she got hooked on the idea of becoming an extreme idol, “As a noble, I will confer the greatest of honors and rewards to those who are heading to their death!” Apparently.

However, as expected, she is too radical and ahead of the curve, and the only one who understands her is Red Saber. Certainly a sad turn of events.

Will it happen? A second debut on Venus?

 

■破补ぷ鳌茎攻ル】

vア`チャ`のスキルのひとつ。

殛Lを行う前、涠坞Aで相手の榱Δ颏饯落とす才能。トラップの_人。

vア`チャ`ほどの技量なら、フィ`ルドが森林であれば相手がMしてくる前に六割近い兵力を殛L不能に追いこむ事も可能。

『はその三割が失われたr点で作樾婴不可能になる』というのが常Rだが、なるほど、いかに彼がO非道な工作に丐筏皮い郡分かろうというものだ。

このスキルが高ければ高いほど、英雄としての格は低下していく。

余ではあるが、vア`チャ`は长蚩绀工毪郡幛违去楗氓驻り、tア`チャ`は长蜃筏し丹工郡幛违去楗氓驻蛄激筏趣工搿

 

Subversive Activities [skill] P203

One of Green Archer’s skills.

Before combat, during the preparation stage, this ability shaves off some of his enemies’ power. It’s the hallmark of a master of traps.

For one as capable as Green Archer is, if the stage is a forest (or somewhat wooded), before the enemy can even enter battle it is possible to reduce their combat potential or forces by 60%.

It is common sense in military strategy that, “Upon losing a third of your forces, you are no longer able to continue your operation.” This shows just how diabolic a scheme he managed to realize.

The higher this skill is leveled, the more it decreases the level of enemy heroes.

To digress, Green Archer lays traps to exterminate his enemies, while Red Archer just sees traps as an effective way of repelling his enemies.

 

■パッションリップ【アルタ`エゴ】

墼鳏违ルタ`エゴ。

大きすぎる胸と凶な爪が印象的な少女。

ＢＢの心の一部を摘出して作られた上ＡＩ。

女神系のサ`ヴァントを切りNりして作られたハイ・サ`ヴァント。

椁い虾盲蓼胜い、スキル・被虐体|によって人々からuわれる事になり、仕方なく迎膜筏皮い搿

内向的で、一途で、思いzみの激しい性格。

デフォルト状Bから主人公に好意を持っており、早い段Aから主人公をから守っていた。

が、主人公に近づくものは何であれ邪魔者なのか、味方であるv茶ですら排除象になるというヤンデレっぷりをk]する。

イデススキルは『クラッシュ＆トラッシュ』。

界にГ蓼胛锾濉钉猡巍筏胜椤どれほど巨大な容量だろうと握りつぶす、虚数空gならではの_し}的なRs技法《コ`ディック》）。

リップは破菠颂鼗しており、相手が婴ないもの……地形や建物ならＢＢ以上の破擦Δ虬k]する。

もっともサ`ヴァントやマスタ`相手だと、すぐに危を察知されてリップの界からx脱→のろまなリップは追いつけない、というオチになるのだが。

ゲ`ム中では屈指のパワ`キャラとして登觥

相手を包みzみ、ねじ切り、胸の中に仕舞って独り占めする盲目的な求郅位身である。

 

パッションリップにMみこまれた女神は三体。

一神目はインドの美の女神パ`ルヴァティ`。

盲目的に、そして献身的に夫である破采癀伐籁・郅筏颗神。

二神目は椁い闻神ドゥルガ`。

パ`ルヴァティ`の让妞趣丹欷毳丧ゥ毳`は、十本の神授の武器を持っている。パッションリップの巨大な爪はその十のを具F化したもの。

三神目は北欧の椁い闻神ブリュンヒルト。

恋した勇者とYばれず、哀しみから破绀蚝簸螭琅王。ワ`グナ`のS・摔いてはブリュンヒルデとされ、死者の魂を天界に送る橐遗として登訾工搿

言うまでもなく、こちらの末も郅私~望し、郅工胝撙颏饯问证摔ける悲・坤盲俊

 

Passionlip [alter ego] P203

Passionlip is the Alter Ego of love and hate.

She leaves an impression with her excessively oversized chest and evil looking claws.

She is a High Level Ai created from a plucked out piece of BB’s mind.

Passionlip is a High Servant whose base model was cut and paste from a goddess type servant.

She does not enjoy fighting, but due to her skills like Masochistic Predisposition she ends up being attacked, and so she reluctantly counter attacks [so she can survive].

She has an introverted personality and a tendency to assume things, but she always acts wholeheartedly.

By default she has a liking for the protagonist, and from early on she starts protecting him/her from the shadows.

However Passionlip doesn’t want anyone else to get close to the protagonist, and even her ally Ryokucha becomes a target for extermination when the protagonist is under her yandere-like supervision.

 

One of her id_es skills is “Crash & Trash.”

With this skill Passionlip can use her claws to crush any object, no matter how large, as long as it can be contained within her field of vision. This skill can only ever be used in an imaginary number space through the use of a compression codec with almost illusory properties.

Lip specializes in destruction, and as long as her target doesn’t move, like terrain or a building, Lip exceeds BB in destructive power.

It must be added that Servants and Masters immediately sense danger and escape from her field of vision. The gullible Lip is unable to chase after them well, and the result is she ends up losing them.

However, within the game she appears as the most prominent power character.

She is the embodiment of blind courtship. She dandies up the target of her love in her mind, and shuts them away inside her heart in order to keep them all to herself.

 

There are three goddesses who have been inserted into Passionlip.

The first is the Indian goddess of beauty, Parvati.

She is a Goddess who blindly and devotedly loved her husband Shiva, who is the god of destruction.

The second is the Battle Goddess Durga.

Durga is a manifestation of Parvati, and carries 10 divine weapons. Passionlip’s 10 giant claws are the embodiment of those weapons.

The third goddess is Brynhildr of Northern Europe.

The Queen Brynhildr failed to be bound to the hero she loved, and fell into ruin while wallowing in sorrow. The Brynhildr in Passionlip is said to be the Brynhildr from Wagner’s opera cycle, and thus she appears as the warrior maiden (valkyrie) who guides the souls of the dead to heaven.

It goes without saying, depending on the circumstances even love can turn into despair, and Brynhildr tragically ends up guiding the soul of her loved one.

 

■万色悠滞【g式】

ばんしょくゆうたい。

⑸院キアラが_kした医ソフト。

天流の密教修法をアレンジして作られた、子化体へのハッキングコ`ド。

メンタルケアを目的として_kされたg式《コ`ドキャスト》だが、人丐蚯证刮ｊ性をふくんでいる事からキアラ自身の手で封印された`法プログラム。

他者のに侵入し、交信・感辘ら、その精神と魂とを自在にiみ取る。

﻿いってしまえば世界での裸の付き合いで、文字通り、g者は相手のすべてを受け入れる事になる。

医目的で_kされたものの、皮肉な事にその多幸感、安心感はあらゆるドラッグを上回っており、自我が薄いもの、意思が弱いものがこれを使用すると苦界……Fgにる事を放してしまう事例が多k。

一部政府高官にも流行しだしたr点で西欧yはこのソフトを`法とJ定し、_k者である⑸院キアラを犯罪者として国H指名手配犯とした。

犯罪史上、最大の禁忌とも、当然のK着点とも言われている。

 

10,000 Lust Bondage [codecast] P203-204

Banshoku Yuutai.

Healing software developed by Sesshoin Kiara.

It constitutes a hack of the spiritron transformed digital body made from an arrangement of Eternal Heaven Sect secret prayers and austerities.

It’s a codecast used with the aim of performing mental care, however since it has the risky potential to be used to violate a person’s human rights, Kiara herself sealed the software away and labeled it as an illicit program.

It invades the cyber brain of its target, and by analyzing brain signals, communication and response to stimulus, the software can freely read the contents of the target’s mind and soul.

 

To be frank, this software is just like its name; the user of the codecast completely accepts and takes in the target through a naked encounter in the cyber world.

Although the software was developed for medical purposes, ironically, the feeling of euphoria and comfort it provides exceeds that of so-called cyber drugs. If someone with a weak Ego or weak will power were to use this software, they would end up in a world of suffering. There have been many cases where after using this software the user abandons the idea of returning to reality.

 

After an incident where some high ranking government officials were infected with this software, the West Europe Plutocracy designated it as illegal, and went after its developer Kiara Sesshoin, and put her on the international wanted criminal list.

Of course it can be said this result was only expected seeing as this software will go down in cyber crime history for breaking one of the greatest taboos.

 

■ＢＢ【☆】

月のY趣孙S爽とFれた後系デビルヒロイン。

魔の尻尾をLしつつ教鞭片手に月のY趣虮挤抛栽凇钉郅螭埭Δ袱钉ぁ贰⑸瘠丹萑・辘墙袢栅SE.RA.PHを`法改造しまくっている。

ＣＣＣを起こした暴走ＡＩ。

@と同型Cの管理ＡＩだったが、バグにより自己保存の命令系yが暴走。ある理由から『何を咨にしても自己保存をAける』Yに至り、ＮＰＣたちやサ`ヴァント、マスタ`たちを取りzみ、成LしAける怪物になってしまった。

「人gは嫌い」と公言し、主人公たちを月のY趣艘きzんで苦しめる。

一人称は「わたし」。

主人公はセンパイと呼ぶ。人gには名字にさん付けで、サ`ヴァントは呼び韦啤

本人は正常なつもりでいるが、客Q的にると明らかに狂っている。言婴韦悉筏肖筏らヤンデレ臭を漂わせるが、それが何に起因するかはゲ`ム本を参照のこと。

 

◆

 

ＣＣＣの真のヒロイン。

前半では「愉快犯」として、

後半では「倒すべき人の场工趣筏Qわれる。

氐驻筏啤溉碎g嫌いのo邪荬遣锌幛释跖」といった振る舞いをするが、そのk端は些な、たった一度の^ちだった。

彼女はある理由からム`ンセル（世界）を相手に椁Φ坤蜻xび、最K的には消绀工胧陇蚶斫猡筏可悉恰⒆苑证ら狂った（暴走した）のである。その真相が明らかに成ったr、原因はこういかける。

 

「道理が合わない。それだけの事をしてもらう理由が、が、自分にはないからだ」

 

それは|でもあり、プレイ中にプレイヤ`が抱く共通の疑だろう。

staynightで例えるなら、lm士郎はセイバ`や凛に好意を持たれるに足る行樱ē谣恁ぅ氓性）をせたが、ＣＣＣにおいてはヒロイック性をk]するC会がなかったからだ。

しかし、人形だったＡＩは鹤悚菠四郡蜷]じた。

 

「特eな人gが、特eな言~で手をさしのべてくれるより」

「どこにでもいるF方が、せいいっぱいの特eな言~で笑ってくれた事が、嬉しかった」

 

れたヒ`ロ`がヒロイックな行婴钎谣恁ぅ螭蚓趣Δ韦稀⒋_かにlもが粢る白Rの王子像だろう。

けれどそれは当たり前のル`チンワ`クだ。

ヒ`ロ`として作られたものが、与えられた能力通りの性能をk]したにすぎない。

それよりもただのモブ（一般人）である『F方』が、たった一度でも特eな言~を口にしてくれた事が、彼女には嬉しかった。

ＣＣＣは一般人の衿侍の物Zでもある。

『永hにヒロインにxばれない』ＡＩ（@）にとって、それこそが美しいもの、F《とうと》い奇Eにえた。

だからlけた。３８０００光年のの中を。

……たとえそれが、}杯檎のKわりに消え去ってしまう、一r《ひととき》の残像だったとしても。

 

BB [☆] P204
BB is the underclassman (kouhai-kei) devil heroine that dashingly appears on the far side of the Moon.

She usually hides her devil tail, and holds a teacher’s pointer in one hand. Always behaving with abandon, she thinks she is a god, and is always making illicit modifications to SE.RA.PH.

She is an out of control AI that brought about the events of CCC.

She was formerly a management AI of the same type as Sakura, but due to a bug her self-preservation system went wild, and for some reason she came to the conclusion that, “No matter the sacrifice, I must continue to exist.” and turned into a continuously growing monster that absorbs NPCs, Servants and Masters.

She openly hates humans, and makes the protagonist and company suffer by dropping them on the far side of the Moon.

She calls the protagonist “senpai.” She addresses humans by their family name and adds “-san” but she addresses servants with only their name.

BB assumes that she is normal, but if you look at things objectively she is clearly crazy. Her frequently yandere-like actions come to mind, but rather than explaining here, please refer to the game itself to find out the reasons behind them.

 

◆

 

BB is the true heroine of CCC.

In the first half of the game she is treated as a criminal who takes delight in people’s reactions to her crimes.

In the second half of the game she is treated as an enemy of humanity that must be defeated.

Her actions thoroughly reflect her “human hating, innocently cruel Queen” character, but the road that led to be like that was brought about by a single trivial mistake.

For some reason she decided to fight against Moon Cell (the world), despite the fact that Moon Cell’s destruction would also mean her own destruction. Upon realizing this contradiction she caused herself to go crazy (go out of control). When she realized the truth of the situation, she asked herself the following.

 

“It’s not logical. There’s just no reason, no value for me to do such a thing.”

 

This problem poses a question that the player must also address during their play through.

If you were to use Fate/stay night as an example, Emiya Shiro’s actions (heroic nature) are appropriate for the affection he holds for Saber or Rin, but in CCC there is no chance for the protagonist to demonstrate their heroic nature.

However, the AI who was once just a puppet closed her eyes for the last time with a satisfied expression on her face.

 

“More than special words and a helping hand offered by some human special to me, the words that came from you, who was always there doing your best to make me laugh, made me happy.”

 

Certainly any girl dreams of being saved by the heroic actions of a prince riding on a white horse.

But that is just something that is expected [of a hero in a game].

When a character is made as a hero, they are doing nothing more than demonstrating the ability and power given to them from the start.

So when a minor character (just a normal person) like the protagonist says something special to her even just once, she is happier than if the protagonist were a hero.

 

CCC is a story about the dignity of normal people.

To the AI Sakura, who could never be selected as a heroine, this dignity is true beauty, and the expression of this dignity is like a precious miracle to her.

That’s why she ran. 38,000 light years into the darkness.

…So that even if this dignity disappeared at the end of the Holy Grail War, it’s after image would still remain for a time.

 

﻿■ＢＢちゃんねる【イベント】

二章以降、そのA婴入部に差しzまれるステ`ジB介ム`ビ`。提供ＢＢ、制作ＢＢ、主演ＢＢによるハイパ`自演タイム。

本放送六回+追加放送三～四回。

ＢＢが痛いぐらいにハイテンションなのは、ここでしか主人公とvわれないため、必死にアピ`ルしているからである。努力むなしく逆方向にフラグをたてるＢＢであった。

当初は一枚}の背景CGとＢＢのフェイス}だけでMむものだったが、_kスタッフの嵋猡趣んばりによって、荬つくとム`ビ`形式のイベントになっていた。gにマスタ`アップ一ヶ月前の事である。

ゲ`ム中のサブイベントで、ＢＢチャンネルをуhしていたアリ`ナの{恕とかあったら面白かったかもしれない。お邪魔しマ`ス、と中に入ると、そこには『EXTRAおまけ觥护鞘工铯欷骏邾铳ぅ去堠`ドとサクライダ`のコスプレ衣装が……。

 

BB Channel [event] P205

From the second chapter onwards, there is a “BB channel” movie for each layer that introduces the new game play elements of that stage. Sponsored by BB, produced by BB, and featuring BB.

There are 6 main broadcasts with 3-4 additional mini-broadcasts of BB’s show.

In the show BB is so hyped up that her high-strung attitude almost hurts, this is because BB Channel is the only time that BB gets to spend with the protagonist, so she is desperately trying to show her appeal. However her efforts are rather fruitless, and have the opposite effect.

Originally the BB Channel sections only comprised of one background CG with BB’s face in front, but thanks to the hard work of the development staff it became a series of short movies before I knew it.  Actually the BB channel movies were produced in the last month before the development deadline.

It might have been interesting to include an investigation and report about each arena as part of BB Channel. “Excuse meeeeeeeee” and then after entering the room she just finds the whiteboard used in EXTRA’s “Bonus Theater” (Omake Theather) and the SakuRider cosplay outfit….

 

■ＢＢB【その他】

三章で登訾予定されていた、サ`ヴァント用o晨绁恁堋

されたアリ`ナをまるごと部品として使ったというが、所はＢＢの色`いコンパチキャラか、差e化ができてガンダムサイズ、ぐらいのガッカリボスだったと予想される。でも本人より素直な分、きっと可郅ぁ

リップは「可郅ないから」という理由でしたが、本当の理由は何だったかは言わぬがAか。

 

BBB [other] P205

BBB is an invincible anti-servant robot of annihilation that we planned on putting into chapter three.

It was supposed to have been made from parts and pieces of old arenas, but ended up just being an easy to make alternate color version of BB. To differentiate BBB from BB, we made BBB the size of a mech. She would have probably made for a pretty disappointing boss. However BBB was to be more honest about her feelings that BB, so that could’ve been pretty cute.

Passionlip said that “BBB’s not cute” and supposedly crushed her for that reason, but perhaps it’s best not to say the real reason.

 

■被虐体|【スキル】

パッションリップのイデススキル。

集殛Lにおいて、相手の骋狻顶廿ぅ取筏蜃苑证思め、攻象になる_率をす。

マイナスのように思われがちだが、固な防御力を持つ者がこのスキルを持っているとれたol役としてC能する。

若干の防御プラスも含まれ、Ａランクともなると更なる特殊抗が付き、攻趣瞎イ幛欷泄イ幛毪郅衫渚菠丹蚯筏、ついにはこのスキルを持つ者の事しか考えられなくなる。

一一の殛Lでは死にスキルだが、パ`ティ`椁摔いてはたいへん役立つスキル。今rのバクスラでは、盾役なくしてダンジョン探索はyしい。

 

Masochistic Predisposition [skill] P205

This is one of Passionlip’s id_es skills.

In group battles Passionlip uses this skill to focus the enemies’ hate on her and increase the chance that she will end up as the target of their attacks.

Players tend to think there is no benefit to this skill, but if a character with strong defensive stats is given this skill, they can function as an amazing defender.

This skill also slightly increases defensive stats, and when it is upgraded to A Rank the skill gain yet another special effect; the more an enemy attacks the user of this skill, the more they lose their ability to reason, and before they know it the only thing they can only think of is the user of this skill.

In one on one battles using this skill will just end up with you dying, but it’s incredibly useful in party battles. In modern hack and slash games it’s hard to make it through a dungeon without a character to tank lots of damage.

 

■ヒロインダンジョン【その他】

五章ラストに展_される特殊ダンジョン。

メルトウイルスに侵された@をケアするため、主人公はコ`ドキャスト・万色悠滞によって@の体に潜入した。

要はインナ`スペ`スである。医行椁趣筏迫颂澶饲堡毪韦瞎诺SFによくられたギミック。

ＣＣＣの初期基本コンセプトは『ヒロインへのサイコダイブ』だったため、仕が涓してもこのイベントはきっちり残された。

没になったシナリオでは、ヒロインダンジョンにされるのは@・凛・ラニの三名であり、この中でもっとも好感度の高いヒロインがメルトリリスにuわれるOだった。

のちに凛とラニが序Pのいけに……もとい、ボスに格上げされたため、ダンジョン化するのは@ひとりになった。

端的に言ってしまうとstaynightにおけるＨシ`ンの代わりというか、ヒロインと深くYびつく行椁颍遥校堑膜寺浃趣忿zんだもの。お医者さんごっこと思いねえ。

﻿しかし、そのをいた武内崇（BIGBOSS）は

「なるほど。それはいいアイデアだ。───当然、赤セイバ`のもあるんだよね？」

と切り返してきた。

_かに@だけではユ`ザ`の期待に辘à皮い胜ぁとライタ`は反省し、サ`ヴァントダンジョンもg装するようシナリオを付け足した。あいかわらず、このあたりの勘どころは凄まじいBOSSである。

 

Heroine Dungeon [other] P205

This is a special dungeon that opens up at the end of the fifth chapter.

In order to help Sakura, who has been infected by the Melt Virus, the protagonist uses the codecast 10,000 Lust Bondage to dive into Sakura’s cyber body.

This dungeon is essentially Sakura’s inner space. Diving into someone to take medical action is a well known science fiction gimmick of old.

The earliest key concept for CCC was “Diving into the minds of the heroines.” So even though the concept changed, this event was left over.

Part of the scenario was cut during development. Originally there was going to be a Heroine Dungeon for Sakura, Rin, and Rani, and Melt Lilith would attack the one who had the most affection for the protagonist.

But then Rin and Rani were sacrifi―err, were promoted to be early game bosses, so Sakura was the only one left in the game with a Heroine Dungeon.

Frankly this was kind of implemented in the place of the erotic scenes you can experience in Fate/stay night. You build a deep relationship with the heroine in an RPG styled way.

Just think of it as playing cyber doctor, okay?

But when Takeshi Takeuchi (our BIG BOSS) heard about this he said,

“I see. That’s a good idea. ――Of course, there’s one for Red Saber as well, right?”

Certainly, having a Heroine Dungeon for only Sakura would let down the expectations of the players, so the writers thought about what they could do, and adjusted the scenario so that Servant Dungeons would also be implemented. As always, our BOSS has great intuition for things like this.

 

■ファ`ム【事柄】

西欧yによる都市管理、ないし、その在り方を椰@したもの。

争いのないユ`トピア。

或いは、自意Rを眠らされたディストピア。

支配AとPAを明_に区分けし、支配Aであろうとその将来をきっかり管理する{和都市。

人N差eはなく、能力区eがあるだけ。

人皆平等はっておらず、それぞれの民族内部での平等を良しとする。

究Oの人N分《さべつ》だが、これも完成された社会の一つ。

西欧yは萘Δ蜴Rし、彼らが理想とする社会でこの星をy一しようとmMしている。

 

Farm [circumstances] P206 [TL NOTE: possibly Firm (like a company) or Form, but impossible to tell from the katakana name, and the contents don’t help much either.]

This is the city management system implemented by the West Europe Plutocracy.

It created a utopia without conflict.

Or possibly a dystopia that has reduced the self-awareness of the people.

In this harmonious city system the ruling class and worker class are clearly separated, and even if you are part of the ruling class your future is precisely managed.

There is no racial discrimination, and treatment only differs based on actual ability.

There is no stipulation that all humans are made equal, and it is deemed enough as long as people are equal within their group.

This amounts to extreme racial discrimination, but this is one possible version of a perfect society.

The West Europe Plutocracy subjugates any hostile forces on their mission to push forward and unify the planet under this system that they think is ideal.

 

■Lo委TL【ＮＰＣ】

旧校hのA段前にいるＮＰＣ。

数少ない上ＡＩのひとりで、叵蓼@より上、言峰より下。人gを旧世界の下等生物とX蔑しており、それはマスタ`相手でも浃铯椁胜ぁ

ム`ンセルの律を~とし、常事Bに混乱しきっているＮＰＣたちの中で唯一、明_な打_策をg行しようとするが……。

ＢＢ登鲆越丹吮伺にしかけると、まあ、そうなるよね、というオチが待っている。

しかし、いくら思考ル`チンに}があったとしても、彼女も罪のないひとりのツンデレ。できる事なら助けたいと思うザビ夫／ザビ子もいるだろう。

Yから言うと、gは助けられる。

いいかいザビ。こういうrは逆に考えるんだ。しかけるとＢＢに消されるなら、ＢＢが消えるまでoしちゃってもいいさと考えるんだ。

 

Disciplinary Chairperson [NPC] P206
She is an NPC found in front of the stairs in the Old School Building.

She is one of the few High Level AIs, and has more authority than Sakura but less than Kotomine.

She scornfully treats humans as inferior creatures of the old world, even the Masters.

She holds Moon Cell’s rules to be absolute. During the irregular situation that arises, all the other NPCs are running around in confusion, and she is the only one with a clear plan to escape the problem, but…

After BB has arrived in the school if you try talking to the Disciplinary Chairperson, well, the result is as expected.

However, no matter how many problems she has in her information processing algorithms, she is just an innocent tsundere. I’m sure that Zabio/Zabiko want to save her if possible.

So yeah, you can actually save her.

Got that Zabi? At times like this you have to think from the end. If you talk to her, BB will erase her, so that means you need to ignore her until after BB is eliminated. [TL NOTE: The Japanese used for eliminated could also mean “until BB goes away/disappears.” I’m not sure which is appropriate as far as the game goes.]

 

■フォトニックY晶【事柄】

光を]じこめるY晶体。

屈折率が周期的に浠するナノ造体であり、内部に投射した光をナノ造によって制御できる。

その性|から量子コンピュ`タ`への活用も期待されているが、まだ研究は入り口程度。天然物ではオパ`ルが当する。EXTRA世界では月の内部は一つの巨大なフォトニックY晶で出来ているとされる。

 

Photonic Crystal [circumstances] P206

These are crystals that enclose light.

The refractive index of these crystals periodically changes. Light beamed into the crystals is regulated by nano-structures.

Due to the light-controlling nano-structure properties of these crystals, scientists expect they can be used to make quantum computers, but research into them is still just getting started. As far as other natural materials go, Opal has corresponding properties. In the world of EXTRA the interior of the Moon is thought to be one giant Photonic Crystal.

 

■藤村先生【ＳＳＦ】

iの英Z教。かつて、そして今も日常の象栅妊预铯欷筏猡巍

上ＡＩとの事だが、何を管理しているかは不明。

EXTRAでは突然のデスゲ`ムに困惑する主人公にお使いを押しつけ、

ＣＣＣでは突然のエスケ`プゲ`ムに翻弄される主人公にお使いを押しつける。

よし、何があろうとプレていない。

藤村先生のo理y}をクリアするとマイル`ムのインテリアが充gしていくのだが、あのツ`ショット写真だけはいかがなものか。

EXTRAでは.一L目以降、タイガ`クエストをすべて_成すると、{子に\って兢螭扦悉胜椁胜ぅ猊韦﻿兢婴膜堡皮筏蓼Α￥饯长蓼扦摔筏皮けよ藤村。

 

Fujimura-sensei [SSF] P206-207

Fujimura-sensei is a mysterious English teacher.

It can be said that both in the past and present she is the symbol of daily life.

She is a high level AI, [and as such is supposed to manage some part of the tournament], but it is not clear what she actually manages.

In EXTRA she just abuses the protagonist as a gofer (despite the protagonist being completely bewildered at being suddenly thrown into a death game), and in CCC (where the protagonist is in an escape game) they toy with the protagonist as a gofer.

Okay, so there is no difference regardless of the situation.

If you clear all the tricky problems that Fujimura-sensei throws at you, you get access to the satisfying interior of her My Room. But what do you think of that picture you take with her?

In EXTRA, if you clear all the Taiga Quests from the second week onwards, Taiga will get cocky and end up summoning something that shouldn’t be summoned. I think that’s quite enough, Fujimura.

 

■ふたりの歌【その他】

赤セイバ`とエリベ`トのこと。

どっちも超レアの歌と言わざるをえない。プラスかマイナスかはeにして。

赤セイバ-はエリザベ`トの独性を本荬琴Iっており、あの魔曲を正しく魔曲としてき、その上で「それも良し！」とJめている。

一方、エリザベ`トは自分が魔曲を歌っているというg感はまったくない。彼女は慢性的な^痛が原因で、正しく音Aを把握できないだけなのである。エリザベ`トは"自分が莩证亮激なるために歌う"とテラオンチで、自分先の感情を抑え、”他人のために歌う”と本当にディ`バになる。

 

The Two Diva [other] P207

This refers to Red Saber and Elizabeth.

We can’t go without saying that they are both super rare level Diva. Let’s leave the debate of whether this is a plus or a minus for another day.

Red Saber takes Elizabeth’s creativity seriously, and listens to her demonic sounding song as if it were truly intended to be demonic, as even goes as far as praising it with “That’s also good!”

But Elizabeth has absolutely no idea that her song sounds so terrible. This is because she suffers from chronic headaches which impede her from accurately grasping musical scales. At the start Elizabeth sings her extremely tone-deaf song “to make myself feel good” but eventually she subdues her selfish feelings and becomes a true diva who sings for the benefit of others.

 

■フランシスコ・ザビエル【その他】

キリスト教の}人。

西罚保担梗茨辍⑷毡兢松详した宣教。

世界を巡り、冥主の教えを布教した事から死後、}人の列に加わった。

Fate/EXTRA本、名oしの森に踏み入った主人公があげるかもしれないiの奇声が、このト摔蚊前と酷似している……というSE.RA.PH七不思hがある。

 

Francisco Xavier [other] P207

A Christian Saint.

A missionary who arrived in Japan in 1594.

He was posthumously designated as a Saint after spending his life traveling around the world spreading the word of God.

In the main storyline of Fate/EXTRA, upon entering the nameless forest the protagonist might suddenly let loose a mysterious strange voice saying something that resembles the name of this great man…

This is one of the seven great mysteries of SE.RA.PH.

 

■死が二人を分断《わか》つまで【宝具】

ブリュンヒルデ・ロマンシア。

ＢＢがアルタ`エゴに与えた心宝具。

アルタ`エゴたちの宝具は正の宝具を`法改造したもので、その名前も性能も、Zい取った.兀ネタからちょい乖xしている。

材料になったサ`ヴァントは『ヴォルスンガ・サガ』に登訾工毳铳毳ュ`レ、ブリュンヒルデ。

自分をY切り、その名誉をつけた夫シグルズへの妥のために振るわれた墼鳏。

密には、そのものではなく、ブリュンヒルデのシグルズにする深い矍椁仍がの形を取ったもの。

象への矍椁深ければ深いほど、命中精度とダメ`ジ数をしていく。たとえそれが一方通行のものであったとしても、郅筏肯嗍证Qして逃さない。

即死抗が付与しているのは、リップの『トラッシュ＆クラッシュ』によるもの。

ちなみに、初期案では投げ技だった。

相手をロックオンしたが最後、防御力は十倍に大。ダメ`ジを受けてもひるまないス`パ`ア`マ`状Bで重檐のように近づいていき、唇を思わせるカタチに湫韦筏孔Δ窍嗍证虿妒长工搿

そのH、いきおい余って爪はリップ自身をもき、二人とも大ダメ`ジを受け、共倒れになる……みたいな。

 

Until Death Do Us Part. [noble phantasm] P207

Byrnhildr Romancia.

The anti-heart Noble Phantasm that BB bestows upon the Alter Egos.

This Noble Phantasm is the product of an illegal modification to a normal Noble Phantasm, so its name and effects deviate slightly from the original.

The servant that became the material used for this Noble Phantasm is the Valkyrie Brynhildr from the Volsunga Saga.

This Noble Phantasm is the spear of love and hate that Brynhildr brandishes to get her revenge on her husband Sigurd who betrayed her and damaged her honor and reputation.

Strictly speaking it’s not a true spear. It is Brynhildr’s intense feelings of love and hate toward her husband that have taken the shape of a spear.

The deeper the love one has for the target of this Noble Phanstasm, the more accurate and damaging it becomes. This weapon will never let their loved one get away, even if their love is completely one-sided. The immediate death effect comes from Passionlip’s Trash & Crash.

By the way, the original design had a grab and throw move.

If it locked on to you, you were done for. It would also increase Passionlip’s defense rating 10x, putting her in a super armored state where there is no worry of being significantly damaged. Passionlip  advances like a heavy tank, and her claws that changed into the shape of lips would devour the enemy.

Then, due to using too much power when clenching her claws, her claws would pierce through herself, and both her and her target would take huge damage, and both be wiped out… or something like that.

 

■血の妹【宝具】

プル`ト・ディ・シェヴェスタァ。

白いバ`サ`カ`が放った宝具……のようなもの。

出典は格Lゲ`ム、メルティブラッドの暴走アルクェイドの最大攻膜ら。

ゲ`ム本では高い物理ダメ`ジと、状B常『月』を付属する。『月』状Bのサ`ヴァントは筋力と耐久力が下がってしまう。

 

宝具というよりは彼女が持つ特性のようなもの。

月と地球のvS性を利用した世界O定とも。

月の^体から起こり、Lい年月をUて地球の触となったこの化身は、月の分身でありながら地球の啬埭饧妞浃à皮い搿

月の基本ル`ル、地球の基本ル`ルを同rに体Fし、また、これらが同列するrのp酷を攻氖侄韦趣筏剖褂盲扦る。

その一つが、周欷苇h境を地球《じぶん》趣摔瑜护啬堋テラフォ`ミング・アトラクションだ。

月の重力は地球の六分の一にすぎない。

たとえ世界であれそれは浃铯椁骸（ム`ンセル内の情螭悉工伽匹喋`ンセル中枢の|量に引き寄せ﻿られる。これを空gにおける引力と考える）ム`ンセルに存在するものはすべて月の法tにっている。

この素体はその概念を体Fし、地球趣扦る彼女の前にFれるものすべてを六分の一の能力に下げてしまう。これはどれほど高い魔力を持っていても防げない、世界そのもののQまり《ル`ル》である。

（余ではあるが、椁い挝杼à地球だった龊稀象より一段A上の能力を@得する啬埭趣胜耄

 

……とまあ、概念のなのでたいへん分かりづらい。

地球趣られば相手が六分の一になっただけ、

月趣られば相手が六倍になっただけ……と、

ようによってはどちらにもとれる啬埭坤、これは明_に”相手の能力を六分の一にする”もの。

彼女が自身をブ`ストできるのは地球のr、

彼女が相手にペナルティをかすのは月のr、

と考えると分かりやすい。

 

Bloody Sister [Noble Phantasm] P207-208

Bloody Sister.

This is a Noble Phantasm that White Berserker lost… or something like that.

Originally from the fighting game Melty Blood where it was Mad Arcueid’s strongest attack.

In EXTRA this Noble Phantasm deals high physical damage, and applies the abnormal status effect of “The Moon” which lowers the power and endurance of enemy servants.

 

It’s more White Berserker’s special characteristic than it is a Noble Phantasm.

It uses the relationship between the Earth and the Moon to affect enemies.

Being instigated by the brain of the Moon, it is the embodiment of the Moon that after many years became the Earth’s sense of touch. Since White Berserker is an avatar (bunshin) of the Moon, she also has this power.

It simultaneously personifies the fundamental rules of both the Moon and the Earth, and by putting the rules of the Earth and Moon side by side it can use the discrepancies as a method of attack.

This includes the ability to bring the environment around a battle onto White Berserker’s side, called Terraforming Attraction.

The gravity of the Moon is no more than one sixth of the Earth’s.

This remains unchanged in the cyber world.  (All information inside Moon Cell is pulled toward the core by the core’s mass. This is thought to be what constitutes gravity in the cyber world.)

Everything that exists within Moon Cell obeys the rules of the Moon.

By using these truths this Noble Phantasm embodies the necessary concept and reduces the power of everything whose origin is the Earth to one sixth of the power it should have. This effect is unable to be avoided no matter how much anti-magic power one possesses as it is one of the world’s decided truths.

(To digress, if the stage of battle is the Earth, enemies can obtain a one level increase in power level.)

 

…well with that being said, it’s a conceptual weapon so explaining and understanding it is extremely difficult.

From the point of view of someone on Earth the enemy had their power reduced to one sixth, from the point of view of someone on the Moon the enemy had their power multiplied by six…. and both the Earth and Moon have the right to make the situation bend to their point of view, but clearly this Noble Phantasm is the realization of the “Reduce the enemy’s power to one sixth” point of view.

To put it simply:

When on the Earth, Arcueid boosts her own power.

When on the Moon, Arcueid reduces her enemy’s power.

 

■ブロッサム先生【人名】

Ｑ＆Ａコ`ナ`の司会役。

初出は『Fate/EXTRAおまけ觥弧

どうても@なのだが、かたくなにブロッサム先生と名\る。@とＢＢの中gみたいな位置づけ。

EXTRAのキャラデザイン＆イラストを担うワダアルコ女史のき下ろし@の可郅丹、後のＣＣＣにがったといっても^言ではない。

ちなみにおまけ訾坦Pしていたr、既にＣＣＣの_kは可Qされていた。しつこく主すれば簸弦钉Α＞糸の一念、というヤツである。

 

Blossom-sensei [name] P208

The host of the Q&A corner.

She first appears in the “Fate/EXTRA Omake Theater” (Bonus Theater)

No matter how you look at it Blossom-sensei is actually Sakura, but she insistently refers to herself as Blossom-sensei. She seems to fall somewhere in between Sakura and BB.

It’s not too much to say that one of the major reasons we could make CCC is because of the new super cute drawings of Sakura that the character designer Ms. Wada Aruko did for us.

By the way, when we were writing the scenario for the Omake Theater it had already been decided that we would be developing the sequel CCC. If you insistently persevere, your dream will come true!

 

■宝具【スキル】

サ`ヴァントが持つ切り札。

英である彼らが生前に塾盲筏课渚摺あるいは逸を奇として再Fしたもの。

すべてのサ`ヴァントは、その出自となる怀肖蛭淦鳏趣筏Qえる。

一一で抗をk]する人宝具、

大荬して抗をk]する宝具、

建物や要塞等、地形すら破菠工城宝具、といったNに分けられる。

稀にEX……特例として界宝具があるが、そのレベルの宝具を持つ英は稀。

宝具はいずれも力なスキルであり、他にはない唯一o二のユニ`クスキルである。

ただし、宝具は英の徽hそのものなので、使用すれば他のマスタ`たちに正体を明かしてしまう事になる。一一が基本となる月の}杯檎においても、ト`ナメント形式である以上、情螭温は”堡丝がる。真名、宝具はできるかぎりLしたまま伽辆Aけるのがれたマスタ`と言えるだろう。

 

Noble Phantasm [skill] P208

These are special skills or weapons used as a Servant’s trump card.

They often comprise of the beloved weapons that Servants had when they were alive, or anecdotal stories about the Servant that is reproduced as a miracle.

All Servants can use the legends about them as weapons.

There are several classifications of Noble Phantasms. Anti-Person Noble Phantasms are used against single targets in one-on-one situations, while Anti-Army Noble Phantasms are used against large groups of enemies. There is also another type, Anti-fortress Noble Phantasms, which are effective at destroying buildings, fortresses, and even terrain.

There is also the rare EX classification... which is given to extraordinary Anti-Planetary Noble Phantasms, but few Heroic Spirits have Noble Phantasms of this level.

Noble Phantasms are all incredibly powerful unique skills.

However, Noble Phantasms are a manifestation of the legends about a Servant, so if a Servant uses a Noble Phantasm their true identity will be revealed to the other Masters. Even in the Moon’s Holy Grail War where battles are mostly one on one, the leak of a Servant’s information can lead to defeat. The best Masters can be said to be the ones who can continue to win while keeping the true name and Noble Phantasms of their Servant secret.

 

■星の_拓者【スキル】

ライダ`が持つスキル。

人史においてタ`ニングポイントになった英雄に与えられる特殊スキル。

あらゆるy航、y行が”不可能なまま”””gF可能な出来事”になる。

そのr代の述力ではあと一iたりないy行を、入g力だけで\り越える力。それはひとにぎりの天才が持つ才能ではなく、ひとりの、どこにでもいる人gが持つ『Fり』を燃やし尽くす力でもある。

世界一周を椁贰⒂⒐を世界の者にГい骏榨楗螗伐・ドレイクはg`いなく人───地球のタ`ンを一つMめた_拓者に相辘筏ぁ

 

Star Pioneer [skill] P208

Rider’s skill.

This is a special skill conferred upon the Heroic Spirit that triggered a major turning point in human history.

Every hard fight or difficult thing, “remains impossible, but possible to reproduce.”

Historical records of Drake’s time remain somewhat incomplete due to poor record keeping techniques, so this power is reduced to simply allowing Rider to do what others cannot with normal human power. This isn’t because Rider is more talented than anyone in the world, but rather because she has the ability to exhaust anyone’s “pride.”

Francis Drake, who led England to a supremely dominant position around the world, is without mistake a great pioneer who pushed mankind― humanity to the next level.

 

■ボムンクルス【事柄】

旧世界ではb金gによって作られた『埂护蛞馕钉筏皮い郡、それは既に^去のものだ。

EXTRA世界では、クロ`ン、ボムンクルスの技gはY社会ではポビュラ`なものとなっている。

宗教的理Qから禁止されていた技gだが、少子化}、出b率の低下、P力の不足から、非合法に取引される商品となっている。

﻿西欧yの管理下に置かれているような地域ではボムンクルスのu造は理的な}もあり公に行われる事はないが、西欧y管理外のアフリカや中|、アジア地域のしい国では、哟骸P力の、器淤Iの目的で|のいボムンクルスが大量生bされている。

西欧yによるY源の独占→しい国が更にしくなる→外を得るための手段としてボムンクルス作成→西欧yに器、P力が元される→西欧yうという循h。

真の意味でのボムンクルスはアトラス院でのみ造されるが、アトラス院の扉は未来永劫、]ざされたままである。

 

Homunculus [circumstances] P208-209

Homunculus used to refer to babies that were created by Alchemists in the old world, but that is all in the past now.

In the world of EXTRA homunculus and clone technology has become popular in underground society.

Such technology is forbidden by religious ethics, but due to the global birthrate decline which caused there to be a lack of manpower this unlawful technology has continued to thrive.

In areas controlled by the West Europe Plutocracy homunculus technology is considered unethical meaning it is unable to be used openly. However, in areas like Africa, the Middle East, and poor Asian countries, which lie outside of the Plutocracy’s sphere of control, the technology is used to mass produce low quality homunculus that are used as prostitutes, laborers, and for human organ sales.

The West Europe Plutocracy’s monopoly on resources has caused already poor countries to become even poorer which in turn leads them to use create homunculus as a way to obtain foreign capital and goods. This creates a vicious cycle where the poor countries sell their created organs and laborers which improves the Plutocracy’s labor force which in turn leads to the Plutocracy further profiting and solidifying their hold over the world.

Homunculus in the true sense of the word were only created at the Atlas Institute, but its doors have already been closed for all eternity.

 

■本x【イベント】

サ`ヴァントを@得したマスタ`たちによる、一T打ちのし合い。

 

・初日、橄嗍证胃嬷

・六日gの淦陂g《モラトリアム》

・七日目のQ槿

 

の三工程で行われる。

マスタ`たちは半々にpっていくシステムなので、五回椁扦喜肖臧巳摔摔蓼pってしまう。

七回槟俊⑿Ｅhに二人きりになったマスタ`たちの心境はいかほどのものか。

唯一残ったライバルをし、最後の一人になったrにム`ンセル中枢への路は_かれるというが……

 

Main Tournament [event] P209

The Main Tournament is a series of one-on-one battles to the death between the Masters who managed to make a contract with a Servant.

 

There are three stages:

First Day: Announcement of the tournament bracket (who will fight who).

First Day to Sixth Day: Moratorium on battle (preparation time).

Seventh Day: Finals

 

The tournament follows a system where half of the Masters are eliminated each round, so there are only eight Masters remaining by the fifth round.

In the seventh round, the border between the hearts and minds of the last two remaining Masters is something to behold.

It’s said that after killing your final adversary and being the last one alive the path to Moon Cell’s core will open up, but...

 

【ま行】

 

■マイル`ム【ロケ`ション】

マスタ`ひとりひとりに与えられた室。

ギスギスした}杯檎において、ほっと一息つける憩いの觥

完全なプライベ`ト空gで、ここでの会や出来事はQして外部には漏れない。

ム`ンセルもhこそしているものの、これをEする事は特例事が起きたrだけである。

デフォルト状Bはただの教室だが、マスタ`のコ`ドキャスト技g次第でいかようにも浠する。

主人公はインテリアを置くことぐらいしかできなかったが、レオや凛クラスになると内装をがらりとカスタマイズしている。

ＣＣＣのキャス狐ル`ムには「イエス・ノ`枕」ならぬ「是・非ノ枕」があざとく配置されている。

 

My Room [location] P209

My Room refers to the private room given to each Master.

It is one of the few places where you can catch a break from the serious atmosphere of the Holy Grail War.

My Room is a completely private space, and anything that is discussed inside will never be leaked or overheard.

Moon Cell’s prime objective during the Holy Grail War is to observe and better understand humans, but only under special circumstances can Moon Cell record what’s happening inside.

By default it’s just a regular classroom, but depending on a Master’s codecast skills it can change in various ways.

The protagonist is unable to even change the interior design, but Magus on the level of Leo or Rin can completely customize everything.

Cas-ko’s room in CCC is missing the Yes/No pillows and instead Agree/Disagree pillows have been unscrupulously implemented.

 

■魔性菩_【事柄】

ましょうぼさつ。

ある人物を指した言~、名称。

^に生えた魔_《つの》は天魔のもの。即ち、この者が者の者である事を示している。

『快S』を先する自己郅K。

その^程で他人の人生を利用・食い物にし、破绀丹护肴诵暮Α

この女を知った人gはまず彼女の}母の如き慈郅摔栅臁Ⅶ攘摔丹欷郡瑜Δ巳胄拧

その後、彼女に郅丹欷郡いまりに自己の欲望のみをひたすら追及して痴Bを晒すが、欲望は氦郡护氦郡工郅杀・なってしまうもの、

薄くなった快Sをこの女は好まない。

信者たちはこの女にv心を持ってもらえなくなり、「もう郅筏皮猡椁à胜ぁ工趣い~望から命を断っていく。被害者は体もYbもまるごと食い物にされるUである。

かぎりなく有罪なのだが、自した者たちがすべて彼女に感xしているため、犯罪として立件できずにいる。

o、感xというのは被害者たちの勘`い、あるいは自己欺隔。彼らもこの女が}女なのではなく底なしの魔である事に薄々荬ついていたが、その魔性からはiけ出せず、畜生道に落ちていくだけだった。

﻿方向性は`うが、女版の言峰_礼とも言える。

言峰は自分をとJめ、その性を良しとした非人g。

この女は自分の行い全てを善と捉え、主する物《もの》の怪である。

この物の怪は自分に何ひとつ嘘はつかず、しかし嘘まみれの言~で周りを食い物にし、自分のために消Mする。

その自我の~性、迷いのなさは、常人かられば悟りの境地だ。彼女に『}人』と呼べるところがあるとすれば、それはこの一点だろう。

 

◆

 

また、魔人化による渖《へんじょう》後の姿はＣＣＣ最大のせ訾摔筏匹磨氓偿撙嗓长怼

正式名琳は随喜自在第三外法快S天《ずいきじざいだいさんげほうかいらくてん》。

新しい天《かみ》であり、欲な地母神の末踏扦る。

本来なら「奥x・性欲完全オフ」を体得しているセイヴァ`さんぐらいでしか《いさ》められない女の化身。

その基本攻膜ことごとく肉行《にくだんこう》なのは、神特有の不思hエフェクトで攻膜工毪瑜辍⒅苯哟イ欷うせめぎ合いの方が愉しいからだそうだ。

Fate/EXTRAのボスキャラと同r期にキャラメイクされたボスキャラで、その立ち位置は表Y一体になっている。

「Fateといえば思想的なボスキャラです。EXTRAでもその例を守りたい」

と新{氏にプレゼンされ、「よし。ならば空の境界とFate/staynightの二大外道の名前を合わせたものがよいでしょう」

という事で、ああいう名前になった。

おりしもベヨネッタをクリアしてハイテンションだったシナリオ担当が、

「なんか俺もすごいピッチがきたい。超エロい宇宙模のピッチ。つ`か新ジャンル・ゴッドビッチ」

と欲望を丸出しに、武内崇に

「ラスボスは裸エプロンでおいします」

などと、意味不明の要望を出したという。

 

Devilish Bodhisattva [circumstances] P209-210

Mashou Bosatsu.

This term is the widely-known nickname of a certain somebody.

The horns jutting from her head are devil horns.

This shows that she is the enemy of the enlightened (buddhas).

She is the embodiment of self-love, and prioritizes pleasure over everything else.

Her pleasure is achieved by using human lives and treating them as sustenance. She is a walking disaster for man and beast alike.

Those who met this woman were touched by her great kindness and would devotedly follow her as though she has cast a spell upon them.

After that, due to her great desire to be loved, she would (foolishly) use them to indulge in her sexual desires. The problem is that the more you fulfill your sexual desires, the less satisfying it becomes to do so.

This woman has no desire for dilute, unsatisfying “pleasure.”

Her followers fell into despair because she no longer showed any concern for them, “She won’t love us ever again.” and thus they ended their lives. In the end, the victims had their bodies and everything they had completely devoured by her.

She is certainly guilty, but since all her followers who committed suicide were thankful to her, she was unable to be charged and prosecuted.

It goes without saying, her followers were simply mistakenly appreciative of her, or were deceived. Her followers were vaguely aware of the fact that she was not a saint, but actually a devil, but they were unable to escape from her devilish grasp, and found their lives degenerating.

 

A similar situation is also true for Kirei Kotomine, although he takes things in a somewhat different direction.

Kotomine recognized himself as evil, and decided that evil was appropriate for him, thus he strayed from the path of human morals.

This woman (a Devilish Bodhisattva) considers all her actions, regardless of what, to be good. Quite the haughty evil spirit.

This evil spirit of a woman lies to herself about nothing, but soaks her words with lies to entrap everyone around her as food; their lives expended completely for her own sake.

The absoluteness of her ego, her unwavering attitude towards everything; to a regular person it might seem as though she is on the border of enlightenment. If there were a specific reason that her followers called her a “saint,” it would be because at this characteristic.

 

◆

 

The appearance she takes on after her demonic reincarnation is one of the highlights in CCC (and also a bit far out).

Its formal name is The Third Pleasure Heaven of Deeply Grateful Existence (随喜自在第三外法快S天).

She is a new god descended from the Covetous Mother Goddess.

Only Saver, who has by all rights mastered the esoteric ability to completely turn off his sexual desire, is able to match up to this woman incarnate.

Rather than using the mysterious effects that are privilege only to God’s to attack, her primary method of attacking is using her hands. This is because according to her directly touching her opponent and having her opponent touch her is more pleasurable.

Having been designed at the same time as the Fate/EXTRA boss characters, she was made to be completely opposite of the others.

“Fate always has the most amazing boss characters. We want to make sure things stay that way in EXTRA as well.” said Mr. Niifu in a presentation, “In that case, why don’t we make her name a cross between the names of the main villains of Fate/stay night and The Garden of Sinners (Kara no Kyoukai)? And that’s how she got her name.

As for myself, at that time I had just cleared Bayonetta, which is why CCC features such a high tension scenario. I bared my desire for all to see, “Well see, I really want to write a slutty bitch into the story. A super erotic bitch to end them all. Like why the heck don’t we just make the game into a new genre called Code Bitch?” So I went to Takeshi Takeuchi with a variety of nonsensical requests such as, “Please make the last boss costume naked-apron (Hadaka Apron).”

 

■マスタ`【事柄】

}杯檎に参加した者たちの呼称。

原tとして魔gがなるものだが、ごく稀に魔g回路があるだけの一般人もマスタ`として登hされる。

どのような手段であれ、月に登り、予xを突破し、サ`ヴァントを召・契sすればマスタ`として本xに参加できる。

 

Master [concept] P210

Master is the title given to the humans who participate in the Holy Grail War.

In principle you must be a Magus to become a master, but in extremely rare circumstances a normal person who possesses magic circuits can become a Master.

Regardless of how, if someone makes it to the Moon, clears the preliminaries, and summons and contracts a Servant, they will be able to participate in the main tournament as a Master.

 

■g桐@【ＮＰＣ】

保健室の上ＡＩ。

役はマスタ`たちの健康管理。言峰同、}杯檎を柯柿激\婴工毪郡幛舜嬖冥筏皮い搿

名字はその回の}杯檎の参加者の名字からランダムにx出される。今回は桐シンジの「桐」をいただいたようだ。

限りなく人gに近い身体造、人格形成をしているが、役に丐筏皮い毪郡C械的な少女にえる事も。

@本人は思]深いが引っzみ思案で、常に相手をたてる性格をしている。

staynightではぶっちぎりの不幸属性、

EXTRAでは保健室でおaを渡すだけのカンタンなお仕事だったが、ＣＣＣではついにメインキャラを伽寥・盲俊！…のだが、他の猡っ孀婴Rされ菸丁

元は『おとなしい、かいがいしい、あいらしい』と三拍子そろったヒロイン（※ム`ンセル{べ）だが、EXTRAではどこかドライな、マスタ`たちから一i引いた辘颏趣盲皮い搿

その在り方は恋を知らず育ち、いまだ簸蛞ない少女像を思わせる。

ＣＣＣでも序PはOめて事盏摹

事件がMむたびに少しずつ人g味を・婴皮い。

ラニとは同じ『作られたもの』としてシンパシ`を抱いており、密かに仲がいい。

凛には苦手意Rを持っているが、それは凛が@の理想の少女像だから。ああいうLになりたい、と思っているからoしてしまうのだろう。

﻿……などと言いつつも、凛への辘rに\いのはご劬础@タイプが持つ潜在的な攻め葙|は、ム`ンセルにすら解消できない造的疾患なのであった。

 

Sakura Matou [NPC] P210

She is the AI in the infirmary.

Her job is to care for the health of the Masters. Like Kotomine, she exists in order for the Holy Grail War to be carried out smoothly and efficiently.

The family name of this AI is selected at random from among the family names of the Holy Grail War participants. This time the AI received the name “Matou” from Shinji Matou.

Despite the structure of her body being extremely similar to that of a human, and having a human personality, Sakura can seem a bit mechanical due to her devotion to her work.
